/study/scriptures/pgp/introduction.title: Talateú
text: Ko e Mataʻitofe Mahuʻingá ko hano filifili ia ʻo ha ngaahi fakamatala mahuʻinga ʻoku kau ki he ngaahi konga mahuʻinga ʻo e tui mo e tokāteline ʻo e Siasi ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi ʻo e Kau Māʻoniʻoni ʻi he Ngaahi ʻAho Kimui Ní. Naʻe ʻomi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení ʻe he Palōfita ko Siosefa Sāmitá pea naʻe pulusi ia ʻi he ngaahi nusipepa ʻa e Siasí ʻi he taimi ko iá.

Ko e ʻuluaki fakatahatahaʻi ʻo e ngaahi fakamatala ko iá naʻe ui ʻaki ʻa e hingoa ko e Mataʻitofe Mahuʻingá ʻi he 1851 ʻa ia naʻe fai ia ʻe ʻEletā Felengilini D. Lisiate, ko ha mēmipa ʻo e Fakataha Alēlea ʻo e Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá mo e palesiteni ʻo e Misiona Pilitāniá. Ko hono taumuʻá ke fakafaingamālieʻi hono maʻu ʻo ha niʻihi ʻo e ngaahi fakamatala mahuʻinga naʻe ʻikai lahi hono pulusi ʻo tufakí ʻi he taimi ʻo Siosefa Sāmitá. Ka ʻi he tupulaki ʻa e tokolahi ʻo e Siasí ʻi ʻIulope mo ʻAmeliká, naʻe ʻi ai hano fie maʻu ke fakafaingamālieʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ke maʻu ʻe he kakaí. Naʻe fakaʻaongaʻi lahi ʻe he Siasí ʻa e Mataʻitofe Mahuʻingá pea toki hoko ia ki mui ko ha taha ʻo e ngaahi tohi tapu ʻa e Siasí ʻi ha tuʻutuʻuni naʻe fai ʻe he Kau Palesiteni ʻUluakí ʻi he konifelenisi lahi naʻe fai ʻi Sōleki Siti ʻi he ʻaho 10 ʻOkatopa 1880.

ʻOku lahi ha ngaahi liliu kuo fai ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻi he tohí ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fie maʻu ʻa e Siasí. Naʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi konga ʻo e Tohi ʻa Mōsesé naʻe ʻikai kau ia ʻi hono ʻuluaki pulusí naʻe tānaki mai ia ʻi he 1878. Naʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi konga ʻe niʻihi ʻo e Mataʻitohi Mahuʻingá naʻe toe pulusi ia ʻi he Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakavá naʻe toʻo ia ʻi he 1902. Naʻe vahevahe ia ki he ngaahi vahe mo e ngaahi veesi, fakataha mo e ngaahi fakamoʻoni mo e ngaahi fakamatala iiki ʻi lalo ʻi he pēsí ʻi he 1902. Naʻe ʻuluaki pulusi ia ʻi he ʻotu ʻe ua ʻi he peesi taki taha fakataha mo e fakahinohino ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻi he tohí ʻi he 1921. Naʻe ʻikai toe fai ha ngaahi liliu kehe ʻo aʻu ai ki ʻEpeleli ʻo e 1976, ʻa ia naʻe tānaki mai ai ki ai ha fakahā ʻe ua. Naʻe toʻo ʻi he 1979 ʻa e ongo fakahā ko iá mei he Mataʻitofe Mahuʻingá ʻo fakakau ia ki he Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakavá, ʻo na hoko ai he taimí ni ko e vahe 137 mo e 138. Kuo fai ha ngaahi liliu ki hono pulusi lolotongá ke ngaohi ia ke fepoupouʻaki mo e ngaahi tohi fakamoʻoni fakamatala ʻi muʻá.
ʻOku hā atu ʻi laló ni ha fakamatala nounou ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau ki he tohí ʻi he lolotonga ní:

Ko e ngaahi meʻa naʻe filifili mei he Tohi ʻa Mōsesé. Ko e ngaahi fakamatala naʻe toʻo mei he tohi Sēnesí ʻi hono liliu ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻa e Tohi Tapú, ʻa ia naʻá ne kamata ʻi Sune 1830 (History of the Church, 1:98–101, 131–139).

Ko e Tohi ʻa ʻĒpalahamé. Ko ha liliu mei ha ngaahi pepa kiliʻi kaho faka-ʻIsipite ʻa ia naʻe tō ki he nima ʻo Siosefa Sāmitá ʻi he 1835, pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻe tohi ʻe he pēteliake ko ʻĒpalahamé. Naʻe pulusi fakakongokonga ʻa e liliú ʻi he Times and Seasons ʻo kamata ʻi he ʻaho 1 Māʻasi 1842, ʻi Nāvū, ʻi ʻIlinoisi (History of the Church, 4:519–534).

Siosefa Sāmita—Mātiu. Ko e ngaahi fakamatala naʻe toʻo mei he fakamoʻoni ʻa Mātiú ʻi he liliu ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻa e Tohi Tapú (vakai ki he, Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakavá 45:60–61 ke maʻu mei ai ʻa e fekau fakalangi ke kamata hono liliu ʻo e Fuakava Foʻoú).

Siosefa Sāmita—Hisitōlia. Ko e ngaahi fakamatala naʻe toʻo mei he fakamoʻoni mo e hisitōlia naʻe hiki ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻi he 1838 pea naʻe pulusi fakakongokonga ʻi he Times and Seasons ʻi Nāvū, ʻi ʻIlinoisi, ʻo kamata ʻi he ʻaho 15 Māʻasi 1842 (History of the Church, 1:1–44).

Ko e Ngaahi Tefito ʻo e Tui ʻo e Siasi ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi ʻo e Kau Māʻoniʻoni ʻi he Ngaahi ʻAho Kimui Ní. Ko ha fakamatala naʻe fai ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻa ia naʻe pulusi ʻi he Times and Seasons ʻi he ʻaho 1 Māʻasi 1842, fakataha mo ha hisitōlia nounou ʻo e Siasí ʻa ia naʻe ʻiloa ko e Tohi kia Ueniuefí (History of the Church, 4:535–541).

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/1.title: Mōsese 1
chapter_summary: ʻOku fakahā ʻe he ʻOtuá ia kia Mōsese—ʻOku liliu ʻa Mōsese—ʻOku haʻu ʻa Sētane kiate ia—ʻOku mamata ʻa Mōsese ki he ngaahi māmani lahi ʻoku nofoʻi—Naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ʻAló ʻa e ngaahi māmani taʻefaʻalaua—Ko e ngāue mo e nāunau ʻo e ʻOtuá ke fakahoko ʻa e moʻui taʻemate mo e moʻui taʻengata ʻa e tangatá.
/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/1.book_title: Ko e Ngaahi Meʻa naʻe Filifili mei he Tohi ʻa Mōsesé
subtitle: (Sune 1830)

verses.text: Ko e ngaahi folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá, ʻa ia naʻá ne folofola ʻaki kia Mōsese ʻi ha taimi ʻa ia naʻe ʻohake ai ʻa Mōsese ki ha moʻunga māʻolunga ʻaupito,
Pea naʻá ne mamata ki he ʻOtuá ko e mata ki he mata, peá ne fakatau folofola kiate ia, pea naʻe ʻia Mōsese ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻOtuá; ko ia naʻe lava ai ʻe Mōsese ke matuʻuaki ʻa hono lotolotongá.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá kia Mōsese, ʻo pehē: Vakai, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtua Māfimafí au, pea ko Lauikuonga hoku hingoá, he ʻoku ʻikai ha kamataʻanga ʻo hoku ngaahi ʻahó pe ha ngataʻanga ʻo hoku ngaahi taʻú; pea ʻikai koā ʻoku taʻengata ʻeni?

Pea vakai, ko hoku foha koe; ko ia mamata, pea te u fakahā kiate koe ʻa e ngāue ʻa hoku nimá; kae ʻikai ko hono kotoa, he ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga ʻo ʻeku ngaahi ngāué, kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku ngaahi leá, he ʻoku ʻikai ai pē ke nau ngata.

Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai ha tangata ʻe lava ʻo mamata ki heʻeku ngaahi ngāué kotoa, tuku kehe ʻo ka ne ka mamata ki hoku nāunaú kotoa; pea ʻoku ʻikai ha tangata ʻe lava ʻo mamata ki hoku nāunaú kotoa, pea ka hili ia ʻe kei nofo ʻi he kakanó ʻi he māmaní.

Pea ʻoku ʻi ai haʻaku ngāue ke ke fai, ʻe Mōsese, ko hoku foha; pea ʻokú ke ʻi he tatau ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; pea ko hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú ʻa e Fakamoʻuí pea ʻe hoko ko e Fakamoʻuí, he ʻokú ne fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofa mo e moʻoni; ka ʻoku ʻikai ha ʻOtua mo au, pea ʻoku ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, he ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu kotoa.
Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ko e meʻa ʻeni ʻe taha ʻoku ou fakahā kiate koe, ʻe Mōsese, ko hoku foha, he ʻokú ke ʻi he māmaní, pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou fakahā ia kiate koe.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe sio atu ʻa Mōsese, ʻo ne vakai ki he māmani ʻa ia naʻe fakatupu ai iá; pea naʻe vakai ʻa Mōsese ki he māmaní pea mo hono ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo iá, pea mo e fānau kotoa pē ʻa e tangatá ʻa ia ʻoku nau ʻi ai, pea naʻe fakatupú; ʻa ia ko e meʻa naʻá ne fakatumutumu mo ofo lahi ʻaupito ai.

Pea naʻe mahuʻi atu ʻa e lotolotonga ʻo e ʻOtuá meia Mōsese, pea naʻe ʻikai ʻia Mōsese ʻa hono nāunaú; pea naʻe tuku pē ʻa Mōsese ke ne toko taha pē. Pea ʻi he tuku ia ke ne toko taha peé, naʻá ne tō ki he kelekelé.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe ʻosi ha ngaahi houa lahi pea toki lava ʻe Mōsese ʻo toe maʻu ʻa hono mālohi fakanatulá ʻo hangē ko ha tangata; peá ne pehē ʻi hono lotó: Ko ʻeni, koeʻuhi ko e meʻá ni ʻoku ou ʻilo ai ko e meʻa noa pē ʻa e tangatá, ʻa ia ko e meʻa naʻe teʻeki ai te u fakakaukau ki ai.

Ka ko ʻeni kuo mamata ʻa hoku mata ʻoʻokú ki he ʻOtuá, kae ʻikai ko hoku mata fakanatulá, ka ko hoku mata fakalaumālié, he naʻe ʻikai mei lava ʻa hoku mata fakanatulá ʻo mamata; he naʻá ku mei mae ʻo mate ʻi hono ʻaó; ka naʻe ʻiate au ʻa hono nāunaú; pea naʻá ku mamata ki hono fofongá, he naʻá ku liliu ʻi hono ʻaó.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he lea ʻaki ʻe Mōsese ʻa e ngaahi lea ko ʻení, vakai, naʻe haʻu ʻa Sētane ʻo ʻahiʻahiʻi ia, ʻo pehē ange: ʻE Mōsese, ko e foha ʻo e tangata, ke ke hū kiate au.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe vakai atu ʻa Mōsese kia Sētane peá ne pehē ange: Ko hai koe? He vakai, ko e foha au ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻi he tatau ʻo hono ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; pea ko e fē ʻa ho nāunaú, ke u hū ai kiate koe?

He vakai, naʻe ʻikai te u mei lava ʻo mamata ki he ʻOtuá, tuku kehe ʻo ka ne ka hoko mai kiate au ʻa hono nāunaú, pea naʻá ku liliu ʻi hono ʻaó. Ka ʻoku ou lava ʻo mamata kiate koe ʻi he tangata fakakakanó. ʻOku ʻikai koā ko ia, ko e moʻoní ia?

Ke monūʻia ʻa e huafa ʻo hoku ʻOtuá, he kuo ʻikai ke mahuʻi ʻaupito meiate au ʻa hono Laumālié, kae kehe ʻoku ʻi fē ʻa ho nāunaú, he ko e fakapoʻuli ia kiate au? Pea ʻoku ou lava ke fakamaau ʻi ho vahaʻa mo e ʻOtuá; he naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻOtuá kiate au: Hū ki he ʻOtuá, he ko ia pē te ke tauhi kiate ia.
Ke ke ʻalu mei heni, ʻe Sētane; ʻoua ʻe kākaaʻi au; he naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻOtuá kiate au ʻo pehē: ʻOkú ke ʻi he tatau ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú.
Pea naʻá ne fai mai foki mo ha ngaahi fekau kiate au ʻi heʻene ui kiate au mei he fuʻu ʻakau velá, ʻo pehē: Ui ki he ʻOtuá ʻi he huafa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, pea hū kiate au.

Pea naʻe toe pehē ʻe Mōsese: ʻE ʻikai te u tuku ʻeku ui ki he ʻOtuá, ʻoku ʻi ai mo ʻeku ngaahi meʻa kehe ke fehuʻi kiate ia: he kuo ʻiate au ʻa hono nāunaú, ko ia ʻoku ou lava ke fakamaau ʻi hono vahaʻa mo koe. ʻAlu mei heni, ʻe Sētane.

Pea ko ʻeni, ʻi he hili hono lea ʻaki ʻe Mōsese ʻa e ngaahi lea ko ʻení, naʻe kaila ʻa Sētane ʻi ha leʻo-lahi, mo kalanga takai holo ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, mo fekau, ʻo pehē: Ko au ʻa e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, hū kiate au.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe kamata ʻa Mōsese ke ilifia ʻo fuʻu lahi ʻaupito; pea ʻi heʻene kamata ke ilifiá, naʻá ne mamata ki he fakamamahi ʻo helí. Ka neongo iá, ʻi heʻene ui ki he ʻOtuá, naʻá ne maʻu ʻa e mālohi, peá ne fekau, ʻo pehē: ʻAlu meiate au ʻe Sētane, he ko e ʻOtua pē taha ko ʻení te u hū ki aí, ʻa ia ko e ʻOtua ʻo e nāunaú.

Pea ko ʻeni naʻe kamata ke tetetete ʻa Sētane, pea naʻe ngalulululu ʻa e māmaní; pea naʻe maʻu ʻe Mōsese ʻa e mālohi, peá ne ui ki he ʻOtuá, ʻo pehē: ʻI he huafa ʻo e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻalu mei heni, ʻe Sētane.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe kaila ʻa Sētane ʻi he leʻo-lahi, ʻi he tangi, mo e tangilāulau, mo e fengaiʻitaki ʻo e nifo, pea naʻá ne ʻalu mei ai, ʻio mei he ʻao ʻo Mōsesé, pea naʻe ʻikai te ne mamata kiate ia.
Pea ko ʻeni naʻe fakamoʻoni ʻa Mōsese ʻo kau ki he meʻá ni; ka ko e meʻa ʻi he fai angahalá ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ia ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he hili ʻa e ʻalu ʻa Sētane mei he ʻao ʻo Mōsesé, naʻe hanga hake ʻa e fofonga ʻo Mōsesé ki he langí, kuo fonu ia ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku fakamoʻoni ki he Tamaí pea mo e ʻAló;

Pea ʻi heʻene ui ki he huafa ʻo e ʻOtuá, naʻá ne toe mamata ki hono nāunaú, he naʻe nofo ia ʻiate ia; pea naʻá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo, ʻoku pehē: ʻOkú ke monūʻia, ʻe Mōsese, he ko au, ko e Māfimafí, kuó u fili koe, pea ʻe ngaohi koe ke ke mālohi ange ʻi he ngaahi vai lahi; he ʻe talangofua ia ki hoʻo fekaú ʻo hangē ko e ʻOtuá koe.
Pea vakai, ʻoku ou ʻiate koe, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻo ho ngaahi ʻahó; he te ke fakahaofi ʻa hoku kakaí mei he nofo pōpulá, ʻio ʻa ʻIsileli ko hoku kakai filí.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻi he lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ʻa e leʻó, naʻe hanga atu ʻa e fofonga ʻo Mōsesé ʻo ne vakai ki he māmaní, ʻio, naʻa mo ia hono kotoa; pea naʻe ʻikai ha momoʻi meʻa ʻo ia naʻá ne taʻe-mamata ki ai, ʻo ne ʻiloʻi ia ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻá ne mamata foki ki hono kakai ʻo iá, pea naʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha foʻi toko taha te ne taʻe-mamata ki ai; pea naʻá ne ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea naʻe tokolahi ʻaupito ʻa kinautolu, ʻio ʻo taʻefaʻalaua ʻo hangē ko e ʻoneʻone ʻi he matātahí.
Pea naʻá ne mamata ki he ngaahi fonua lahi; pea naʻe ui ʻa e fonua taki taha ko e māmani, pea naʻe ʻi ai ha kakai ʻi hono funga ʻo iá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe ui ʻa Mōsese ki he ʻOtuá, ʻo pehē: Fakahā mai kiate au, ʻoku ou kole ki he ʻafio ná, ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻoku pehē ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení, pea naʻá ke ngaohi ʻaki ia ʻa e hā?

Pea vakai, naʻe ʻia Mōsese ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻEikí, pea ko ia naʻe tuʻu ʻa Mōsese ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻo ne fakatau folofola kiate ia ko e mata ki he mata. Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí ko e ʻOtuá kia Mōsese: Koeʻuhi ko e taumuʻa pē ʻaʻaku kuó u ngaohi ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení. Ko e potó ʻeni pea ʻoku ʻiate au ia.
Pea ʻi he folofola ʻo hoku mālohí, kuó u fakatupu ia, ʻa ia ko hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofá mo e moʻoní.
Pea kuó u fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi māmani taʻefaʻalaua; pea naʻá ku fakatupu ia foki koeʻuhi ko e taumuʻa pē ʻaʻaku; peá u fakatupu ia ʻi he ʻAló, ʻa ia ko hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú.
Pea ko e ʻuluaki tangata ʻi he kakai kotoa peé kuó u ui ko ʻĀtama, ʻa ia ko e tokolahi.

Ka ko e fakamatala ki he māmaní pē, pea mo hono kakai ʻo iá, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate koé. He vakai, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi māmani lahi kuo mole atu ʻi he folofola ʻo hoku mālohí. Pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi māmani lahi ʻoku kei tuʻú ni, pea ʻoku nau taʻefaʻalaua ki he faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá; ka ʻoku malaua ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kiate au, he ʻoku ʻaʻaku ʻa kinautolu peá u ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe fakatau folofola ʻa Mōsese ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: Ke ke ʻaloʻofa ki hoʻo tamaioʻeikí, ʻe ʻOtua, pea fakahā kiate au ʻo kau ki he māmani ko ʻení, pea mo hono kakai ʻo iá, kae ʻumaʻā ʻa e ngaahi langí, pea ʻe fiemālie ʻa hoʻo tamaioʻeikí.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá kia Mōsese, ʻo pehē: Ko e ngaahi langí, ʻoku lahi, pea ʻoku ʻikai lava ke faʻa lau ia ʻe he tangatá; ka ʻoku malaua ia kiate au, he ʻoku ʻaʻaku ia.
Pea ʻi he mole atu ʻa e māmani ʻe tahá, pea mo hono ngaahi langi ʻo iá, ʻe pehē pē ʻene hoko mai ha toe māmani ʻe taha; pea ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga ʻo ʻeku ngaahi ngāué, pe ko ʻeku ngaahi leá.
He vakai, ko ʻeku ngāué ʻeni mo hoku nāunaú—ke fakahoko ʻa e moʻui taʻe-faʻa-mate mo e moʻui taʻengata ʻa e tangatá.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻe Mōsese, ko hoku foha, te u lea kiate koe ʻo kau ki he māmani ko ʻeni ʻa ia ʻokú ke tuʻu aí; pea ke ke tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia te u leaʻakí.

Pea ʻi ha ʻaho ʻo ka lau ai ʻe he fānau ʻa e tangatá ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá ko e meʻa noa pē ʻo nau toʻo ʻa e ngaahi lea lahi mei he tohi ʻa ia te ke tohí, vakai, te u fokotuʻu hake ha tokotaha ʻo hangē pē ko koé; pea ʻe toe maʻu ia ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá—ʻiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tuí.

(Naʻe folofola ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi folofolá ni kia Mōsese ʻi he moʻungá, ʻa ia ko hono hingoá ʻe ʻikai ʻiloa ia ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá. Pea ko ʻeni kuo lea ʻaki ia kiate koe. ʻOua ʻe fakahā ia ki ha tokotaha tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu ʻoku tuí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/2.title: Mōsese 2
chapter_summary: ʻOku fakatupu ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e ngaahi langí mo e māmaní—ʻOku fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻo e meʻa moʻuí—ʻOku ngaohi ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e tangatá pea tuku kiate ia ke pule ki he meʻa kotoa pē.
subtitle: (Sune–ʻOkatopa 1830)

verses.text: Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Mōsese, ʻo pehē: Vakai, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau ki he langi ko ʻení, pea mo e māmani ko ʻení; tohi ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa ia ʻoku ou leaʻakí. Ko au ko e Kamataʻangá mo e Ngataʻangá, ko e ʻOtua Māfimafí, naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; ʻio, naʻá ku fakatupu ʻi he kamataʻangá ʻa e langí, pea mo e māmani ʻa ia ʻokú ke tuʻu aí.
Pea naʻe fuofuonoa ʻa e māmaní mo lala; peá u pule ke hoko mai ʻa e fakapoʻulí ki he funga ʻo e lolotó; pea naʻe ʻalu ʻa hoku Laumālié ʻi he fukahi vaí; he ko e ʻOtuá au.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Ke ʻi ai ha maama; pea naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e maama.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku mamata ki he māmá; pea naʻe lelei ʻa e maama ko iá. Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vaheʻi ʻa e māmá mei he fakapoʻulí.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ui ʻa e māmá ko e ʻAho; pea ko e fakapoʻulí, naʻá ku ui ko e Pō; pea naʻá ku fai ʻeni ʻi he folofola ʻo hoku mālohí, pea naʻe fai ʻo hangē ko ʻeku leá; pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko e ʻuluaki ʻahó.

Pea ko e tahá, ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku toe pehē: Ke ʻi ai ʻa e ʻatā ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e vaí, pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku leá; pea naʻá ku pehē: Tuku ke ne vaheʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí mei he ngaahi vai; pea naʻe fai ia;

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa e ʻataá pea vaheʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí, ʻio, ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu vai lalahi ʻi lalo ʻi he ʻataá mei he ngaahi vai naʻe ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he ʻataá, pea naʻe hoko ʻo hangē ko ʻeku leá.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ui ʻa e ʻataá ko e Langi; pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko e ʻaho hono uá.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Ke fakatahatahaʻi fakataha ʻa e ngaahi vai ʻi he lalo langí ki he feituʻu pē ʻe taha, pea naʻe pehē; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Ke ʻi ai ha kelekele mōmoa; pea naʻe hoko ia.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ui ʻa e kelekele mōmoá ko e Fonua; pea naʻá ku ui ʻa e ngaahi vai naʻe tānaki fakatahá ko e Tahi; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai ʻoku lelei ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u ngaohí.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Tuku ke fakatupu mai ʻe he kelekelé ʻa e mohukú mo e ʻakau iiki ʻoku tupu ai ʻa e tengá, ko e ʻakau fua ʻoku tupu ai hono fuá, ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá, pea mo e ʻakau ʻoku tupu ai ha fua, ʻa ia ʻoku totonu ke ʻi ai hono tenga ʻoʻona ʻi he kelekelé, pea naʻe hoko ia ʻo hangē pē ko ʻeku leá.

Pea naʻe fakatupu mai ʻe he kelekelé ʻa e mohukú, ko e ʻakau iiki kotoa pē ʻoku tupu ai ʻa e tenga ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá, pea mo e ʻakau ʻoku tupu ai ha fua, ʻa ia ʻoku totonu ke ʻi ai ʻa hono tenga ʻoʻona, ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahinga; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai kuo lelei ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u ngaohí;
Pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko hono ʻaho tolú.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Tuku ke ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi maama ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí, ke vahevaheʻi ʻa e ʻahó mei he poó, pea tuku ke hoko ia ko e ngaahi fakaʻilonga, pea mo e ngaahi faʻahitaʻu, pea mo e ngaahi ʻaho, pea mo e ngaahi taʻu;
Pea tuku ke hoko ia ko e ngaahi maama ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí ke fakamāmaʻi ʻa e māmaní; pea naʻe hoko ia.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa e maama lalahi ʻe ua; ko e maama lahi haké ke pule ki he ʻahó, mo e maama siʻi hifó ke pule ki he poó, pea ko e maama lahi haké ko e laʻaá, pea ko e maama siʻi hifó ko e māhiná; pea naʻe ngaohi foki mo e ngaahi fetuʻú ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku leá.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fokotuʻu ia ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí ke fakamāmaʻi ʻa e māmaní,

Pea mo e laʻaá ke pule ki he ʻahó, pea mo e māhiná ke pule ki he poó, pea ke vaheʻi ʻa e māmá mei he fakapoʻulí; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai kuo lelei ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u ngaohí;
Pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko hono ʻaho faá.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Tuku ke fakatupu mai ʻo lahi ʻaupito ʻe he ngaahi vaí ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻalu holo ʻa ia ʻoku moʻuí, mo e fanga manupuna ʻa ia ʻe lava ʻo puna ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he kelekelé ʻi he ʻataʻatā ʻo e langí.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa e fanga tofuaʻa lalahi, pea mo e meʻa moʻui kotoa pē ʻoku ngaue, ʻa ia naʻe fakatupu mai ʻo lahi ʻaupito ʻi he ngaahi vaí, ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá, pea mo e manupuna kotoa pē ʻoku kapakaú ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahinga; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai, kuo lelei ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u fakatupú.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻo pehē: Mou fanafanau mo fakatokolahi, pea fakafonu ʻa e ngaahi vai ʻi he tahí; pea ke fakatokolahi ʻa e fanga manupuná ʻi he māmaní;
Pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko e ʻaho hono nimá.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē: Tuku ke fakatupu mai ʻe he māmaní ʻa e meʻa moʻuí ʻi hono faʻahinga, ʻa e fanga pulú, mo e ngaahi meʻa totoló, mo e fanga manu ʻo e māmaní ʻi honau faʻahingá, pea naʻe hoko ia;

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa e fanga manu ʻo e māmaní ʻi honau faʻahingá, mo e fanga pulú ʻi honau faʻahinga, pea mo e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku totolo ʻi he māmaní ʻi honau faʻahinga; pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai kuo lelei ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange ki hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻa ia naʻe ʻiate au talu mei he kamataʻangá: Tuku ke ta ngaohi ʻa e tangatá ʻi hota ʻīmisí, ʻo fakatatau ki hota tataú; pea naʻe hoko ia. Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange: Tuku ke nau pule ki he fanga ika ʻo e tahí, pea ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he fanga pulú, pea ki he māmaní kotoa pē, pea ki he meʻa totolo kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku totolo ʻi he funga ʻo e fonuá.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa e tangatá ʻi hoku ʻīmisi ʻoʻokú, naʻá ku ngaohi ia ʻi he ʻīmisi ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa kinaua koe tangata mo e fefine.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinaua, ʻo pehē ange kiate kinaua: Mo fanafanau, mo fakatokolahi, pea fakakakai ʻa e māmaní, ʻo ikunaʻi ia, pea pule ki he fanga ika ʻo e tahí, pea ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he meʻa moʻui kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku ʻalu holo ʻi he funga fonuá.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ki he tangatá: Vakai, kuó u foaki kiate kimoua ʻa e ʻakau iiki kotoa pē ʻoku tupu ai ha tenga, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi he funga hono kotoa ʻo e māmaní, pea mo e ʻakau kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e fua ʻo ha ʻakau ʻoku tupu ai ha tenga; ʻe hoko ia ko hoʻomo meʻakai.

Pea ki he manu kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní, pea ki he manupuna kotoa pē ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku totolo ʻi he māmaní, ʻa ia ʻoku ou tuku ki ai ʻa e moʻuí, ʻe foaki kiate kinautolu ʻa e ʻakau iiki maʻá ke hoko ko e meʻakai; pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku leá.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai ki he meʻa kotoa pē kuó u ngaohí, pea vakai, kuo lelei ʻaupito ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kuó u ngaohí; pea ko e efiafí mo e pongipongí ko e ʻaho hono onó.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/3.title: Mōsese 3
chapter_summary: Naʻe fakatupu fakalaumālie ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ki muʻa pea toki fakatupu fakatuʻasino ia ʻi he māmaní—Naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa e tangatá, ko e ʻuluaki kakano, ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní—ʻOku hoko ʻa e fefiné ko ha tokoni ʻoku taau ki he tangatá.
subtitle: (Sune–ʻOkatopa 1830)

verses.text: Naʻe pehē ʻa hono ngaohi ʻo ʻosi ʻa e langí pea mo e māmaní, pea mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.

Pea ʻi hono fitu ʻo e ʻahó ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakaʻosi ʻa ʻeku ngāué, pea mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuó u ngaohí; peá u mālōlō ʻi he ʻaho hono fitú mei heʻeku ngāue kotoa pē, pea kuo ʻosi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u ngaohí, pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku vakai kuo nau lelei;
Pea ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tāpuakiʻi ʻa e ʻaho hono fitú, mo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ia; koeʻuhí he naʻá ku mālōlō ai mei heʻeku ngāue kotoa pē ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu mo ngaohí.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko e ngaahi tala fakahohoko ʻeni ki he langí pea mo e māmaní, ʻi he taimi naʻe fakatupu ai iá, ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ai ʻa e langí pea mo e māmaní,

Pea mo e ʻakau kotoa pē ʻo e ngoué ki muʻa ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tuʻu ia ʻi he kelekelé, pea mo e ʻakau iiki kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tupu iá. He ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu fakalaumālie ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u lau ki aí, ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tuʻu ia ʻi he anga-fakanatulá ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní. He ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻe teʻeki ai ke u pule ke tō ha ʻuha ki he funga ʻo e māmaní. Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ʻosi fakatupu ʻa e fānau kotoa pē ʻa e tangatá; ka naʻe teʻeki ai ke ʻi ai ha tangata ke ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé; he naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa kinautolu ʻi he langí; pea naʻe teʻeki ke ʻi ai ha kakano ʻi he māmaní, pe ʻi he vaí, pe ʻi he ʻataá;
Ka ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku lea, pea naʻe ʻalu hake ha hahau mei he māmaní, ʻo fakaviviku ʻa e funga hono kotoa ʻo e kelekelé.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa e tangatá mei he efu ʻo e kelekelé, peá u mānava ʻaki ki hono avaʻi ihú ʻa e mānava ʻo e moʻuí, pea naʻe hoko ʻa e tangatá ko e moʻoniʻi laumālie moʻui, ko e ʻuluaki kakano ʻi he māmaní, pea ko e ʻuluaki tangatá foki; ka neongo iá, naʻe tomuʻa fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; ka naʻe fakatupu mo ngaohi fakalaumālie ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku leá.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tō ha ngoue ʻi he feituʻu fakahahake ʻi ʻĪteni, pea naʻá ku tuku ki ai ʻa e tangata ʻa ia naʻá ku fakatupú.

Pea naʻe ngaohi ke tupu mei he kelekelé ʻe au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ʻa e ʻakau kotoa pē, ʻi he anga-fakakakanó, ʻa ia ʻoku matamatalelei ki he vakai ʻa e tangatá; pea lava ʻo vakai ki ai ʻa e tangatá. Pea naʻe hoko ia foki ko e moʻoniʻi laumālie moʻui. He naʻe fakalaumālie ia ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia naʻá ku fakatupu ai iá; he naʻe nofo ia ʻi he feituʻu ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu ai iá, ʻio, naʻa mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē naʻá ku teuteu ke ngāue ʻaki ʻe he tangatá; pea naʻe vakai ʻa e tangatá ʻoku lelei ia ki he kai. Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tō ʻa e ʻakau ʻo e moʻuí foki ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngoué, kae ʻumaʻā ʻa e ʻakau ʻo e ʻilo ʻo e leleí mo e koví.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pule ke tafe atu ʻa e vaitafe mei ʻĪteni ke fakaviviku ʻa e ngoué; pea mei ai naʻe mavahevahe ia, ʻo hoko ki ha mangaʻi vai ʻe fā.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ui ʻa e ʻuluakí ko Pisoni, pea naʻe takatakai ʻe ia ʻa e fonua kotoa ko Havilá, ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fakatupu ai ʻa e koula lahi;
Pea naʻe lelei ʻa e koula ʻo e fonua ko iá, pea naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e mataʻi tofé mo e maka ko e ʻoniké.
Pea ko e hingoa ʻo hono ua ʻo e vaitafé naʻe ui ko Kīhoni; ko ia ʻoku takatakai ʻa e fonua kotoa ko ʻItiopeá.
Pea ko e hingoa ʻo e vaitafe hono tolú ko Hitikeli; ko ia ia ʻoku tafe atu ki he hahake ʻo ʻAsiliá. Pea ko hono fā ʻo e vaitafé ko ʻIufaletesi.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ʻave ʻa e tangatá ʻo tuku ia ki he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, ke ngoueʻi mo tauhi ia.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku fekau ki he tangatá ʻo pehē: ʻE ngofua ʻa hoʻo kai faʻiteliha mei he ʻakau kotoa pē ʻo e ngoué,

Ka ko e ʻakau ʻo e ʻilo ʻo e leleí mo e koví, ʻe ʻikai te ke kai mei ai, ka neongo iá, ʻoku ngofua ke ke fili maʻau, he ʻoku foaki ia kiate koe; kae manatu ʻoku ou fakatapui ia, he ko e ʻaho te ke kai aí ko e moʻoni te ke mate.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ki hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻoku ʻikai lelei ke toko taha pē ʻa e tangatá; ko ia, te u ngaohi kiate ia ha tokoni ʻoku taau mo iá.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi mei he kelekelé ʻa e fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e vaó, mo e manupuna kotoa pē ʻo e ʻataá; peá u fekau ke nau haʻu kia ʻĀtama, ke vakai pe ko e hā te ne ui ʻaki ʻa kinautolú; pea ko e ngaahi laumālie moʻui foki mo kinautolu; he ko au ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku mānava ʻaki ʻa e mānava ʻo e moʻuí kiate kinautolu, peá u fekau ke ʻilonga ʻa e hingoa ʻe ui ʻaki ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e meʻa moʻui kotoa peé, ke hoko ia ko hono hingoá.

Pea naʻe foaki ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e hingoa ki he fanga pulu kotoa pē, pea ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e vaó; ka ko e meʻa kia ʻĀtama, naʻe ʻikai ke ne ʻilo ha tokoni naʻe taau mo ia.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tuku ʻa e mohe maʻu kia ʻĀtama; pea naʻá ne mohe, peá u toʻo ha taha ʻo hono ngaahi hui vakavaká, peá u toe fakafoki ʻa e kakanó ki he meʻa naʻe ʻi aí;
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ko e hui vakavaka naʻá ku toʻo mei he tangatá, naʻá ku ngaohi mei ai ʻa e fefiné, peá u ʻomi ia ki he tangatá.
Pea naʻe pehē ʻe ʻĀtama: ʻOku ou ʻilo ʻeni ko e hui ʻeni ʻo hoku ngaahi huí, mo e kakano ʻo hoku kakanó; ʻe ui ia ko e Fefine, koeʻuhí he naʻe toʻo ia mei he tangatá.
Ko ia ʻe tukuange ai ʻe ha tangata ʻa ʻene tamaí mo ʻene faʻeé, pea te ne pīkitai ki hono uaifí; pea te na kakano taha pē.
Pea naʻá na fakatou telefua, ʻa e tangatá mo hono uaifí, pea naʻe ʻikai te na mā.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/4.title: Mōsese 4
chapter_summary: Ko e founga naʻe hoko ai ʻa Sētane ko e tēvoló—ʻOkú ne ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa ʻIvi—ʻOku hinga ʻa ʻĀtama mo ʻIvi, pea hoko mai ʻa e maté ki he māmaní.
subtitle: (Sune–ʻOkatopa 1830)

verses.text: Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku lea kia Mōsese, ʻo pehē: Ko e Sētane ko ia, ʻa ia naʻá ke fekauʻi ʻi he huafa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ko ia ia naʻe ʻi ai talu mei he kamataʻangá, pea naʻá ne haʻu ki hoku ʻaó ʻo pehē—Vakai, ko au ʻeni, fekauʻi au, te u hoko ko ho ʻAlo, pea te u huhuʻi ʻa e faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻo e tangatá, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa mole ha foʻi laumālie ʻe toko taha, pea ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke u fai ia; ko ia ke ke foaki kiate au ʻa ho lāngilangí.

Kae vakai, ko hoku ʻAlo ʻOfaʻangá, ʻa ia ko hoku ʻOfaʻanga mo e Tokotaha kuó u Fili talu mei he kamataʻangá, naʻe pehē mai ʻe ia kiate au—ʻE Tamai, ke fai pē ʻa ho finangaló, pea ke ʻoʻou ʻa e lāngilangí ʻo taʻengata.

Ko ia, ko e meʻa ʻi he angatuʻu ʻa Sētane kiate aú, ʻo ne feinga ke fakaʻauha ʻa e tauʻatāina ke fili ʻa e tangatá, ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, kuó u foaki kiate iá, pea ko e tahá foki, ke u foaki foki kiate ia ʻa hoku mālohi ʻoʻokú; ko ia ʻi he mālohi ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, naʻá ku pule ke kapusi hifo ia ki lalo;

Pea naʻá ne hoko ko Sētane, ʻio, ko e tēvoló, ko e tamai ʻa e ngaahi loi kotoa pē, ke kākaaʻi mo fakakuihi ʻa e tangatá, pea ke tataki pōpula ʻa kinautolu ʻi heʻene faʻitelihá, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe ʻikai tokanga ki hoku leʻó.
Pea ko ʻeni naʻe olopoto lahi hake ʻa e ngatá ʻi ha toe manu ʻo e vaó ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, kuó u ngaohí.

Pea naʻe fakahū ia ʻe Sētane ki he loto ʻo e ngatá, (he kuó ne tohoakiʻi atu ʻa e tokolahi ke muimui kiate ia,) pea naʻá ne feinga foki ke lohiakiʻi ʻa ʻIvi, he naʻe ʻikai te ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá, ko ia naʻá ne feinga ai ke fakaʻauha ʻa e māmaní.
Pea naʻá ne pehē ki he fefiné: ʻIo, kuo folofola koā ʻa e ʻOtuá—ʻE ʻikai te mo kai mei he ʻakau kotoa pē ʻo e ngoué? (Pea naʻá ne lea ʻi he ngutu ʻo e ngatá.)
Pea pehē ange ʻe he fefiné ki he ngatá: ʻOku ngofua ʻema kai mei he fua ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau ʻo e ngoué;
Ka ko e fua ʻo e ʻakau ʻa ia ʻokú ke vakai ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he loto ngoué, kuo folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻo pehē—ʻOua te mo kai mei ai, pe te mo ala ki ai, telia naʻá mo mate.
Pea pehē ange ʻe he ngatá ki he fefiné: Ko e moʻoni ʻe ʻikai te mo mate;
He ʻoku ʻafioʻi ʻe he ʻOtuá ko e ʻaho te mo kai aí, ʻe ʻā ai homo matá, pea te mo tatau mo e ngaahi ʻotua, ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻa e leleí mo e koví.

Pea ʻi he vakai ʻa e fefiné ʻoku lelei ʻa e ʻakaú ki he kaí, pea kuo hoko ia ʻo matamatalelei ki he matá, pea ko ha ʻakau ke vēlevele ki ai ke fakapotoʻi ia, naʻá ne toʻo ai hono fuá, ʻo ne kai, pea naʻá ne ʻoange foki ki hono husepānití mo ia, pea naʻá ne kai.
Pea naʻe fakaʻā ai ʻa hona matá fakatouʻosi, pea naʻá na ʻiloʻi kuó na telefua. Pea naʻá na tui ʻa e lou fiki ʻo ngaohi ʻaki ha ʻēpani moʻonaua.

Pea naʻá na fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, lolotonga ʻena ʻeveʻeva ʻi he ngoué, ʻi he mokomoko ʻo e ʻahó; pea naʻe ʻalu ʻa ʻĀtama mo hono uaifí ʻo toitoi mei he ʻao ʻo e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau ʻo e ngoué.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ui kia ʻĀtama, ʻo pehē kiate ia: Ko hoʻo ʻalú ki fē?
Pea naʻá ne pehē: Naʻá ku fanongo ki ho leʻó ʻi he ngoué, pea naʻá ku manavahē, koeʻuhí he naʻá ku vakai ʻoku ou telefua, peá u toitoi.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange kia ʻĀtama: Ko hai naʻá ne fakahā kiate koe ʻokú ke telefuá? Kuó ke kai ʻi he ʻakau ʻa ia naʻá ku fekau kiate koe ke ʻoua naʻá ke kai aí, he kapau te ke fai pehē ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke ke mate?
Pea pehē mai ʻe he tangatá: Ko e fefine ʻa ia naʻá ke foaki kiate au ʻo fekau ke u nofo mo iá, naʻá ne ʻomi kiate au ʻa e fua mei he ʻakaú peá u kai.
Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange ki he fefiné: Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ko ʻeni kuó ke faí? Pea pehē mai ʻe he fefiné: Naʻe kākaaʻi au ʻe he ngatá, peá u kai.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange ki he ngatá: Koeʻuhi kuó ke fai ʻeni, te ke malaʻia ʻo lahi hake ʻi he fanga pulu kotoa pē, pea lahi hake ʻi he fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e vaó; te ke ngaolo koe ʻi ho keté, pea te ke kai ʻa e efu ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho kotoa pē ʻo hoʻo moʻuí;
Pea te u tuku ʻa e tāufehiʻá ʻiate koe mo e fefiné, ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo ho hakó mo hono hakó; pea te ne laiki ʻe ia ʻa ho ʻulú, pea te ke fakavolu ʻe koe ʻa hono muivaʻé.

Naʻá ku pehē, ʻe au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ki he fefiné: Te u fakalahi ʻaupito ʻa hoʻo mamahí pea mo hoʻo tuʻituʻiá. Te ke fāʻeleʻi ʻa e fānaú ʻi he mamahi, pea ko hoʻo holí ʻe ʻi ho husepānití, pea te ne pule kiate koe.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange kia ʻĀtama: Koeʻuhi ko hoʻo tokanga ki he leʻo ʻo ho uaifí, mo kai ʻa e fua ʻo e ʻakau ʻa ia naʻá ku fekau kiate koe, ʻo pehē—ʻE ʻikai te ke kai mei aí, ko ia ʻe malaʻia ʻa e kelekelé koeʻuhi ko koe; te ke kai mei ai ʻi he mamahi ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo hoʻo moʻuí.
ʻE tupu ai foki kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau talatalá, mo e ngaahi talatalaʻāmoa, pea te ke kai ʻa e ʻakau iiki ʻo e vaó.
Te ke kai ʻa e maá ʻi he kakava ʻo ho matá, kae ʻoua ke ke foki ki he kelekelé—he ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke ke mate—he naʻe toʻo koe mei ai: he ko e efu koe, pea te ke toe foki ki he efú.

Pea naʻe ui ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e hingoa ʻo hono uaifí ko ʻIvi, koeʻuhí he ko e faʻē ia ʻa e kakai moʻui kotoa pē; he ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻe pehē ʻeku ui ʻa e ʻuluaki ʻo e kau fefine kotoa peé, ʻa ia ʻoku nau tokolahi.
Ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku ngaohi ha kofu kiliʻimanu kia ʻĀtama, pea ki hono uaifí foki, pea fakakofuʻi ʻa kinaua.

Pea ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku pehē ange ki hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú: Vakai, kuo hoko ʻa e tangatá ʻo hangē ko ha taha ʻiate kitauá ke ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e leleí mo e koví; pea ko ʻeni, telia naʻa mafao atu ʻa hono nimá peá ne kai foki mei he ʻakau ʻo e moʻuí, ʻo ne kai, pea moʻui ʻo taʻengata,
Ko ia ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, te u fekauʻi atu ia mei he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, ke ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekele ʻa ia naʻe toʻo ia mei aí;
He hangē ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ʻoku pau ʻeku moʻuí, ʻoku pehē pē ʻa e ʻikai lava ke foki mai ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá ʻo taʻeʻaonga, he hangē ʻoku ʻalu atu ia mei hoku ngutú kuo pau ke fakahoko ia.
Ko ia naʻá ku kapusi atu ʻa e tangatá, peá u tuku ʻi he hahake ʻo e Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, ʻa e kau selupimi mo ha heletā ulo, ʻa ia naʻe foli fakatakamilo ke leʻohi ʻa e hala ʻo e ʻakau ʻo e moʻuí.

(Pea ko e ngaahi lea ʻeni naʻá ku lea ʻaki ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Mōsesé, pea ʻoku moʻoni ia ʻo hangē pē ko hoku lotó; pea kuó u lea ʻaki ia kiate koe. Vakai ke ʻoua naʻá ke fakahā ia ki ha tangata, kae ʻoua ke u fekau kiate koe, tuku kehe pē kiate kinautolu ʻoku tuí. ʻĒmeni.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/5.title: Mōsese 5
chapter_summary: ʻOku fanauʻi mai ʻe ʻĀtama mo ʻIvi ha fānau—ʻOku ʻo hake ʻe ʻĀtama ha ngaahi feilaulau mo tauhi ki he ʻOtuá—ʻOku fanauʻi mai ʻa Keini mo ʻĒpeli—ʻOku angatuʻu ʻa Keini, pea ʻofa ʻia Sētane ʻo laka hake ʻi he ʻOtuá, pea hoko ko e Foha ʻo e Malaʻiá—ʻOku mafola ʻa e fakapoó mo e fai angahalá—ʻOku malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí talu mei he kamataʻangá.
subtitle: (Sune–ʻOkatopa 1830)

verses.text: Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he hili ʻeku kapusi ʻe au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ʻa kinaua ki tuʻá, naʻe kamata ʻe ʻĀtama ke ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé, pea ke pule ki he fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e vaó, pea kai ʻene maá ʻi he kakava ʻo hono matá, ʻo hangē ko ia ko au, ko e ʻEikí naʻá ku fekau kiate iá. Pea ko ʻIvi, foki, ko hono uaifí, naʻá ne ngāue fakataha mo ia.
Pea naʻe ʻilo ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa hono uaifí, pea naʻá ne fanauʻi kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine, pea nau kamata ke fakatokolahi mo fakakakai ʻa e māmaní.

Pea mei he taimi ko iá, naʻe kamata ʻe he ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo ʻĀtamá ke mavahe atu ʻo tautau toko ua ʻi he fonuá, pea ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé, mo tauhi ʻa e ngaahi tākanga monumanu lalahi, pea nau fakatupu foki ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine.

Pea naʻe ui atu ʻe ʻĀtama, mo ʻIvi ko hono uaifí, ki he huafa ʻo e ʻEikí, pea naʻá na fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí mei he feituʻu ʻoku hanga ki he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, ʻoku folofola mai kiate kinaua, pea naʻe ʻikai te na mamata kiate ia; he kuo toʻo ʻa kinaua mei hono ʻaó.

Pea naʻá ne fai kiate kinaua ʻa e ongo fekau, ke na hū ki he ʻEiki ko hona ʻOtuá, pea ʻoatu ʻa e veloaki ʻo ʻenau ngaahi tākanga monumanu īkí, ko e feilaulau ki he ʻEikí. Pea naʻe talangofua ʻa ʻĀtama ki he ngaahi fekau ʻa e ʻEikí.

Pea naʻe hili ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho lahi naʻe hā mai ʻa e ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĀtama, ʻo pehē ange: Ko e hā ʻokú ke ʻoatu ai ʻa e ngaahi feilaulau ki he ʻEikí? Pea naʻe pehē ange ʻe ʻĀtama kiate ia: ʻOku ʻikai te u ʻilo, tuku kehe pē hono fekau ʻe he ʻEikí kiate au.
Pea toki lea ange leva ʻa e ʻāngeló, ʻo pehē: Ko hono tatau ʻeni ʻo e feilaulau ʻo e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupu ʻo e Tamaí, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofa mo e moʻoni.
Ko ia, ke ke fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ʻokú ke faí ʻi he huafa ʻo e ʻAló, pea ke ke fakatomala, pea ui ki he ʻOtuá ʻi he huafa ʻo e ʻAló ʻo fai atu maʻu ai pē.

Pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá naʻe tō hifo ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní kia ʻĀtama, ʻa ia ʻoku fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e Tamaí mo e ʻAló, ʻo pehē: Ko au ko e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupu ʻo e Tamaí mei he kamataʻangá, pea fai atu ai pē ʻo taʻengata, koeʻuhí ko hoʻo hingá ʻe lava ai ke huhuʻi koe, pea mo e faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻo e tangatá, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe loto ki aí.

Pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá naʻe fakafetaʻi ʻa ʻĀtama ki he ʻOtuá pea naʻe fakafonu ia pea kamata ke kikite ʻo kau ki he ngaahi fāmili kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní, ʻo pehē: Ke monūʻia ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻOtuá, he ko e meʻa ʻi heʻeku maumau-fonó kuo fakaʻā ai ʻa hoku matá, pea te u maʻu ʻa e fiefia ʻi he moʻuí ni, pea te u toe mamata ʻi he kakanó ki he ʻOtuá.

Pea ko ʻIvi, ko hono uaifí, naʻá ne fanongo ki he ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē pea naʻá ne fiefia, ʻo ne pehē: Ka ne taʻeʻoua ʻeta maumau-fonó pehē ʻe ʻikai pē te ta maʻu ha hako, pea ʻikai foki ʻiloʻi ʻa e leleí mo e koví, pea mo e fiefia ʻo hota huhuʻí, pea mo e moʻui taʻengata ʻa ia ʻoku foaki ʻe he ʻOtuá kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku talangofuá.
Pea naʻe fakafetaʻi ʻa ʻĀtama mo ʻIvi ki he huafa ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻá na fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ki hona ngaahi fohá mo e ngaahi ʻofefiné.

Pea naʻe haʻu ʻa Sētane ki honau lotolotongá, ʻo pehē: ko e ʻalo foki au ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea naʻá ne fekau kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ʻOua naʻa mou tui ki ai; pea naʻe ʻikai te nau tui ki ai, pea naʻa nau ʻofa kia Sētane ʻo lahi ange ʻi he ʻOtuá. Pea naʻe kamata ʻa e tangatá ʻo fai atu mei he taimi ko iá ke anga-fakakakano, faʻa holi kovi, mo anga-fakatēvolo.
Pea naʻe ui ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá ki he tangatá ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē peá ne fekau kiate kinautolu ʻoku totonu ke nau fakatomala;

Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tui ki he ʻAló, pea fakatomala mei heʻenau ngaahi angahalá, ʻoku totonu ke fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolu; pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe ʻikai tui pea ʻikai fakatomalá, ʻoku totonu ke fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa kinautolu; pea naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e ngaahi folofolá mei he fofonga ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻi ha tuʻutuʻuni pau; ko ia kuo pau ke fakahoko ia.

Pea naʻe ʻikai ke tuku ʻe ʻĀtama mo ʻIvi, ko hono uaifí, ʻa ʻena ui atu ki he ʻOtuá. Pea naʻe ʻilo ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa ʻIvi ko hono uaifí, peá ne tuʻituʻia mo fanauʻi ʻa Keini, peá ne pehē: Kuó u maʻu ha tangata mei he ʻEikí; ko ia ʻe ʻikai te ne lava ʻo liʻaki ʻa ʻene ngaahi folofolá. Kae vakai, naʻe ʻikai ke tokanga ʻa Keini, ʻo ne pehē: Ko hai ʻa e ʻEikí ke u ʻiloʻi ia?
Pea naʻá ne toe tuʻituʻia ʻo fanauʻi ʻa hono tokoua ko ʻĒpelí. Pea naʻe tokanga ʻa ʻĒpeli ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí. Pea ko e tauhi-sipi ʻa ʻĒpeli, ka ko e tama ʻa Keini naʻá ne ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé.
Pea naʻe ʻofa ʻa Keini kia Sētane ʻo laka hake ʻi he ʻOtuá. Pea naʻe fekau kiate ia ʻe Sētane, ʻo pehē: Fai ha feilaulau ki he ʻEikí.
Pea naʻe ʻalu ʻa e taimí pea hoko ʻo pehē naʻe ʻomai ʻe Keini ʻa e fua ʻo e kelekelé ko ha feilaulau ki he ʻEikí.
Pea ko ʻĒpeli, naʻá ne ʻomi foki ʻa e ngaahi veloaki ʻo ʻene tākanga monumanu īkí, pea mo ia ʻi ai naʻe sisinó. Pea naʻe tali ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa ʻĒpeli, mo ʻene feilaulaú;
Ka ko Keini mo ʻene feilaulaú, naʻe ʻikai te ne tali. Ko ʻeni naʻe ʻiloʻi ʻeni ʻe Sētane, pea naʻe fakafiefia ia kiate ia. Pea naʻe fuʻu ʻita lahi ʻa Keini, pea naʻe liliu ʻa hono matá.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Keini: Ko e hā ʻokú ke ʻita aí? Ko e hā ʻoku liliu ai ʻa ho matá?

Kapau te ke failelei, ʻe tali koe. Pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ke failelei, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he matapā ʻa e angahalá, pea ʻoku fie maʻu ʻe Sētane ke maʻu koe; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ke tokanga ki heʻeku ngaahi fekaú, te u tukuange koe, pea ʻe hoko kiate koe ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene holí. Pea te ke puleʻi ia;
He ʻe kamata mei he taimí ni ʻo fai atu te ke hoko ko e tamai ʻa ʻene ngaahi loí; ʻe ui koe ko Malaʻia; he naʻá ke ʻi ai foki ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ʻi ai ʻa e māmaní.

Pea ʻe lea ʻaki ʻo pehē ʻamui—Ko e ngaahi anga-fakalielia ʻeni naʻe ʻi ai talu meia Keini; he naʻá ne siʻaki ʻa e akonaki mahuʻinga ange ʻa ia naʻe maʻu mei he ʻOtuá; pea ko ha malaʻia ʻeni ʻa ia te u tuku kiate koe, ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te ke fakatomala.
Pea naʻe ʻita ʻa Keini, ʻo ʻikai toe tokanga ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí pe kia ʻĒpeli ko hono tokouá, ʻa ia naʻá ne ʻaʻeva ʻi he māʻoniʻoni ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí.
Pea naʻe tangi ʻa ʻĀtama mo hono uaifí ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, koeʻuhi ko Keini mo hono ngaahi kāingá.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe maʻu ʻe Keini ha toko taha ʻo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo hono ngaahi tokouá ke hoko ko hono uaifi, pea naʻá na ʻofa kia Sētane ʻo laka hake ʻi he ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻe pehē ange ʻe Sētane kia Keini: Fuakava kiate au, ʻi ho mongá pea kapau te ke fakahā ia te ke mate; pea fakafuakavaʻi ʻa ho kāingá ʻi honau ʻulú, pea ki he ʻOtua moʻuí, ke ʻoua naʻa nau fakahā ia; he kapau te nau fakahā ia, ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke nau mate; pea ke fai ʻeni ke ʻoua naʻa ʻiloʻi ia ʻe hoʻo tamaí; pea ʻi he ʻahó ni te u tuku atu ʻa ho tokoua ko ʻĒpelí ki ho nimá.
Pea naʻe fuakava ʻa Sētane kia Keini te ne fai ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene ngaahi fekaú. Pea naʻe fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē ʻi he lilo.

Pea naʻe pehē ʻe Keini: Ko e moʻoni ko Meihani au, ko e pule ki he fuʻu meʻa lilo lahí ni, ke u lava ʻo fakapō pea maʻu koloa aí. Ko ia, naʻe ui ʻa Keini ko e Pule ko Meihani, pea naʻá ne pōlepole ʻi heʻene fai angahalá.

Pea naʻe ʻalu ʻa Keini ki he ngoué, pea talanoa ʻa Keini mo ʻĒpeli, ko hono tokouá. Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he lolotonga ʻena ʻi he ngoué, naʻe tuʻu hake ʻa Keini kia ʻĒpeli, ko hono tokouá, ʻo ne tāmateʻi ia.
Pea naʻe pōlepole ʻa Keini ʻi he meʻa kuó ne faí, ʻo pehē: ʻOku ou tauʻatāina; ko e moʻoni kuo tō ʻa e tākanga monumanu ʻa hoku tokouá ki hoku nimá.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Keini: Ko e fē ʻa ʻĒpeli, ko ho tokoua? Pea naʻá ne pehē ange: ʻOku ʻikai te u ʻilo. Ko e tauhi koā au ʻo hoku tokouá?
Pea folofola ange ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo pehē: Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa kuó ke faí? ʻOku tangi ʻa e leʻo ʻo e toto ʻo ho tokouá kiate au mei he kelekelé.
Pea ko ʻeni ʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi koe mei he māmani ʻa ia kuo fakamanga hono ngutú ke maʻu ʻa e toto ʻo ho tokouá mei ho nimá.
ʻO ka ke ka ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé ʻe ʻikai ʻomai ʻe ia ʻa hono mālohí kiate koe. Te ke hoko ko ha tokotaha kumi hūfanga mo e ʻauhē holo ʻi he māmaní.

Pea pehē ʻe Keini ki he ʻEikí: Naʻe ʻahiʻahiʻi au ʻe Sētane koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi tākanga monumanu ʻa hoku tokouá. Pea naʻá ku ʻita foki; he naʻá ke tali ʻene feilaulaú kae ʻikai ko ʻeku feilaulaú; ʻoku lahi hake ʻa hoku tauteá ʻi he meʻa ʻoku ou malava ke kātakiʻí.

Vakai kuó ke kapusi au he ʻahó ni mei he fofonga ʻo e ʻEikí, pea ʻe fufuuʻi au mei ho fofongá; pea te u hoko ko ha tokotaha kumi hūfanga mo e ʻauhē ʻi he māmaní; pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko ia te ne ʻiloʻi aú te ne tāmateʻi au, koeʻuhi ko ʻeku ngaahi angahalá, he ʻoku ʻikai ke puli ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki he ʻEikí.

Pea ko au ko e ʻEikí naʻá ku pehē ange kiate ia: ʻIlonga ia ʻe tāmateʻi koé, ʻe sāuni kiate ia ʻo liunga fitu. Pea ko au ko e ʻEikí naʻá ku ʻai ha fakaʻilonga kia Keini, telia naʻa ʻilo ia ʻe ha taha peá ne tāmateʻi ia.
Pea naʻe tāpuniʻi ʻa Keini mei he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, pea naʻá ne nofo fakataha mo hono uaifí mo hono kāinga tokolahi ʻi he fonua ko Notí, ʻi he hahake ʻo ʻĪtení.

Pea naʻe ʻilo ʻe Keini ʻa hono uaifí, pea naʻá ne tuʻituʻia pea fanauʻi ʻa ʻĪnoke, pea naʻá ne fakatupu foki ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine tokolahi. Pea naʻá ne langa ha kolo, pea naʻá ne ui ʻa e koló ki he hingoa ʻo hono fohá, ko ʻĪnoke.

Pea naʻe fanauʻi kia ʻĪnoke ʻa ʻĪlati, mo e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine kehe. Pea fakatupu ʻe ʻĪlati ʻa Mihuseale, mo e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine kehe. Pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe Mihuseale ʻa Metuseʻeli mo e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine kehe. Pea fakatupu ʻe Metuseʻeli ʻa Lēmeki.
Pea naʻe maʻu ʻe Lēmeki ʻa e uaifi ʻe toko ua, ko e hingoa ʻo e tokotahá ko ʻEita, pea ko e hingoa ʻo e tokotahá, ko Sila.

Pea naʻe fanauʻi ʻe ʻEita ʻa Sepale; ko e tamai ia ʻanautolu ʻoku nau nofo ʻi he ngaahi fale fehikitakí pea ko e kau tauhi ʻa kinautolu ʻo e fanga pulú mo hono faʻahingá; pea ko e hingoa ʻo hono tokouá ko Siupale, ʻa ia ko e tamai ʻanautolu kotoa pē ʻoku nau faiva ʻaki ʻa e haʻapé mo e meʻaleá.
Pea fanauʻi foki ʻe Sila ʻa Tupale Keini, ko e faiako ʻo e tufunga kotoa pē ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻi he palasa mo e ukamea. Pea naʻe ui ʻa e hingoa ʻo e tuofefine ʻo Tupale Keiní ko Neamā.

Pea naʻe pehē ʻe Lēmeki ki hono ongo uaifi ko ʻEita mo Silá: Fanongo ki hoku leʻó, ʻa kimoua ʻa e ongo uaifi ʻo Lēmekí, tokanga ki heʻeku leá; he kuó u tāmateʻi ha tangata ʻo u lavea ai, pea mo ha talavou ʻo u lavea mamahi ai.
Kapau ʻe sauni kia Keini ʻo liunga fitu, ko e moʻoni ʻe liunga fitungofulu ia lau ʻe fitu kia Lēmeki;

He kuo fai ʻe Lēmeki ʻa e fuakava mo Sētane, ʻo hangē ko e founga ʻa Keiní, ʻa ia naʻá ne hoko ai ko e Pule ko Meihani, ko e pule ki he fuʻu meʻa lilo ʻa ia naʻe fakahā ʻe Sētane kia Keiní; pea ʻi he ʻiloʻi ʻe ʻĪlati, ko e foha ʻo ʻĪnoké, ʻenau meʻa liló, naʻá ne kamata ke fakahā ia ki he ngaahi foha ʻo ʻĀtamá;
Ko ia, ko e meʻa ʻi he ʻita ʻa Lēmekí, naʻá ne tāmateʻi ia, ʻo ʻikai tatau mo e tāmateʻi ʻe Keini ʻa hono tokoua ko ʻĒpelí, koeʻuhi ke maʻu ʻa e koloá, ka naʻá ne tāmateʻi iá koeʻuhi ko e fuakavá.
He naʻe, talu mei he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo Keiní, naʻe ʻi ai ha kautaha fufū, pea naʻe fai ʻi he fakapoʻulí ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāué, pea nau feʻilongaki ʻa e tangata kotoa pē mo hono tokouá.

Ko ia naʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa Lēmeki, mo hono falé, pea mo kinautolu kotoa pē kuo fuakava mo Sētané; he naʻe ʻikai te nau tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa e ʻOtuá, pea naʻe fakatupu houhau ia ki he ʻOtuá, pea naʻe ʻikai te ne tauhi mai ʻa kinautolu, pea ko ʻenau ngaahi ngāué ko e ngaahi anga-fakalielia, pea naʻe kamata ke mafola atu ia ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi foha ʻo e tangatá. Pea naʻe ʻi he lotolotonga ia ʻo e ngaahi foha ʻo e tangatá.

Pea naʻe ʻikai lea ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo e tangatá, koeʻuhí he kuo lea ʻaki ʻe Lēmeki ʻa e meʻa liló ki hono ongo uaifí, pea naʻá na angatuʻu kiate ia, mo fakahā holo ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, pea naʻe ʻikai te na angaʻofa;
Ko ia, naʻe fehiʻanekina ʻa Lēmeki, pea naʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa, ʻo ʻikai toe haʻu ki he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi foha ʻo e tangatá, telia naʻá ne mate ai.
Pea naʻe pehē ʻa e kamata ke mālohi ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ʻo e fakapoʻulí ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi foha kotoa pē ʻo e tangatá.
Pea naʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní ʻaki ʻa e malaʻia fakamamahi, pea naʻá ne houhau ki he kau fai angahalá, mo e ngaahi foha kotoa pē ʻo e tangatá ʻa ia naʻá ne fakatupú;

He naʻe ʻikai te nau fie tokanga ki hono leʻó, pe tui ki hono ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻio ʻa ia naʻá ne fakahā ʻe hāʻele mai ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí, ʻa ia naʻe teuteuʻi ki muʻa ʻi hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní.

Pea ko ia naʻe pehē hono kamata ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e Ongoongoleleí, talu mei he kamataʻangá, pea fakahā ia ʻe he kau ʻāngelo māʻoniʻoni naʻe fekauʻi atu mei he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea ʻi hono leʻo ʻoʻoná, pea ʻi he meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.

Pea naʻe pehē hono fakapapauʻi kia ʻĀtama ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻaki ʻa e ouau toputapu, pea naʻe malanga ʻaki ʻa e Ongoongoleleí, pea naʻe ʻoatu ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni ke ʻi he māmaní ia, kae ʻoua ke aʻu ki ngataʻangá; pea naʻe pehē ia. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/6.title: Mōsese 6
chapter_summary: ʻOku tauhi ʻe he hako ʻo ʻĀtamá ha tohi ʻo e manatú—ʻOku malanga ʻaki ʻe hono hako māʻoniʻoní ʻa e fakatomalá—ʻOku fakahā mai ʻe he ʻOtuá ia kia ʻĪnoke— ʻOku malanga ʻaki ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻa e ongoongoleleí—Naʻe fakahā mai kia ʻĀtama ʻa e palani ʻo e fakamoʻuí—ʻOkú ne tali ʻa e papitaisó mo e lakanga fakataulaʻeikí.
subtitle: (Nōvema–Tīsema 1830)

verses.text: Pea naʻe tokanga ʻa ʻĀtama ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻo ne ui ki hono ngaahi fohá ke nau fakatomala.

Pea naʻe toe ʻilo ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa hono uaifí, peá ne fanauʻi ha tama, pea naʻá ne ui hono hingoá ko Seti. Pea naʻe fakalāngilangiʻi ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻOtuá; he naʻá ne pehē: Kuo foaki mai ʻe he ʻOtuá kiate au ha hako ʻe taha, ko e fetongi ʻo ʻĒpeli, ʻa ia naʻe tāmateʻi ʻe Keiní.

Pea naʻe fakahā mai ʻe he ʻOtuá ia kia Seti, pea naʻe ʻikai te ne angatuʻu, ka naʻá ne fai ha feilaulau lelei, ʻo hangē ko hono tokoua ko ʻĒpelí. Pea naʻe fanauʻi foki kiate ia ha foha, peá ne ui hono hingoá ko ʻĪnosi.
Pea kamata leva ʻe he kau tangatá ni ke ui ki he huafa ʻo e ʻEikí, pea naʻe tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he ʻEikí;
Pea naʻe tauhi ha tohi ʻo e manatú, ʻa ia naʻe tohi ai, ʻi he lea ʻa ʻĀtamá, he naʻe tuku kiate kinautolu kotoa pē naʻe ui ki he ʻOtuá ke nau tohi ʻi he laumālie ʻo e mālohi fakalangí;
Pea naʻe akonekina ʻe kinautolu ʻa ʻenau fānaú ke lau tohi mo fai tohi, ʻo nau maʻu ʻa e lea ʻa ia naʻe haohaoa pea teʻeki ʻuliʻi.
Ko ʻeni ko e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeiki pē ko iá, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he kamataʻangá, ʻe ʻi he ngataʻanga ia ʻo e māmaní foki.

Ko ʻeni naʻe lea ʻaki ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e kikité ni, ʻi hono ueʻi ia ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, pea naʻe tauhi ha tohi hohoko ʻo e fānau ʻa e ʻOtuá. Pea ko e tohi ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi toʻu tangata ʻo ʻĀtamá, ʻa ia naʻe pehē: ʻI he ʻaho naʻe fakatupu ai ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e tangatá, naʻá ne ngaohi ia ʻi he tatau ʻa e ʻOtuá;

Naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa kinaua, ʻa e tangata mo e fefine, ʻi he tatau ʻo hono sino ʻoʻoná, mo ne tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinaua mo ui hona hingoa ko ʻĀtama, ʻi he ʻaho naʻe fakatupu ai ʻa kinauá ʻo na hoko ko e ongo laumālie moʻui, ʻi he fonuá ʻi he funga tuʻunga vaʻe ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa ʻĀtama ʻo feʻunga mo e taʻu ʻe teau tolungofulu peá ne fakatupu ʻa e foha ʻi hono tatau ʻoʻoná, ʻo fakatatau ki hono fōtunga ʻoʻoná, ʻo ne ui hono hingoá ko Seti.
Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho ʻo ʻĀtamá, hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Setí, ko e taʻu ʻe valungeau, pea naʻa ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine tokolahi;
Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa naʻe moʻui ai ʻa ʻĀtamá ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau tolungofulu, peá ne pekia.

Naʻe moʻui ʻa Seti ʻi he taʻu ʻe teau mā nima, pea naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa ʻĪnosi, peá ne kikite ʻi hono ngaahi ʻahó kotoa pē, mo akoʻi ʻa hono foha ko ʻĪnosí ʻi he ngaahi hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá; ko ia naʻe kikite foki mo ʻĪnosi.
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Seti ʻo feʻunga mo e taʻu ʻe valungeau mā fitu ʻi he hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa ʻĪnosí, ʻo ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine tokolahi.

Pea naʻe tokolahi ʻa e fānau ʻa e tangatá ʻi hono kotoa ʻo e funga fonuá. Pea ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iá naʻe lahi ʻa e mālohi ʻo Sētané ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá, ʻo ne fakatupu-lili ʻi honau lotó; pea naʻe tupu ʻo fai atu mei ai ʻa e ngaahi tau mo e lilingi toto; pea naʻe hiki hake ʻe he tangatá ʻa hono nimá ki hono tokoua ʻoʻoná, ʻi hono fakatupu ʻo e maté, koeʻuhí ko e ngaahi ngāue fufū, ʻi he feinga ke maʻu ʻa e mālohi.
Ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa pē ʻo Setí ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau hongofulu mā ua, peá ne pekia.

Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa ʻĪnosi ʻi he taʻu ʻe hivangofulu peá ne fakatupu ʻa Kainani. Pea naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa ʻĪnosi mo e toenga ʻo e kakai ʻo e ʻOtuá mei he fonuá, ʻa ia naʻe ui ko Sūloní, ʻo nau nofo ʻi ha fonua ʻo e talaʻofá, ʻa ia naʻá ne fakahingoa ki he hingoa ʻo hono foha ʻoʻoná, ʻa ia naʻá ne fakahingoa ko Kainani.

Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa ʻĪnosi, ʻi he hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Kainaní, ʻi he taʻu ʻe valungeau hongofulu mā nima, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine tokolahi. Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo ʻĪnosí ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau mā nima, peá ne pekia.

Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Kainani ʻi he taʻu ʻe fitungofulu, peá ne fakatupu ʻa Malelili; pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Kainani ʻi he hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Malelilí ʻi he taʻu ʻe valungeau mā fāngofulu, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine. Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo Kainaní ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau mā hongofulu, peá ne pekia.

Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Malelili ʻi he taʻu ʻe onongofulu mā nima, peá ne fakatupu ʻa Sēleti, pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Malelili, ʻi he hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Sēletí, ʻi he taʻu ʻe valungeau mā tolungofulu, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine. Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo Malelilí ko e taʻu ʻe valungeau hivangofulu mā nima, peá ne pekia.

Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Sēleti ʻi he taʻu ʻe teau onongofulu mā ua, peá ne fakatupu ʻa ʻĪnoke; pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Sēleti, ʻi he hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa ʻĪnoké, ʻi he taʻu ʻe valungeau, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine. Pea naʻe akoʻi ʻe Sēleti ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻi he ngaahi hala kotoa pē ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ko e tohi hohoko ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi foha ʻo ʻĀtamá, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻa ia naʻe fefolofolai totonu pē ʻa e ʻOtuá, mo ia.
Pea ko e kau malanga ʻa kinautolu ʻo e māʻoniʻoní, pea naʻa nau lea mo kikite, mo ui ki he kakai kotoa pē, ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē, ke nau fakatomala; pea naʻe akoʻi ʻa e tuí ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa pē ʻo Sēletí ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau onongofulu mā ua, peá ne pekia.
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻi he taʻu ʻe onongofulu mā nima, peá ne fakatupu ʻa Mētusela.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fononga holo ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻi he fonuá, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakaí; pea lolotonga ʻene fonongá, naʻe maliu hifo ʻa e Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá mei he langí, ʻo nofoʻia ʻiate ia.

Pea naʻá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo mei he langí, ʻoku pehē mai: ʻE ʻĪnoke, ko hoku foha, kikite ki he kakaí ni, ʻo pehē kiate kinautolu—Mou fakatomala, he ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí: ʻOku ou ʻita ki he kakaí ni, pea kuo tupu ʻeku ʻita kakahá kiate kinautolu; he kuo fakaʻau ʻo fefeka ʻa honau lotó, pea ʻoku ongongataʻa ʻa honau telingá, pea ʻoku ʻikai lava ke sio ʻa honau matá ke mamaʻo;

Pea ko e ngaahi toʻu tangata lahi ko ʻení, talu mei heʻeku fakatupu ʻa kinautolú, kuo nau hē, pea kuo nau fakaʻikaiʻi au, pea nau fekumi ki heʻenau ngaahi fakakaukau ʻanautolu pē ʻi he fakapoʻulí; pea kuo nau filioʻi ʻi heʻenau ngaahi anga-fakalieliá ke fakapō, pea kuo ʻikai te nau tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau, ʻa ia naʻá ku tuku ki heʻenau tamai, ko ʻĀtamá.
Ko ia, kuo nau fuakava loi, pea ʻi heʻenau ngaahi fuakavá, kuo nau fakahoko mai ai kiate kinautolu ʻa e maté, pea kuó u teuteu ha heli moʻonautolu, ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau fakatomala;

Pea ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻeni, ʻa ia kuó u ʻoatu ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, mei hoku ngutu ʻoʻokú, talu mei he fokotuʻu hono tuʻunga ʻo iá, pea ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí, ʻa ia ko hoʻo ngaahi tamaí, kuó u tuʻutuʻuniʻi ia, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe fekauʻi atu ʻi he māmaní, ʻo aʻu ki hono ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo iá.

Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he ngaahi folofola ko ʻení, naʻá ne punou hifo ia ki he kelekelé, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻo ne fakatau folofola ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: Ko e hā kuó u ʻilo ai ʻa e ʻofa ʻi ho ʻaó, ka ko ha tamasiʻi pē au, pea ʻoku fehiʻa ʻa e kakaí kotoa pē ʻiate au; he ʻoku tōʻohi ʻeku leá; ko ia ko hoʻo tamaioʻeiki koā au?

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: ʻAlu atu ʻo fai ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekau kiate koé, pea ʻe ʻikai lava ʻe ha tangata ʻo fakalaveaʻi koe. Fakaava ho ngutú, pea ʻe fakafonu ia, pea te u foaki kiate koe ʻa ia ke ke leaʻakí, he ʻoku ʻi hoku nimá ʻa e kakano kotoa pē, pea te u fai ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate aú.
Lea ki he kakaí ni ʻo pehē: Mou fili he ʻahó ni, ke tauhi ki he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtua ʻa ia naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa kimoutolú.

Vakai ʻoku ʻiate koe ʻa hoku Laumālié, ko ia te u fakatonuhiaʻi ʻa hoʻo ngaahi lea kotoa pē; pea ʻe hola ʻa e ngaahi moʻungá ʻi ho ʻaó, pea ʻe afe ʻa e ngaahi vaitafé mei honau tafeʻangá; pea te ke nofo ʻiate au, pea mo au ʻiate koe; ko ia ke ke ʻaʻeva mo au.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke, ʻo pehē kiate ia: Pani ho matá ʻaki ʻa e ʻumea, pea fufulu ia, pea te ke mamata. Pea naʻá ne fai ia.

Pea naʻá ne mamata ki he ngaahi laumālie naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ʻOtuá; pea naʻá ne mamata foki ki he ngaahi meʻa naʻe ʻikai ke faʻa hā mai ki he mata fakanatulá; pea kamata mei ai mo e mafola atu ʻa e lea ʻi he fonuá ʻo pehē: Kuo fokotuʻu hake ʻe he ʻEikí ha tangata kikite ki hono kakaí.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻi he fonuá, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakaí, ʻo tuʻu ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi tafungofungá mo e ngaahi potu māʻolungá, ʻo ne kaila ʻaki ʻa e leʻo-lahi, ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi hono kovi ʻo ʻenau ngaahi ngāué; pea naʻe ʻita ʻa e kakaí kotoa pē koeʻuhi ko ia.

Pea naʻa nau ō mai ke fanongo kiate ia, ʻi he ngaahi potu māʻolungá, ʻo nau pehē ki he kau tauhi fale fehikitakí: Mou tatali ʻi heni ʻo tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fale fehikitakí, lolotonga ʻemau ʻalu ki hē ke vakai ki he tangata kikité, he ʻokú ne kikite, pea ʻoku ʻi ai ha meʻa ngali kehe ʻi he fonuá; kuo haʻu ha tangata hehengi ki hotau lotolotongá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi heʻenau fanongo kiate iá, naʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha tangata ʻe ala kiate ia; he naʻe hoko mai ʻa e manavahē kiate kinautolu kotoa pē naʻe fanongo kiate iá; he naʻá ne ʻaʻeva mo e ʻOtuá.
Pea naʻe haʻu ha tangata kiate ia, ʻa ia ko hono hingoá ko Mahisia, ʻo ne pehē ange kiate ia: Fakahā mahino mai kiate kimautolu pe ko hai koe, pea ko hoʻo haʻú mei fē?

Pea naʻá ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu: Naʻá ku haʻu mei he fonua ko Kainaní, ʻa e fonua ʻo ʻeku ngaahi tamaí, ko ha fonua ʻo e māʻoniʻoni ʻo aʻu mai ki he ʻahó ni. Pea naʻe akoʻi au ʻe heʻeku tamaí ʻi he ngaahi hala kotoa pē ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻi he lolotonga ʻeku fononga mei he fonua ko Kainaní, ofi ki he tahi hahaké, naʻá ku mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-mai; pea ʻiloange, naʻá ku mamata ki he ngaahi langí, pea folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au, ʻo ne fai kiate au ʻa e fekau; ko ia, koeʻuhí ko e meʻá ni, pea ke u fai ki he fekau ko iá, ʻoku ou lea ʻaki atu ai ʻa e ngaahi lea ko ʻení.

Pea hoko atu ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻa ʻene leá, ʻo pehē: Ko e ʻEiki ʻa ia naʻe folofola mai kiate aú, ko e ʻOtua tonu pē ia ʻo e langí, pea ko hoku ʻOtuá ia, pea mo homou ʻOtuá, pea ko hoku kāinga ʻa kimoutolu, pea ko e hā ʻoku mou fealēleaʻaki ai ʻa kimoutolu, ʻo fakafisingaʻi ʻa e ʻOtua ʻo e langí?
Naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi langí; ko e māmaní ʻa hono tuʻunga vaʻé; pea ʻoku ʻaʻana ʻa hono tuʻunga ʻo iá. Vakai, naʻá ne fokotuʻu ia, pea kuó ne ʻomi ʻa e kakai tokolahi ki hono funga ʻo iá.

Pea kuo hoko mai ʻa e maté ki heʻetau ngaahi tamaí; ka neongo iá ʻoku tau ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu, pea ʻikai lava ke fakaʻikaiʻi ia, pea naʻa mo e ʻuluaki ʻo e kakai kotoa pē ʻoku tau ʻiloʻi ia, ʻa ia ko ʻĀtama.
He kuo tau tohi ha tohi ʻo e manatu ʻiate kitautolu, ʻo fakatatau ki he sīpinga naʻe ʻomai ʻe he toʻukupu ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea ʻoku fai ia ʻi heʻetau lea ʻatautolú.
Pea ʻi he lea ʻaki atu ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻa e ngaahi folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá, naʻe tetetete ʻa e kakaí, ʻo ʻikai te nau faʻa lava ke tuʻu ʻi hono ʻaó.

Pea naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu: Koeʻuhi ko e hinga ʻa ʻĀtamá, ko ia ʻoku tau ʻi ai aí; pea ʻi heʻene hingá naʻe hoko mai ai ʻa e maté; pea kuo ngaohi ʻa kitautolu ke kau ʻi he maʻu ʻo e mamahí mo e malaʻiá.

Vakai kuo haʻu ʻa Sētane ki he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá, ʻo ne ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa kinautolu ke nau hū kiate ia; pea kuo hoko ʻa e tangatá ʻo anga-fakakakano, pea faʻa holi kovi, mo anga-fakatēvolo, pea kuo tāpuniʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi tuʻa mei he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Ka kuo fakahā ʻe he ʻOtuá ki heʻetau ngaahi tamaí kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.
Pea naʻá ne ui ki heʻetau tamai ko ʻĀtamá ʻaki hono leʻo ʻoʻoná, ʻo pehē: Ko e ʻOtuá au; naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa e māmaní, mo e tangatá ʻi he teʻeki ai ke nau ʻi he kakanó.

Pea naʻá ne toe pehē foki kiate ia: Kapau te ke tafoki mai kiate au, pea tokanga ki hoku leʻó, pea tui, mo fakatomala mei hoʻo ngaahi maumau-fono kotoa pē, pea papitaiso, ʻio ʻi he vaí, ʻi he huafa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofa mo e moʻoní, ʻa ia ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e huafa pē taha ʻe foaki ʻi he lalo langí, ʻa ia ʻe lava ʻo hoko mai ai ʻa e fakamoʻuí ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá, te ke maʻu ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻo kole ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi hono huafá, pea ʻilonga ha meʻa te ke kole, ʻe foaki ia kiate koe.

Pea naʻe fakatau folofola ʻa ʻetau tamai ko ʻĀtamá ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: Ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga kuo pau ke fakatomala ai ʻa e tangatá pea papitaiso ʻi he vaí? Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĀtama: Vakai, kuó u fakamolemoleʻi kiate koe ʻa hoʻo maumau-fono ʻi he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení.

Naʻe tupunga mei ai ʻene mafola holo ʻi he kakaí ʻa e lea ʻo pehē, kuo fai ʻa e fakalelei ʻe he ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá ki he ʻuluaki angahalá, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai lava ke ʻekeʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi angahala ʻa e mātuʻá ki he ʻulu ʻo e fānaú, he kuo ʻikai haʻanau angahala talu mei hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĀtama, ʻo pehē: Ko e meʻa ʻi he fanauʻi mai hoʻo fānaú ʻi he angahalá, ko ia ʻi heʻenau kamata ke tupu haké, ʻoku tupu hake ʻa e angahalá ʻi honau lotó, pea nau ʻiloʻi ai ʻa e meʻa mahí, koeʻuhí ke nau ʻiloʻi hono fakamahuʻingaʻi ʻa e leleí.
Pea kuo tuku kiate kinautolu ke nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e leleí mei he koví, ko ia ʻoku nau hoko ai ko e niʻihi ke fili maʻanautolu pē, pea kuó u tuku kiate koe ha fono mo e fekau ʻe taha.

Ko ia, akoʻi ia ki hoʻo fānaú, kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē, pe ʻe ʻikai te nau teitei lava ʻo maʻu ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá, he ʻoku ʻikai lava ke nofo ʻi ai ha meʻa ʻoku taʻemaʻa, pe nofo ʻi hono ʻaó; he ʻoku hangē ko e lea ʻa ʻĀtamá, ko e Tangata ʻo e Māʻoniʻoní ʻa hono huafá, pea ko e huafa ʻo hono ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú ko e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ha Fakamaau māʻoniʻoni, ʻa ia ʻe haʻu ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fai kiate koe ha fekau, ke ke akoʻi tauʻatāina ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki hoʻo fānaú, ʻo pehē:

Kuo hoko mai ʻa e hingá ko e tupu mei he maumau-fonó, ʻa ia ko e hinga ʻokú ne ʻomi ʻa e maté, pea ko e meʻa ʻi hono fanauʻi mai ʻa kimoutolu ki he māmaní ʻi he vai, mo e toto, pea mo e laumālie, ʻa ia kuó u fakatupú, pea pehē ʻa e tupu mei he efú ha laumālie moʻuí, ʻe pehē pē ʻa e pau ke toe fanauʻi ʻa kimoutolu ki he puleʻanga ʻo e langí, ʻi he vai, pea mo e Laumālié, pea fakamaʻa ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he totó, ʻa ia ko e taʻataʻa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; koeʻuhí ke fakamaʻa ʻa kimoutolu mei he angahala kotoa pē, pea fiefia ʻi he ngaahi folofola ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá ʻi he māmani ko ʻení, mo e moʻui taʻengata ʻi he maama ka hoko maí, ʻio ʻa e nāunau taʻe-faʻa-maté;
He ʻoku mou tauhi ʻa e fekaú ʻi he vaí; ʻoku fakatonuhiaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he Laumālié, pea ʻoku fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he taʻataʻá;

Ko ia ʻoku foaki ia ke nofoʻia ʻiate kimoutolu; ʻa e tohi ʻo e langí; ʻa e Fakafiemālié; ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakamelino ʻo e nāunau taʻe-faʻa-maté; ʻa e moʻoni ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; ʻa e meʻa ʻa ia ʻoku fakaakeʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻa ia ʻoku ngaohi ke moʻui ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; ko ia ia ʻokú ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻoku maʻu ʻe ia ʻa e mālohi kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki he potó, ʻaloʻofá, moʻoní, fakamaau totonú, mo e fakamāú.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe: Ko e palani ʻeni ʻo e fakamoʻuí ki he kakai kotoa pē, tuʻunga ʻi he taʻataʻa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻa ia ʻe hāʻele mai ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí.

Pea vakai, ʻoku ʻi ai hono tatau ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea kuo fakatupu mo ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ke fakamoʻoniʻi au, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku fakamāmani, mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku fakalaumālie fakatouʻosi; ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi he langí ʻi ʻolunga, mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi loto ʻi he māmaní, mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi he lalo fonuá, pea ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻi ʻolunga pea ʻi laló fakatouʻosi: ʻoku nau fakamoʻoniʻi kotoa pē au.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻi he hili ʻa e fefolofolai ʻa e ʻEikí mo ʻĀtama, ko ʻetau tamaí, naʻe kaila ʻa ʻĀtama ki he ʻEikí, pea naʻe ʻave ia ʻe he Laumālie ʻo e ʻEikí, pea ʻohifo ia ki he loto vaí, pea naʻe fakatokoto hifo ia ʻi he loto vaí, pea naʻe ʻohake ia mei he vaí.
Pea ko ia naʻe papitaiso ia, pea naʻe maliu hifo ʻa e Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá kiate ia, pea ko ia naʻe fanauʻi ia ʻi he Laumālié, pea naʻe fakaakeakeʻi ia ʻi he tangata ʻi lotó.

Pea naʻá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo mei he langí, ʻoku pehē: Kuo papitaiso koe ʻaki ʻa e afi, pea mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni. Ko e fakamoʻoni ʻeni ʻa e Tamaí, pea mo e ʻAló, ʻo fai atu mei heni pea taʻengata;
Pea ʻokú ke kau ki he lakanga ʻo ia naʻe ʻikai hano kamataʻanga ʻo hono ngaahi ʻahó pe ngataʻanga ʻo hono ngaahi taʻú, mei he taʻengatá kotoa ki he taʻengatá hono kotoa.
Vakai, ʻokú ke taha ʻiate au, ko ha foha ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea ʻe pehē ha lava ke hoko ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ko hoku ngaahi foha. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/7.title: Mōsese 7
chapter_summary: ʻOku akoʻi ʻe ʻĪnoke, mo tataki ʻa e kakaí, pea hiki atu ʻa e ngaahi moʻunga—ʻOku fokotuʻu ʻa e kolo ko Saioné—ʻOku tomuʻa mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ko ʻene feilaulau fakaleleí, mo e toetuʻu ʻa e Kau Māʻoniʻoní—ʻOkú ne tomuʻa mamata ki he Fakafoki mai ʻo e Ongongoleleí, ko e Tānakí, ko e Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá, mo e fakafoki mai ʻo Saioné.
subtitle: (Tīsema 1830)

verses.text: Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai atu ʻa e lea ʻa ʻĪnoké, ʻo pehē: Vakai, naʻe akonaki ʻaki ʻe heʻetau tamai ko ʻĀtamá ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, pea kuo tui ʻa e tokolahi ʻo nau hoko ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea kuo taʻetui ʻa e tokolahi, ʻo nau malaʻia ʻi heʻenau ngaahi angahalá, pea ʻoku nau ʻamanaki atu ʻi he manavahē, ʻi he fakamamahi, ki hono lilingi hifo kiate kinautolu ʻo e tuputāmaki kakaha ʻo e houhau ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻe kamata mei he taimi ko iá ʻo fai atu ʻa e kamata ʻe ʻĪnoke ke kikite, ʻo ne pehē ki he kakaí: Lolotonga ʻeku fai fonongá, peá u tuʻu ʻi he potu ko Mahusiá, peá u tangi ki he ʻEikí, naʻe ongo mai ha leʻo mei he langí, ʻo pehē—Ke ke tafoki atu, pea ʻalu atu ki he funga ʻo e moʻunga ko Simioné.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻá ku tafoki peá u ʻalu hake ki he funga moʻungá; pea ʻi heʻeku tuʻu ʻi he funga moʻungá, naʻá ku vakai ki he matangaki ʻa e ngaahi langí, pea naʻe fakakofuʻi au ʻaki ʻa e nāunau;

Peá u mamata ki he ʻEikí; pea naʻá ne tuʻu ʻi muʻa ʻiate au, pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au, ʻo hangē ko e fetalanoaʻaki ʻa ha tangata mo ha tangata ʻe taha, ko e mata ki he mata; peá ne folofola mai kiate au: Vakai, pea te u fakahā kiate koe ʻa e māmaní ʻo feʻunga mo e ngaahi toʻu tangata lahi.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻá ku mamata ʻi he teleʻa ko Siumú, pea ʻiloange, ko ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi ʻa ia naʻe nofo ʻi he ngaahi fale fehikitaki, ʻa ia ko e kakai ʻo Siumú.
Pea naʻe toe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Vakai; pea naʻá ku mamata ki he feituʻu tokelaú, pea naʻá ku mamata ki he kakai ʻo Kēnaní, ʻa ia naʻe nofo ʻi he ngaahi fale fehikitaki.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Kikite; peá u kikite, ʻo pehē: Vakai, ʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e kakai ʻo Kēnaní, ʻa ia ʻoku fuʻu tokolahi, kuo nau teuteu ke tauʻi ʻa e kakai ʻo Siumú, pea te nau tāmateʻi ʻa kinautolu pea nau ʻauha ai ʻo ʻosiʻosingamālie; pea ʻe vahevahe ʻa e kakai ʻo Kēnaní ʻi he fonuá, pea ʻe kakā ʻa e kelekelé mo taʻefua, pea ʻe ʻikai nofo ai ha kakai kehe ka ko e kakai pē ʻo Kēnaní;

He vakai, ʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e fonuá ʻaki ʻa e fuʻu vela lahi, pea ʻe hokohoko atu ai pē ʻa ʻene kakaá ʻo taʻengata; pea naʻe hoko ʻa e lanu ʻuliʻuli ki he fānau kotoa pē ʻo Kēnaní, pea naʻe fehiʻanekinaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he kakai kotoa pē.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Vakai; peá u sio atu, peá u mamata ki he fonua ko Seiloní mo e fonua ko ʻĪnoké, pea mo e fonua ko ʻOmineá, pea mo e fonua ko Hení, pea mo e fonua ko Semí, pea mo e fonua ko Hanelá, pea mo e fonua ko Hananaihaá, pea mo e kakai kotoa pē ʻi aí;
Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: ʻAlu ki he kakaí ni ʻo pehē atu kiate kinautolu—Mou fakatomala, telia naʻá ku ʻalu atu ʻo taaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e malaʻia, pea nau mate.

Pea naʻá ne fai mai kiate au ʻa e fekau ke u fai papitaiso ʻi he huafa ʻo e Tamaí, pea mo e ʻAló, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofa mo e moʻoni, pea mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻokú ne fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e Tamaí mo e ʻAló.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai atu ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻene ui ki he kakai kotoa pē, ke nau fakatomala, tuku kehe pē ʻa e kakai ʻo Kēnaní;

Pea naʻe lahi fau ʻa e tui ʻa ʻĪnoké ko ia naʻá ne tataki ʻa e kakai ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻe ō mai ʻa honau ngaahi filí ke tauʻi ʻa kinautolu; pea naʻá ne lea ʻaki ʻa e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí, pea naʻe ngalulu ʻa e fonuá, pea naʻe hola ʻa e ngaahi moʻungá, ʻo hangē pē ko ʻene fekaú; pea naʻe liliu ʻa e ngaahi vaitafé mei honau ngaahi tafeʻangá; pea naʻe ongona ʻa e ngungulu ʻa e fanga laione mei he feituʻu maomaonganoá; pea manavahē lahi ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, ko e meʻa ʻi he lahi pehē fau hono mālohi ʻo e lea ʻa ʻĪnoké, pea mo e lahi fau ʻo e mālohi ʻo e lea naʻe tuku kiate ia ʻe he ʻOtuá.

Naʻe ʻalu hake foki ha fonua mei he loto moaná, pea naʻe pehē fau ʻa e lahi ʻo e manavahē ʻa e ngaahi fili ʻo e kakai ʻo e ʻOtuá, naʻa nau hola ai ʻo tuʻu mei he mamaʻo atú ʻo nau ʻalu atu ki he fonua ʻa ia naʻe ʻalu hake mei he loto moaná.
Pea ko e kakai lalahi ʻo e fonuá foki, naʻa nau tuʻu mei he mamaʻo atú; pea naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e malaʻia ki he kakai kotoa pē naʻe tauʻi ʻa e ʻOtuá;
Pea mei he taimi ko iá ʻo fai atu naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi tau mo e lilingi toto ʻiate kinautolu; ka naʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo ʻafio ʻi hono kakaí, pea nau nofo ʻi he māʻoniʻoni.

Naʻe ʻi he ngaahi puleʻangá kotoa pē ʻa e ilifia ki he ʻEikí, koeʻuhi naʻe fuʻu lahi fau ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi hono kakaí. Pea naʻe tāpuakiʻi ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e fonuá, pea naʻa nau monūʻia ʻi he ngaahi moʻungá, pea ʻi he ngaahi potu māʻolungá, ʻo nau tupulekina.
Pea naʻe ui ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono kakaí ko Saione, koeʻuhí he naʻa nau loto-taha pē mo fakakaukau taha, pea nau nofo ʻi he māʻoniʻoni; pea naʻe ʻikai ha kakai masiva ʻiate kinautolu.

Pea naʻe fai atu ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻa ʻene malangá ʻi he māʻoniʻoni ki he kakai ʻo e ʻOtuá. Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi hono ngaahi ʻahó, naʻá ne langa ha kolo ʻa ia naʻe ui ko e Kolo ʻo e Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ko Saione.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fefolofolai ʻa ʻĪnoke mo e ʻEikí; pea naʻá ne pehē ange ki he ʻEikí: Ko e moʻoni ʻe nofo malu ʻa Saione ʻo taʻengata. Ka naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: Kuó u tāpuakiʻi ʻa Saione, ka kuó u fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa hono toe ʻo e kakaí.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fakahā ʻe he ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní; pea naʻá ne mamata, pea ʻilo ange, naʻe faifai pea ʻohake ʻa Saione ki he langí. Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: Vakai ki hoku nofoʻangá ʻo taʻengata.

Pea mamata foki ʻa ʻĪnoke ki hono toe ʻo e kakaí ʻa ia ko e ngaahi foha ʻo ʻĀtamá; pea ko e fefiofi ʻa kinautolu ʻo e hako kotoa pē ʻo ʻĀtamá tuku kehe pē ʻa e hako ʻo Keiní, he naʻe ʻuliʻuli ʻa e hako ʻo Keiní, pea naʻe ʻikai hanau nofoʻanga ʻi honau lotolotongá.
Pea hili iá naʻe ʻohake ʻa Saione ki he langí, naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke, pea ʻiloange, naʻe ʻi muʻa ʻiate ia ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní;

Pea naʻe haʻu ʻa e toʻu tangata hoko mo e toʻu tangata; pea naʻe māʻolunga mo hiki hake ʻa ʻĪnoke, ʻio ʻi he fatafata ʻo e Tamaí, pea mo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá; pea vakai, naʻe ʻi he funga hono kotoa ʻo e māmaní ʻa e mālohi ʻo Sētané.
Pea naʻá ne mamata ki he kau ʻāngelo ʻoku ʻalu hifo mei he loto langí; peá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo-lahi ʻoku pehē: Ko e malaʻia, ko e malaʻia ki he kakai ʻo e māmaní.

Pea naʻá ne mamata kia Sētane; pea naʻe ʻi hono nimá ha fuʻu sēini, pea naʻe fakapūlou ʻe ia ʻa e funga kotoa ʻo e māmaní ʻaki ʻa e fakapoʻuli; pea naʻá ne sio hake ʻo kata, pea naʻe fiefia ʻa ʻene kau ʻāngeló.

Pea naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he kau ʻāngelo ʻoku ʻalu hifo mei he langí, ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e Tamaí mo e ʻAló; pea naʻe tō hifo ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ki he tokolahi, pea naʻe toʻo hake ʻa kinautolu ʻe he ngaahi mālohi ʻo e langí ki Saione.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe ʻafio hifo ʻa e ʻOtua ʻo e langí ki hono toe ʻo e kakaí, pea naʻá ne tangi; pea naʻe fakamoʻoni ki ai ʻa ʻĪnoke, ʻo pehē: Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku tangi ai ʻa e ngaahi langí, pea mokulu hifo honau loʻimata ʻo hangē ko e ʻuha ki he ngaahi moʻungá?
Pea naʻe pehē ʻe ʻĪnoke ki he ʻEikí: Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻokú ke lava ai ke tangí, ka ʻokú ke māʻoniʻoni pea ʻokú ke ʻi ai, mei he taʻengatá kotoa ki he taʻengatá kotoa?

Pea ka ne lava ʻe he tangatá ʻo lau ʻa e ngaahi momoʻi meʻa ʻo e māmaní, ʻio, ʻo e ngaahi māmani ʻe lau miliona ʻo hangē ko ʻení, ʻe ʻikai hoko ia ko hano kamataʻanga ʻo e lahi ʻo hoʻo ngaahi fakatupú; pea ʻoku kei fofola atu ai pē ʻa ho ngaahi puipuí; ka neongo iá ka ʻokú ke ʻi hena pē, pea ʻoku ʻi hena ʻa ho fatafatá; pea ʻokú ke angatonu foki; ʻokú ke ʻaloʻofa mo angaʻofa ʻo taʻengata;

Pea kuó ke toʻo atu ʻa Saione ki ho fatafata ʻoʻoú, mei hoʻo ngaahi fakatupu kotoa pē, mei he taʻengatá kotoa ki he taʻengatá kotoa; pea ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ka ko e melinó, fakamaau totonú, mo e moʻoní pē ʻe nofo ʻi ho taloní; pea ʻe muʻomuʻa ʻa e ʻaloʻofá ʻi ho fofongá pea ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga; ʻokú ke lava fēfē ke tangi?

Naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: Vakai ki he faʻahingá ni ko ho kāingá; kuó u fakatupu ʻa kinautolu ʻaki hoku nima pē ʻoʻokú, pea naʻá ku foaki kiate kinautolu ʻa honau potó, ʻi he ʻaho naʻá ku fakatupu ai ʻa kinautolú; pea ʻi he Ngoue ʻo ʻĪtení, naʻá ku foaki ai ki he tangatá ʻa ʻene tauʻatāina ke filí;

Pea kuó u pehē ki ho kāingá, pea kuó u fai foki ʻa e fekau, ke nau feʻofaʻaki ʻiate kinautolu, pea ke nau fili au, ʻa ia ko ʻenau Tamaí; kae vakai, ʻoku ʻikai haʻanau ʻofa, pea nau fehiʻa ki honau toto ʻonautolú pē;
Pea kuo tupu ʻa e afi ʻo ʻeku ʻitá kiate kinautolu; pea ʻi heʻeku ʻita kakahá te u ʻoatu ʻa e ngaahi lōmakí kiate kinautolu, he kuo tupu ʻa ʻeku fuʻu ʻita lahi kiate kinautolu.
Vakai, ko e ʻOtuá au; ko hoku hingoá ko e Tangata ʻo e Māʻoniʻoni; ko hoku hingoá ko e Tangata ʻo e Akonaki; pea ko hoku hingoá ko Lauikuonga mo e Taʻengata, foki.

Ko ia, ʻoku ou lava ke mafao atu ʻa hoku ongo nimá ʻo puke ʻa e ngaahi fakatupu kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u faʻú; pea ʻoku lava foki ʻe hoku matá ke ʻasi ki ai, pea ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa kuo fakatupu ʻe hoku nimá, kuo teʻeki ke ʻi ai ha fai angahala lahi pehē fau ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo ho kāingá.

Kae vakai, ʻe ʻi he ʻulu ʻo ʻenau ngaahi tamaí ʻa ʻenau ngaahi angahalá; ʻe hoko ʻa Sētane ko ʻenau tamaí, pea hoko ʻa e mamahi ko honau ikuʻangá; pea ʻe tengihia ʻa kinautolu ʻe he ngaahi langí kotoa, ʻio ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo fakatupu ʻe hoku nimá; ko ia, he ʻikai koā ʻoku totonu ke tangi ʻa e ngaahi langí, ko e meʻa ʻi he mamahiʻia ʻa kinautolú ni?
Kae vakai, ko kinautolú ni ʻa ia ʻoku mamata ki ai ʻa ho matá, te nau mate ʻi he ngaahi lōmaki; pea vakai, te u fakapōpulaʻi ʻa kinautolu; kuó u teuteu ha fale fakapōpula moʻonautolu.

Pea ko ia kuó u filí kuó ne tautapa ʻi hoku ʻaó. Ko ia, te ne mamahi koeʻuhi ko ʻenau ngaahi angahalá; ka ʻo kapau te nau fakatomala ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia ʻe foki mai ai kiate au ʻa ʻeku Tokotaha kuo Filí, pea te nau ʻi he mamahi kae ʻoua kuo hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ko iá;
Ko ia, ko e meʻa ʻeni ʻe tangi ai ʻa e ngaahi langí, ʻio, pea mo e meʻa kotoa pē kuo fakatupu ʻe hoku nimá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke, ʻo fakahā kia ʻĪnoke ʻa e ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē ʻa e fānau ʻa e tangatá; ko ia naʻe ʻilo ʻe ʻĪnoke, mo ne mamata ki heʻenau fai angahalá, pea mo ʻenau mamahí, peá ne tangi mo mafao atu hono nimá, pea naʻe fakafuofuolahi ʻa hono lotó ʻo hangē ko e taʻengatá; pea naʻe fakaʻamu ʻa hono lotó; pea naʻe ngalulululu ʻa e taʻengatá kotoa.
Pea mamata foki ʻa ʻĪnoke kia Noa mo hono fāmilí; pea ʻe fakahaofi ʻa e hako ʻo e ngaahi foha kotoa ʻo Noá ʻi ha fakamoʻui fakamāmani;

Ko ia naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻoku foʻu ʻe Noa ha ʻaʻake; pea naʻe malimali ki ai ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻo puke ia ʻi hono toʻukupu ʻoʻoná; ka naʻe tō mai ʻa e ngaahi lōmaki ki he toenga ʻo e kau fai angahalá ʻo folo hake ʻa kinautolu.

Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he meʻa ní, naʻe mamahi ʻa hono laumālié, peá ne tangi koeʻuhi ko hono kāingá, ʻo ne pehē ki he ngaahi langí: ʻE ʻikai te u tuku ke fakafiemālieʻi au; ka naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo pehē ange kia ʻĪnoke: Hanga hake ho lotó, peá ke fiefia, ʻo mamata.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe vakai atu ʻa ʻĪnoke; peá ne vakai ki he tupu meia Noa ʻa e ngaahi fāmili kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní; peá ne tangi ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: ʻE hoko ʻa fē ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e ʻEikí? ʻE lilingi ʻa fē ʻa e taʻataʻa ʻo e Tokotaha Māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhi ke lava ʻo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku tangí pea nau maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá?
Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí: ʻE hoko ia ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo e fai angahala mo e tautea.

Pea vakai, naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he ʻaho ʻo e ʻaloʻi mai ʻo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ʻio ʻi he kakanó; pea naʻe fiefia ʻa hono laumālié, ʻo ne pehē: Kuo hiki hake ʻa e Tokotaha Māʻoniʻoní, pea kuo tāmateʻi ʻa e Lamí talu mei hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní; pea ʻoku ou ʻi he fatafata ʻo e Tamaí tuʻunga ʻi he tuí, pea vakai, ʻoku ʻiate au ʻa Saione.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he māmaní; pea naʻá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo mei he loto fonuá, ʻoku pehē: Ko e malaʻia, ko e malaʻia ka ko au, ko e faʻē ʻa e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá; ʻoku ou mamahiʻia, ʻoku ou vaivai koeʻuhi ko e fai angahala ʻa ʻeku fānaú. Te u mālōlō ʻafē, pea fakamaʻa au mei he ʻuli ʻa ia kuo ʻalu atu ʻiate aú? ʻE fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi nai au ʻe hoku Tupuʻangá ʻafē, koeʻuhí ke u mālōlō, pea nofo ʻa e māʻoniʻoní ʻi hoku fungá ʻi ha kuonga?

Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he tangi ʻa e māmaní, naʻá ne tangi, ʻo ne kaila ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: ʻE ʻEiki, ʻe ʻikai koā te ke ʻaloʻofa ki he māmaní? ʻE ʻikai koā te ke tāpuakiʻi ʻa e fānau ʻa Noá?

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai atu ʻe ʻĪnoke ʻa ʻene tangí ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: ʻOku ou kole kiate koe, ʻe ʻEiki, ʻi he huafa ʻo ho ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisí, ke ke ʻaloʻofa kia Noa mo hono hakó, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa toe ʻufiʻufi ʻa e māmaní ʻe he ngaahi lōmakí.
Pea naʻe ʻikai lava ke fakafisi ʻe he ʻEikí; pea naʻá ne fuakava mo ʻĪnoke, mo fakapapau kiate ia ʻaki ʻa e fuakava, te ne taʻofi ʻa e ngaahi lōmakí; pea te ne ui atu ki he fānau ʻa Noá;
Pea naʻá ne ʻoatu ha tuʻutuʻuni taʻe-faʻa-liliu, ke ʻiloa maʻu ai pē ha toenga ʻo hono hakó ʻi he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, lolotonga ʻoku kei tuʻu ʻa e māmaní;

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí: ʻOku monūʻia ia ʻa ia ʻe tupu ʻi hono hakó ʻa e Mīsaiá; he ʻokú ne folofola—Ko au ʻa e Mīsaiá, ko e Tuʻi ʻo Saioné, ko e Maka ʻo e Langí, ʻa ia ʻoku fālahi ʻo hangē ko e taʻengatá; ko ia ia ʻe hū mai ʻi he matapaá ʻo kaka hake ʻiate aú ʻe ʻikai te ne hinga; ko ia, ʻoku monūʻia ʻa kinautolu kuó u lau ki aí, he te nau ʻalu atu mo e ngaahi hiva ʻo e fiefia taʻengata.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe tangi ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: ʻO ka hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he kakanó, ʻe mālōlō koā ʻa e māmaní? ʻOku ou kole kiate koe, ke ke fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate au.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: Vakai, peá ne sio atu ʻo vakai ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá kuo hiki hake ʻi he kolosí ʻi he founga ʻa e tangatá;

Pea naʻá ne fanongo ki ha leʻo-lahi; pea naʻe fakapūlou ʻa e ngaahi langí; pea naʻe tangi ʻa e ngaahi fakatupu kotoa pē ʻa e ʻOtuá; pea naʻe toʻe ʻa e māmaní; pea naʻe mafahifahi ʻa e ngaahi maká; pea naʻe tuʻu hake ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní, pea naʻe fakakalauni ʻa kinautolu ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi kalauni ʻo e nāunau;

Pea ko e ngaahi laumālie kotoa pē naʻe ʻi he fale fakapōpulá naʻa nau ō mai, ʻo tuʻu ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea naʻe tauhi ʻa hono toé ʻi he ngaahi sēini ʻo e fakapoʻuli kae ʻoua ke hoko mai ʻa e fakamaau ʻo e fuʻu ʻaho lahí.
Pea naʻe toe tangi ʻa ʻĪnoke ʻo kaila ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: ʻE mālōlō ʻafē ʻa e māmaní?

Pea naʻe vakai ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he hāʻele hake ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ki he Tamaí; pea naʻá ne ui ki he ʻEikí, ʻo pehē: Te ke toe hāʻele mai koā ki he māmaní?
