Koeʻuhi ko e ʻOtuá koe, peá u ʻilo koe, pea kuó ke fuakava kiate au, mo fekau kiate au ke u kole ʻi he huafa ʻo ho ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; kuó ke ngaohi au, mo foaki kiate au ha totonu ki ho taloní, ʻo ʻikai koeʻuhí ko au pē, kae tuʻunga pē ʻi hoʻo ʻaloʻofa ʻaʻaú; ko ia, ʻoku ou fehuʻi kiate koe pe te ke toe hāʻele mai koā ki he māmaní.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke, ʻo pehē: Hangē ʻoku ou moʻuí, ʻe pehē pē ʻeku haʻu ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo e fai angahalá mo e tauteá, ke fakahoko ʻa e fuakava ʻa ia kuó u fai kiate koe ʻo kau ki he fānau ʻa Noá;

Pea ʻe hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻe mālōlō ai ʻa e māmaní, ka ʻe fakapoʻuli ʻa e ngaahi langí ʻi he teʻeki ai ke hoko ʻa e ʻaho ko iá, pea ʻe ʻufiʻufi ʻa e māmaní ʻe ha pūlou ʻo e fakapoʻuli; pea ʻe ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi langí, pea mo e māmaní foki; pea ʻe ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu faingataʻa lalahi, ka te u maluʻi ʻa hoku kakaí;

Pea te u fekau hifo ʻa e māʻoniʻoní mei he langí; pea te u ʻohake ʻa e moʻoni mei he kelekelé, ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú; ʻa ʻene toetuʻu mei he pekiá; ʻio, pea mo e toetuʻu foki ʻa e kakai kotoa pē; pea te u ʻai ke tafiʻi ʻa māmani ʻe he māʻoniʻoní mo e moʻoní ʻo hangē ka fai ia ʻaki ʻa e lōmakí, ke tānaki fakataha mai ʻa hoku kakai filí mei he ngaahi vahe ʻe fā ʻo e māmaní, ki ha potu ʻa ia te u teuteu, ko ha Kolo Māʻoniʻoni, koeʻuhí ke nonoʻo ʻe hoku kakaí ʻa honau konga lotó, pea ʻamanaki atu ki he taimi ʻo ʻeku haʻú; koeʻuhí ʻe ʻi ai ʻa hoku nofoʻangá, pea ʻe ui ia ko Saione, ko ha Selūsalema Foʻou.

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke: Te ke toki fetaulaki ai mo ho koló kotoa mo kinautolu ʻi ai, pea te tau tali ʻa kinautolu ki hotau fatafatá, pea te nau mamata kiate kitautolu; pea te tau fāʻufua kiate kinautolu, pea te nau fāʻufua kiate kitautolu, pea te tau fekitengaki ʻi he ʻuma;
Pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa hoku nofoʻangá, pea ko Saione ia ʻa ia ʻe ʻalu atu mei he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuó u fakatupú; pea ʻe mālōlō ʻa e māmaní ʻo feʻunga mo ha taʻu ʻe taha afe.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe mamata ʻa ʻĪnoke ki he ʻaho ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí ke ʻafio ʻi māmani ʻi he māʻoniʻoni ʻo feʻunga mo e ngaahi taʻu ʻe afe;

Ka ʻi he teʻeki ai ke hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ko iá, naʻá ne mamata ki he ngaahi fuʻu faingataʻa lalahi ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá; pea naʻá ne mamata foki ki he tahí, ʻoku hou ia, pea ʻoku vaivai ʻa e loto ʻo e kakaí, ʻo nau nofo ʻamanaki atu ʻi he ilifia ki he ngaahi tautea ʻa e ʻOtua Māfimafí, ʻa ia ʻe hoko mai ki he kau fai angahalá.

Pea naʻe fakahā ʻe he ʻEikí kia ʻĪnoke ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní; pea naʻá ne mamata ki he ʻaho ʻo e kau māʻoniʻoní, ʻa e houa ʻo honau huhuʻí; ʻo ne maʻu ʻa e kakato ʻo e fiefiá;
Pea ko hono kotoa ʻo e ngaahi ʻaho ʻo Saioné ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo ʻĪnoké, koe taʻu ʻe tolungeau onongofulu mā nima.

Pea naʻe ʻaʻeva ʻa ʻĪnoke mo hono kakaí kotoa pē mo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻá ne ʻafio ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo Saioné; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ʻa Saione, he naʻe maʻu hake ia ʻe he ʻOtuá ki hono fatafata ʻoʻoná; pea naʻe mafola atu mei ai ʻa e lea ʻo pehē, kuo hola ʻa Saione.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/8.title: Mōsese 8
chapter_summary: ʻOku kikite ʻa Mētusela—ʻOku malanga ʻaki ʻe Noa mo hono ngaahi fohá ʻa e ongoongoleleí—ʻOku ʻi ai ha fuʻu fai angahala lahi ʻaupito—ʻOku ʻikai fai ha tokanga ki he ui ki he fakatomalá—ʻOku tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa hono fakaʻauha ʻo e kakano kotoa pē ʻi he Lōmakí.
subtitle: (Fēpueli 1831)

verses.text: Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo ʻĪnoké ko e taʻu ʻe fāngeau tolungofulu.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko Mētusela, ko e foha ʻo ʻĪnoké, naʻe ʻikai ʻave ia, koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi fuakava ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻa ia naʻá ne fai kia ʻĪnoké; he naʻá ne fuakava moʻoni mo ʻĪnoke ʻe tupu ʻa Noa ʻi he fua ʻo hono manavá.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe kikiteʻi ʻe Mētusela ʻo pehē ʻe tupu mei hono manavá ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní (ʻo fou ʻia Noa), pea naʻá ne toʻo kiate ia ʻa e nāunaú.
Pea naʻe hoko mai ha fuʻu honge ʻi he fonuá, pea naʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e fonuá ʻaki ha malaʻia lahi, pea naʻe mate ʻa e tokolahi ʻo hono kakaí.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe moʻui ʻa Mētusela ʻi he taʻu ʻe teau valungofulu mā fitu, peá ne fakatupu ʻa Lēmeki;
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Mētusela hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Lēmekí, ʻi he taʻu ʻe fitungeau valungofulu mā ua, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine;
Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo Mētuiselá ko e taʻu ʻe hivangeau onongofulu mā hiva, peá ne pekia.
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Lēmeki ʻi he taʻu ʻe teau valungofulu mā ua, peá ne fakatupu ha foha,
Pea naʻá ne ui ʻa hono hingoá ko Noa, ʻo pehē: ʻE fakafiemālieʻi ʻa kitautolu ʻe he fohá ni ʻi heʻetau ngāué mo e ongosia ʻa hotau nimá, koeʻuhí ko e kelekele ʻa ia kuo fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻe he ʻEikí.
Pea naʻe moʻui ʻa Lēmeki hili ʻene fakatupu ʻa Noá, ʻi he taʻu ʻe nimangeau hivangofulu mā nima, peá ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine;
Pea ko e ngaahi ʻaho kotoa ʻo Lēmekí ko e taʻu ʻe fitungeau fitungofulu mā fitu, peá ne pekia.

Pea naʻe taʻu ʻe fāngeau mā nimangofulu ʻa e motuʻa ʻo Noá, peá ne fakatupu ʻa Sēfeti; pea ʻi he taʻu ʻe fāngofulu mā ua mei ai naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa Semi ʻiate ia ko e faʻē ʻa Sēfetí, pea ʻi hono taʻu nimangeaú naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa Hami.
Pea naʻe fakaongo ʻa Noa mo hono ngaahi fohá ki he ʻEikí, mo nau tokanga, pea naʻe ui ʻa kinautolu ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Pea ʻi he kamata ʻa e kau tangatá ni ke fakatokolahi ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, pea fanauʻi kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi ʻofefine, naʻe vakai ʻe he ngaahi foha ʻo e tangatá ʻoku hoihoifua ʻa e ngaahi ʻofefine ko iá, pea nau maʻu ʻa kinautolu ko honau ngaahi uaifi, ʻo fakatatau ki honau lotó.

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Noa: Kuo fakatau atu ʻa kinautolu ʻe he ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo ho ngaahi fohá; he vakai kuo tupu ʻa ʻeku ʻitá ki he ngaahi foha ʻo e tangatá, he ʻoku ʻikai te nau fie tokanga ki hoku leʻó.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe kikite ʻa Noa, peá ne akonaki ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa e ʻOtuá, ʻio ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe ʻi he kamataʻangá.

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Noa: ʻE ʻikai fāinga maʻu ai pē ʻa hoku Laumālié mo e tangatá, he te ne ʻilo ʻe mate ʻa e kakano kotoa pē; ka ko hono ngaahi ʻahó ko e taʻu ʻe teau mā uofulu; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai fakatomala ʻa e tangatá, te u fekau atu ʻa e ngaahi lōmakí kiate kinautolu.
Pea ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iá naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kakai lalahi ʻi he māmaní, pea nau kumi kia Noa ke toʻo ʻene moʻuí; ka naʻe ʻia Noa ʻa e ʻEikí, pea naʻe ʻiate ia ʻa e mālohi ʻo e ʻEikí.

Pea naʻe fakanofo ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa Noa ʻo fakatatau ki hono lakanga ʻoʻoná, peá ne fekau kiate ia ke ne ʻalu atu ʻo fakahā ʻene Ongoongoleleí ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá, ʻio ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa naʻe tuku kia ʻĪnoké.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe ui atu ʻa Noa ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá ke nau fakatomala; ka naʻe ʻikai te nau tokanga ki heʻene ngaahi leá;

Pea ko e tahá foki, hili ʻenau fanongo kiate iá, naʻa nau haʻu ki hono ʻaó ʻo pehē ange: Vakai, ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtua ʻa kimautolu; ʻikai koā kuo mau maʻu kiate kimautolu ʻa e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo e tangatá? Pea ʻikai koā ʻoku mau kai mo inu, mo mali mo foaki ke mali? Pea ʻoku fāʻeleʻi kiate kimautolu ʻe homau ngaahi uaifí ʻa e fānau pea ko e kau tangata kaukaua ʻa kinautolu, ʻa ia ʻoku nau tatau mo e kau tangata ʻi muʻá, ko e kau tangata ongoongoa lahi. Pea naʻe ʻikai te nau tokanga ki he ngaahi lea ʻa Noá.

Pea naʻe ʻafioʻi ʻe he ʻOtuá kuo hoko ʻo fuʻu hulu ʻi he māmaní ʻa e fai angahala ʻa e kakaí; pea kuo hīkisia ʻa e tangata kotoa pē ʻi he filioʻi ʻo e ngaahi mahalo ʻo hono lotó, ʻa ia ko e kovi ia maʻu ai pē.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai atu ʻe Noa ʻa ʻene malanga ki he kakaí, ʻo pehē: Tokanga mai, pea talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi leá;

Mou tui pea fakatomala mei hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá, pea papitaiso ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻo hangē foki ko ʻetau ngaahi tamaí, pea te mou maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhí ke fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te mou fai ʻeni, ʻe hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi lōmaki kiate kimoutolu, ka neongo iá naʻe ʻikai te nau tokanga.
Pea naʻe fakatomala ʻa Noa, pea naʻe mamahi ʻa hono lotó koeʻuhí ko e fakatupu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e tangatá ʻi he māmaní, pea naʻe fakamamahiʻi ʻa hono lotó.

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí: Te u fakaʻauha ʻa e tangata ʻa ia kuó u fakatupú, mei he funga ʻo e māmaní, ʻa e tangatá mo e fanga manú fakatouʻosi, pea mo e fanga manu totoló, mo e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá; he naʻe fakatomala ʻa Noa ʻi heʻeku fakatupu ʻa kinautolú, pea mo ʻeku ngaohi ʻa kinautolú; pea kuó ne ui kiate au; he kuo nau kumi ki heʻene moʻuí.

Pea ko ia naʻe maʻu ʻe Noa ʻa e ʻofa ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, he ko e tangata angatonu ʻa Noa, mo haohaoa ʻi hono toʻu tangatá; pea naʻá ne ʻaʻeva mo e ʻOtuá, ʻo hangē foki ko hono ngaahi foha ʻe toko tolú, ʻa Semi, Hami, mo Sēfetí.
Naʻe fakalielia ʻa e māmaní ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻe fonu ia ʻi he fai fakamālohi.
Pea naʻe ʻafio ʻa e ʻOtuá ki he māmaní, pea vakai, kuo fakalielia ia, he kuo hanga ʻe he kakano kotoa pē ʻo ngaohi ke fakalielia ʻa hono halá ʻi he māmaní.

Pea folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá kia Noa: Kuo ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻa e ngataʻanga ʻo e kakano kotoa pē, he kuo fonu ʻa e māmani ʻi he fakamālohi, pea vakai, te u fakaʻauha ʻa e kakano kotoa pē mei he funga ʻo e māmaní.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/1.title: ʻĒpalahame 1
chapter_summary: ʻOku kumi ʻa ʻĒpalahame ki he ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e hokohoko fakapēteliaké—ʻOku fakatangaʻi ia ʻe he kau taulaʻeiki loi ʻi Kalitia—ʻOku fakahaofi ia ʻe Sihova—ʻOku fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi kamataʻanga mo e anga ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo ʻIsipité.
subtitle: Naʻe Liliu Mei he Pepa Kiliʻi Kaho, ʻe Siosefa Sāmita

verses.text: ʻI he fonua ʻo e kau Kalitiá, ʻi he nofoʻanga ʻo ʻeku ngaahi tamaí, ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku vakai ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke u kumi ha toe potu kehe ke nofo ai;

Pea, ʻi heʻeku ʻiloʻi ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e fiefia mo e melino mo e mālōlō lahi ange kiate aú, ko ia naʻá ku kumi ai ki he ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e ngaahi tamaí, pea mo e totonu ʻa ia ʻe fakanofo au ki ai ke foaki atu ia; koeʻuhí he kuó u hoko foki ko e tokotaha muimui ki he māʻoniʻoní, peá u holi foki ke hoko ko e tokotaha ʻoku maʻu ʻa e ʻilo lahi, pea ke hoko ko ha tokotaha ʻoku muimui lahi ange ki he māʻoniʻoní, pea ke maʻu ha ʻilo lahi ange, pea ke hoko ko ha tamai ki he ngaahi puleʻanga lahi, ko ha pilinisi ʻo e melinó, peá u holi ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fakahinohino, pea ke tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa e ʻOtuá, ko ia naʻá ku hoko ai ko ha ʻea-hoko totonu, ko ha Taulaʻeiki Lahi, ʻoku maʻu ʻa e totonu ko ia ʻoku maʻu ʻe he ngaahi tamaí.

Naʻe foaki mai ia kiate au mei he ngaahi tamaí; naʻe tukufakaholo mai ia mei he ngaahi tamaí, mei he kamataʻanga ʻo taimí, ʻio, talu mei he kamataʻangá, pe ki muʻa ʻi he ʻai ʻo e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní, ʻo fai mai ki he lolotongá ni, ʻio ʻa e totonu ʻo e ʻuluaki fānaú, pe ko e ʻuluaki tangatá, ʻa ia ko ʻĀtama, pe ko e ʻuluaki tamaí, ʻo tukufakaholo mai ʻi he ngaahi tamaí kiate au.
Naʻá ku kumi ki hoku fakanofo ki he Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí, ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e ʻOtuá ki he ngaahi tamaí ʻo kau ki he hakó.

Ko e meʻa ʻi he tafoki ʻa ʻeku ngaahi tamaí mei heʻenau fai māʻoniʻoní, pea mei he ngaahi fekau toputapu ʻa ia kuo foaki kiate kinautolu ʻe he ʻEikí ko honau ʻOtuá, ki he hū ki he ngaahi ʻotua ʻo e kau hītení, ʻo nau fakafisi ʻaupito ke tokanga ki hoku leʻó;

He kuo fakapapau honau lotó ke faikovi, pea nau tafoki ʻaupito ki he ʻotua ʻo ʻElikená, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Līpiná, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Mamakelá, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Kōlasí, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Felo, ko e tuʻi ʻo ʻIsipité;

Ko ia naʻa nau fakatafoki honau lotó ki he feilaulau ʻa e kau hītení ʻi he feilaulau ʻaki ʻenau fānaú ki he ngaahi tamapua taʻelea ko ʻení, pea ʻikai te nau tokanga ki hoku leʻó, ka nau feinga ke toʻo ʻa ʻeku moʻuí ʻi he nima ʻo e taulaʻeiki ʻa ʻElikená. Ko e taulaʻeiki ʻa ʻElikená ko e taulaʻeiki foki ia ʻa Feló.

Ko ʻeni, ʻi he taimi ko ʻení ko e anga ʻo e taulaʻeiki ʻa Felo, ko e tuʻi ʻo ʻIsipité, ke ʻohake ʻi he feilaulau ʻa e kau tangata mo e kau fefine pea mo e fānau ʻi he ʻesi-feilaulau ʻa ia naʻe fokotuʻu ʻi he fonua ko Kalitiá ke fai ai ʻa e feilaulau ki he ngaahi ʻotua ngali kehe ko ʻení.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai ʻe he taulaʻeikí ha feilaulau ki he ʻotua ʻo Feló pea ki he ʻotua foki ʻo Sakalilí, ʻio ʻo fakatatau ki he anga ʻo e kau ʻIsipité. Ko ʻeni ko e ʻotua ʻo Sakalilí ʻa e laʻaá.

Naʻa mo e feilaulau fakafetaʻi ʻo ha tamasiʻi naʻe fai ʻe he taulaʻeiki ʻa Feló ʻi he funga ʻesi-feilaulaú ʻa ia naʻe tuʻu ʻi he funga moʻunga naʻe ui ko e Moʻunga ʻo Pōtifaá, ʻi he ʻulu ʻo e potu tokalelei ʻo ʻOlisemí.

Ko ʻeni, naʻe feilaulau ʻaki ʻe he taulaʻeiki ko ʻení ʻi he ʻesi-feilaulau ko ʻení ʻa e kau tāupoʻou ʻe toko tolu ʻi he taimi pē ʻe taha, ʻa ia ko e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻo ʻOnaita, ʻa ia ko e toko taha ʻo e haʻa tuʻí kuo tupu tonu mei he manava ʻo Hamí. Naʻe feilaulau ʻaki ʻa e kau tāupoʻoú ni koeʻuhí ko ʻenau angamaʻá; naʻe ʻikai te nau fie punou hifo ʻo hū ki he ngaahi ʻotua ʻo e ʻakau pe maka, ko ia naʻe tāmateʻi ai ʻa kinautolu ʻi he funga ʻesi-feilaulaú ni, pea naʻe fai ia ʻo fakatatau ki he anga ʻo e kau ʻIsipité.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe puke fakamālohiʻi au ʻe he kau taulaʻeikí, koeʻuhí ke nau fakapoongi mo au foki, ʻo hangē ko ʻenau fai ki he kau tāupoʻou ko ia ʻi he ʻesi-feilaulau ko ʻení; pea koeʻuhí ke mou lava ke maʻu ai ha ʻilo ʻo kau ki he ʻesi-feilaulau ko ʻení, ko ia te u pehē ke mou vakai ki he fakatātā ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e lekooti ko ʻení.

Naʻe ngaohi ia ʻi he tatau ʻo ha mohenga, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe maʻu ʻe he kau Kalitiá, pea naʻe tuʻu ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ngaahi ʻotua ʻo ʻElikená, Līpiná, Mamakelá, Kolasí, pea mo ha ʻotua ʻe taha naʻe tatau mo e ʻotua ʻo Felo, ko e tuʻi ʻo ʻIsipité.

Koeʻuhí ke mou maʻu ha ʻilo ki he ngaahi ʻotua ko ʻení, ko ia kuó u fakahā ai kiate kimoutolu ʻa honau angá ʻi he ngaahi fakatātā ʻi he kamataʻangá, ʻa ia ko e anga ʻo e ngaahi tā fakatātā ʻoku ui ʻe he kau Kalitiá ko e Lalinosi, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e ngaahi mataʻitohi fakatātā.

Pea ʻi heʻenau hiki hake honau nimá kiate au, koeʻuhí ke nau feilaulau ʻaki au mo toʻo ʻeku moʻuí, vakai, naʻá ku hiki hake hoku leʻó ki he ʻEiki ko hoku ʻOtuá, pea naʻe tokanga mai ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo ne ʻafioʻi, pea naʻá ne fakafonu au ʻaki ʻa e meʻa-hā-mai ʻa e Māfimafí, pea naʻe tuʻu ha ʻāngelo mei hono ʻaó ʻi hoku tafaʻakí, peá ne vete ange leva ʻa hoku ngaahi haʻí;

Pea naʻe ongo mai ʻa hono leʻó kiate au: ʻE ʻĒpalahame, ʻĒpalahame, vakai, ko hoku hingoá ko Sihova, pea kuó u fanongo kiate koe, pea kuó u ʻalu hifo ke fakahaofi koe, pea ʻave koe mei he fale ʻo hoʻo tamaí, pea mei ho kāingá kotoa pē, ki ha fonua foʻou ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te ke ʻilo ki ai;

Pea ʻe fai ʻeni koeʻuhi kuo nau fakatafoki honau lotó meiate au ke hū ki he ʻotua ʻo ʻElikená, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Līpiná, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Mamakelá, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Kōlasí, pea mo e ʻotua ʻo Felo, ko e tuʻi ʻo ʻIsipité; ko ia kuó u ʻalu hifo ai ke ʻaʻahi kiate kinautolu, pea ke fakaʻauha ia ʻa ia kuó ne hiki hake hono nimá ke taaʻi koe, ʻe ʻĒpalahame, ko hoku foha, ke toʻo atu ai ʻa hoʻo moʻuí.
Vakai, te u tataki koe ʻaki hoku nimá pea te u ʻave koe, ke ʻai kiate koe ʻa hoku hingoá, ʻio ʻa e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeiki ʻo hoʻo tamaí, pea ʻe ʻaofi koe ʻe hoku mālohí.
Hangē ko e meʻa naʻe hoko kia Noá ʻe pehē pē ʻa e meʻa ʻe hoko kiate koé; ka ʻe makatuʻunga ʻi hoʻo ngāué ʻa e ʻiloa ʻa hoku hingoá ʻi he māmaní ʻo taʻengata, he ko ho ʻOtuá au.

Vakai, naʻe ʻi he fonua ʻo ʻUa, ʻo Kalitiá ʻa e Moʻunga ʻo Pōtifaá. Pea naʻe holoki hifo ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e ʻesi-feilaulau ʻa ʻElikená, mo e ngaahi ʻotua ʻo e fonuá, ʻo ne fakaʻauha ʻaupito ia, mo ne teʻia ʻa e taulaʻeikí ʻo ne mate; pea naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangilāulau lahi ʻi Kalitia, pea ʻi he lotoʻā foki ʻo Feló; ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhinga ʻo e Feló ko e tuʻi ʻi he hako fakatuʻi.
Ko ʻeni ko e tuʻi ko ʻeni ʻo ʻIsipité ko ha hako ia mei he manava ʻo Hamí, pea naʻe maʻu ʻe ia ʻa e toto ʻo e kau Kēnaní ʻi hono fāʻeleʻí.
Naʻe tupu mei he hako ko ʻení ʻa e kau ʻIsipité kotoa pē, pea naʻe pehē hono fakatoe ʻa e toto ʻo e kau Kēnaní ʻi he fonuá.

Naʻe fuofua ʻilo ʻa e fonua ʻo ʻIsipité ʻe ha fefine, ʻa ia ko e ʻofefine ʻo Hami, pea ko e taʻahine ʻa ʻIsipitasi, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhinga ʻi he lea faka-Kalitiá ko ʻIsipite, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e meʻa kuo tapui;

ʻI he taimi naʻe ʻiloʻi ai ʻa e fonuá ʻe he fefine ní naʻe ʻufiʻufi ia ʻe he vai, pea naʻá ne tuku ki mui ke nofo ʻi ai ʻa ʻene fānau tangatá; pea ko ia, naʻe tupu meia Hami, ʻa e faʻahinga ko ia naʻe fakatolonga ai ʻa e malaʻiá ʻi he fonuá.

Ko ʻeni naʻe fokotuʻu ʻa e ʻuluaki puleʻanga ʻo ʻIsipité ʻe Felo, ko e tama lahi ʻa ʻIsipitasi, ko e ʻofefine ʻo Hamí, pea naʻe tatau ia mo e anga ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo Hamí, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he hokohoko fakapēteliaké.

Pea ko Feló, koeʻuhí ko ha tangata māʻoniʻoni ia, naʻá ne fokotuʻu ʻa hono puleʻangá peá ne fakamāuʻi ʻa hono kakaí ʻi he anga-fakapotopoto mo e angatonu ʻi hono ngaahi ʻahó kotoa pē, ʻo ne feinga fakamātoato ke faʻifaʻitaki ki he lakanga naʻe fokotuʻu ʻe he ngaahi tamaí ʻi he ngaahi ʻuluaki toʻu tangatá, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo e ʻuluaki pule fakapēteliaké, ʻio ʻi he pule ʻa ʻĀtamá kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻa Noa, ko ʻene tamaí, ʻa ia naʻá ne tāpuakiʻi ia ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e māmaní, pea mo e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e potó, kae fakamalaʻiaʻi ia ʻo kau ki he Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí.

Ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ʻi he kau ʻa Felo ki he hako ko ia ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai te ne lava ai ke maʻu ʻa e totonu ki he Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí, neongo naʻe fie ʻekeʻi ia ʻe he kau Feló meia Noa, ʻo fou mai ʻia Hami, ko ia naʻe takihalaʻi ai ʻa ʻeku tamaí ʻe heʻenau tauhi tamapuá;

Ka te u feinga, ʻo fai atu ai mei heni, ke fakamatala ki he hokohokó ʻo fai atu pē meiate au ʻo aʻu ki he kamataʻanga ʻo e fakatupú, he kuo tō ki hoku nimá ʻa e ngaahi lekōtí, ʻa ia ʻoku ou kei maʻu ʻo aʻu mai ki he lolotongá ni.

Ko ʻeni, hili hono teʻia ʻo e taulaʻeiki ʻa ʻElikená ʻo ne maté, naʻe hoko leva hono fakamoʻoniʻi ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia naʻe folofola ʻaki kiate au ʻo kau ki he fonua ko Kalitiá, ʻo pehē ʻe ʻi ai ha honge ʻi he fonuá.

Ko ia naʻe tō ʻa e honge ʻi hono kotoa ʻo e fonua ko Kalitiá, pea naʻe faingataʻaʻia lahi ʻaupito ʻa ʻeku tamaí ko e tupu mei he hongé, pea naʻá ne fakatomala mei he kovi ʻa ia naʻá ne fakakaukau ke fai kiate aú, ke toʻo ʻa ʻeku moʻuí.

Ka ko e ngaahi lekooti ʻo e ngaahi tamaí, ʻio ʻa e kau pēteliaké ʻo kau ki he totonu ʻo e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí, naʻe maluʻi ia ʻe he ʻEiki ko hoku ʻOtuá ʻi hoku nima ʻoʻokú; ko ia kuo ʻi ai ha ʻilo ki he kamataʻanga ʻo e fakatupú, kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻa e ngaahi palanité, pea mo e ngaahi fetuʻú, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fakahā ki he ngaahi tamaí, kuó u tauhi ʻo aʻu mai ki he ʻahó ni, pea te u feinga ke tohi ʻa e niʻihi ʻo e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi he lekooti ko ʻení, koeʻuhí ke ʻaonga ki hoku hakó ʻa ia ʻe tupu ki mui ʻiate aú.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/2.title: ʻĒpalahame 2
chapter_summary: ʻOku tuku ʻe ʻĒpalahame ʻa ʻUa kae ʻalu ki Kēnani—ʻOku hā mai ʻa Sihova kiate ia ʻi Hālani—ʻOku talaʻofa ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki kotoa ʻo e ongoongoleleí ki hono hakó pea mei hono hakó ki he kakai kotoa pē—ʻOkú ne ʻalu ki Kēnani pea mei ai ki ʻIsipite.

verses.text: Ko ʻeni naʻe tuku ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá ke ʻāsili ʻo lahi ʻa e hongé ʻi he fonua ko ʻUá, pea tupu ai ʻa e mate ʻa hoku tokoua ko Hālaní; ka ko Tela, ko ʻeku tamaí, naʻe kei moʻui ia ʻi he fonua ko ʻUa, ʻo e kau Kalitiá.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko au, ʻĒpalahame, ne u maʻu ʻa Sēlai ko hoku mali pea maʻu ʻe Nēhoa, ko hoku tokouá, ʻa Milika ko hono mali, ʻa ia ko e ongo ʻofefine ʻo Hālani.
Ko ʻeni kuo folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: ʻE ʻĒpalahame, ke ke ʻalu mei ho fonuá, pea mei ho kāingá, pea mei he fale ʻo hoʻo tamaí, ki ha fonua ʻa ia te u fakahā kiate koe.

Ko ia, naʻá ku ʻalu ai mei he fonua ko ʻUa, ʻo e kau Kalitiá, ke ʻalu ki he fonua ko Kēnaní; pea naʻá ku ʻave ʻa Lote, ko e foha ʻo hoku tokuá, pea mo hono uaifí, pea mo Sēlai ko hoku uaifí; pea naʻe muimui foki ʻa ʻeku tamaí kiate au, ki he fonua ʻa ia naʻa mau fakahingoa ko Hālaní.

Pea naʻe fakaʻau ʻo siʻi ange ʻa e hongé; pea naʻe tatali ʻa ʻeku tamaí ʻi Hālani, ʻo ne nofo ai koeʻuhí he naʻe tokolahi ʻa e ngaahi takanga monumanu īkí ʻi Hālani; pea naʻe toe tafoki ʻa ʻeku tamaí ki heʻene tauhi tamapuá, ko ia naʻá ne nofo ai pē ʻi Hālani.

Ka ko au, ʻĒpalahame, mo Lote, ko e foha ʻo hoku tokouá, naʻá ma lotu ki he ʻEikí, pea naʻe hā mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au, ʻo ne folofola mai kiate au ʻo pehē: Tuʻu hake, pea ʻave mo koe ʻa Lote; he kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ke ʻave koe mei Hālani, pea ngaohi koe ko e tamaioʻeiki ke toʻo ʻa hoku hingoá ʻi ha fonua foʻou ʻa ia te u foaki ki ho hakó ki mui ʻiate koe ke hoko ko ha tofiʻa taʻengata, ʻo ka nau ka tokanga ki hoku leʻó.

He ko au ko e ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá; ʻoku ou nofo ʻi he langí; ko hoku tuʻunga vaʻé ʻa e māmaní; ʻoku mafao atu ʻa hoku nimá ʻi he tahí pea ʻoku talangofua ia ki hoku leʻó; ʻoku ou ngaohi ʻa e matangí mo e afí ko ʻeku saliote; ʻoku ou pehē ki he ngaahi moʻungá—ʻAlu mei heni—pea vakai, ʻoku ʻave atu ia ʻi ha ʻahiohio, ʻi he kemo ʻo e matá, pea fakafokifā.
Ko hoku hingoá ko Sihova, pea ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngataʻangá mei he kamataʻangá; ko ia ʻe ʻiate koe ʻa hoku nimá.

Pea te u fakatupu ʻiate koe ha puleʻanga lahi, pea te u tāpuakiʻi koe ʻo taʻefaʻalaua, pea ngaohi ke lahi ʻa ho hingoá ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, pea te ke hoko ko e monūʻiaʻanga ki ho hakó ki mui ʻiate koe, koeʻuhí ke nau ʻave ʻi honau nimá ʻa e ngāue mo e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeiki ko ʻení ki he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē;

Pea te u tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi ho hingoá; he ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tali ʻa e Ongoongolelei ko ʻení ʻe ui ʻa kinautolu ʻaki ho hingoá, pea ʻe lau ʻa kinautolu ko ho hako, pea te nau tuʻu hake ʻo fakamonūʻiaʻi koe, ko ʻenau tamai;

Pea te u tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe tāpuakiʻi koé, pea fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe kapeʻi koé; pea ʻe ʻiate koe (ʻa ia ko e pehē, ʻi ho Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí), pea ʻi ho hakó (ʻa ia ko e pehē, ko ho Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí), he ʻoku ou fai kiate koe ha talaʻofa ʻe hokohoko atu ʻiate koe ʻa e totonu ko ʻení, pea ʻi ho hakó ki mui ʻiate koe (ʻa ia ko e pehē, ko e hako totonu, pe ko e fānau totonu ʻi he sino) ʻe tāpuekina ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní, ʻio ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e Ongoongoleleí, ʻa ia ko e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e fakamoʻuí, ʻio ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá.

Ko ʻeni, hili ʻa e foki ʻa e ʻEikí mei heʻene folofola kiate aú, pea puli hono fofongá mei heʻene hā mai kiate aú, naʻá ku pehē ʻi hoku lotó: Kuo kumi fakamātoato ʻa hoʻo tamaioʻeikí kiate koe; ko ʻeni kuó u ʻilo koe;
Naʻá ke fekau mai hoʻo ʻāngeló ke fakahaofi au mei he ngaahi ʻotua ʻo ʻElikená, pea ʻe lelei ʻeku tokanga ki ho leʻó, ko ia tuku ke tuʻu hake ʻa hoʻo tamaioʻeikí ʻo ʻalu ʻi he melino.
Ko ia ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku ʻalu ʻo hangē ko e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kiate aú, pea ma ō mo Lote; pea ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku taʻu onongofulu mā ua ʻi heʻeku ʻalu atu mei Hālaní.

Pea naʻá ku ʻave ʻa Sēlai, ʻa ia naʻá ku maʻu ko hoku uaifi ʻi heʻeku ʻi ʻUa, ʻi Kalitiá, mo Lote, ko e foha ʻo hoku tokouá, mo ʻemau ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo mau tānakí, pea mo e ngaahi laumālie ʻa ia kuo mau ikunaʻi ʻi Hālaní, pea mau ō mai ʻi he hala ki he fonua ko Kēnaní, ʻo nofo ai ʻi he ngaahi fale fehikitaki lolotonga ʻemau fononga ʻi homau halá;
Ko ia, ko e taʻengatá ʻa homau maluʻí mo homau maká pea mo homau fakamoʻuí, ʻi heʻemau fononga mei Hālani ʻi he hala ki Sēsoní ke aʻu ki he fonua ko Kēnaní.

Ko ʻeni ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku langa ha ʻesi-feilaulau ʻi he fonua ko Sēsoní, peá u fai ha feilaulau ki he ʻEikí, mo lotu ke taʻofi ʻa e hongé mei he fale ʻo ʻeku tamaí, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa nau mate.

Pea mau toki laka atu mei Sēsoni ʻo fou atu ʻi he fonuá ki he potu ko Sīkemí; naʻe tuʻu ia ʻi he ngaahi potu tokalelei ʻo Molé, pea kuo mau ʻosi aʻu mai ki he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo e fonua ʻo e kau Kēnaní, pea naʻá ku fai ha feilaulau ʻi ai ʻi he ngaahi potu tokalelei ʻo Molé, peá u ui fakamātoato ki he ʻEikí, koeʻuhí he kuo mau ʻosi aʻu mai ki he fonua ʻo e puleʻanga tauhi tamapua ko ʻení.
Pea naʻe hā mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au ko e tali ki heʻeku ngaahi lotú, ʻo ne folofola mai kiate au ʻo pehē: Te u foaki ki ho hakó ʻa e fonuá ni.

Pea ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku tuʻu hake mei he potu ʻo e ʻesi-feilaulau ʻa ia kuó u fokotuʻu ki he ʻEikí, peá u ʻalu mei ai ki ha moʻunga ʻi he hahake ʻo Pētelí, peá u fokotuʻu ʻi ai ʻa hoku fale fehikitakí, pea tuʻu ʻa Pēteli ki he hihifó pea tuʻu ʻa Hai ki he hahaké; peá u fokotuʻu ʻi ai ha ʻesi-feilaulau ʻe taha ki he ʻEikí, peá u toe ui ki he huafa ʻo e ʻEikí.

Pea ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku fononga, ʻo fai atu ai pē ki he tongá; pea naʻe hoko atu ai pē ʻa e hongé ʻi he fonuá: pea ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku fakakaukau ke u ʻalu hifo ki ʻIsipite, ke ʻāunofo ai, he naʻe fakaʻau ʻo fuʻu faingataʻa ʻa e hongé.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻi heʻeku ofi mai ke hū ki ʻIsipité, naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au ʻo pehē: Vakai, ko e fefine hoihoifua ʻaupito ʻa Sēlai ko ho uaifí ke mamata ki ai;
Ko ia ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻo ka mamata kiate ia ʻa e kau ʻIsipité, te nau lea ʻo pehē—Ko hono uaifi ia; pea te nau tāmateʻi koe, ka te nau fakamoʻui ia; ko ia ke ke tokanga ke fai ʻo hangē ko ʻení:
Tuku ke ne tala ki he kau ʻIsipité, ko ho tuofefine ia, pea ʻe moʻui ʻa ho laumālié.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku fakahā kia Sēlai, ko hoku uaifí, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo folofola ʻaki ʻe he ʻEikí kiate aú—Ko ia ʻoku ou kole kiate koe ke ke fakahā kiate kinautolu, ko hoku tuofefine koe, koeʻuhí ke hoko ʻa e lelei kiate au koeʻuhi ko koe, pea ʻe moʻui ʻa hoku laumālié koeʻuhí ko koe.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/3.title: ʻĒpalahame 3
chapter_summary: ʻOku ako ʻa ʻĒpalahame ki he laʻaá, māhiná, mo e ngaahi fetuʻú tuʻunga ʻi he ʻŪlimí mo e Tūmemí—ʻOku fakahā mai ʻe he ʻEikí kiate ia ʻa e natula taʻengata ʻo e ngaahi laumālié—ʻOkú ne ako ki he moʻui ki muʻa ʻi he māmaní, tomuʻa fakanofó, ko e Fakatupú, ko hono fili ʻo e Huhuʻí, mo e tuʻunga hono ua ʻo e tangatá.

verses.text: Pea ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku maʻu ʻa e ʻŪlimí mo e Tūmemí, ʻa ia kuo tuku mai kiate au ʻe he ʻEiki ko hoku ʻOtuá, ʻi ʻUa ʻo e kau Kalitiá;
Pea naʻá ku mamata ki he ngaahi fetuʻú, ʻoku fuʻu lalahi, pea ko e taha ʻo kinautolu naʻe ofi taha ki he taloni ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea naʻe lahi ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻu lalahi ʻa ia naʻe ofi ki aí;

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Ko e ngaahi fetuʻu pulé ʻeni; pea ko e hingoa ʻo e fetuʻu lahí ko Kolapa, koeʻuhí he ʻoku ofi ia kiate au, he ko au ʻa e ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá: kuó u fokotuʻu ʻa e fetuʻu ko ʻení ke puleʻi ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻu kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku kau ki he faʻahinga tatau mo ia ʻokú ke tuʻu aí.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au, ʻi he ʻŪlimí mo e Tūmemí ʻo pehē, ʻoku faitatau ʻa Kolapa mo e anga ʻo e lau taimi ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo fakatatau ki hono ngaahi kuongá mo e ngaahi faʻahitaʻú ʻi heʻene ngaahi takamiló; pea ko e takamilo tuʻo tahá ko e ʻaho ia ʻe taha ki he ʻEikí, ʻo fakatatau ki he anga ʻo ʻene lau taimí, ko e taʻu ʻe taha afe ʻo fakatatau ki he lau taimi kuo kotofa ki he maama ʻokú ke tuʻu aí. Ko e anga ʻeni ʻo e lau taimi ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻo fakatatau ki he lau taimi ʻo Kolapá.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Ko e maama ʻa ia ko e maama siʻi hifó, ʻa ia ʻoku siʻi hifo ʻi he maama ke puleʻi ʻa e ʻahó, ʻio ʻa e poó, ʻoku māʻolunga pe lahi ange ia ʻi he maama ʻokú ke tuʻu aí ʻi he anga ʻo e lau taimí, he ʻoku ʻalu ia ʻi he tuʻunga ʻoku māmalie ange; ʻoku hoa ʻeni mo e tuʻunga totonú koeʻuhí he ʻoku tuʻu ia ki ʻolunga ʻi he maama ʻa ia ʻoku ke tuʻu aí, ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ke lahi pehē ʻa hono lau taimí ʻi he lahi ʻo hono ngaahi ʻahó, pea mo e ngaahi māhiná, pea mo e ngaahi taʻú.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: Ko ʻeni, ʻe ʻĒpalahame, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ongo moʻoní ni, vakai ʻoku mamata ki ai ʻa ho matá; ʻoku tuku kiate koe ke ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi taimi ʻo e lau taimí, pea mo e lau taimi tukupaú, ʻio, ʻa e lau taimi tukupau ʻo e maama ʻokú ke tuʻu aí, pea mo e lau taimi tukupau ʻo e maama lahi ange ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻu ke pule ki he ʻahó, pea mo e lau taimi tukupau ʻo e maama siʻi ange ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻu ke pule ki he poó.
Ko ʻeni ko e lau taimi tukupau ʻo e maama siʻi hifó ʻoku fuoloa ange ia ʻi hono lau taimí ʻi he lau taimi ʻo e maama ʻa ia ʻokú ke tuʻu aí.
Pea ʻo ka ʻi ai ʻa e ongo moʻoní ni, ʻe ʻi ai mo e moʻoni ʻe taha ʻoku māʻolunga ange ʻi ai, ʻa ia ko e pehē, ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e maama ʻe taha ʻoku toe fuoloa ange ʻa hono lau taimí;

Pea ko ia ʻe pehē ʻa e lau taimi ʻo e maama ʻe taha ʻoku māʻolunga ange ʻi he maama ʻe taha, kae ʻoua ke ke haʻu ʻo ofi ki Kolapa, pea ko e Kolapa ko iá ʻoku tatau ia ki he anga ʻo e lau taimi ʻa e ʻEikí; ʻa ia ko e Kolapa kuo fokotuʻu ia ʻo ofi ki he taloni ʻo e ʻOtuá, ke puleʻi ʻa e ngaahi maama kotoa ko ia ʻoku kau ki he faʻahinga tatau mo ia ʻokú ke tuʻu aí.
Pea ʻoku tuku kiate koe ke ke ʻilo ʻa e lau taimi tukupau ʻo e ngaahi fetuʻu kotoa pē ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻu ke ulo atú, kae ʻoua ke ke haʻu ʻo ofi ki he taloni ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Ko ia ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku fakatau folofola ki he ʻEikí, ko e mata ki he mata, ʻo hangē ko e fetalanoaʻaki ʻa e tangata ʻe taha mo e tangata ʻe taha; pea naʻá ne fakahā kiate au ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo ngaohi ʻe hono toʻukupú;

Pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au: ʻE hoku foha, ʻe hoku foha, (pea naʻe mafao atu ʻa hono toʻukupú), vakai te u fakahā kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa. Pea naʻá ne ʻai hono toʻukupú ki hoku matá, pea naʻá ku mamata ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuo ngaohi ʻe hono toʻukupú, ʻa ia naʻe lahi; pea naʻe tupu ʻo lahi ia ʻi hoku ʻaó, pea naʻe ʻikai te u faʻa mamata ki hono ngataʻanga ʻo iá.

Pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au: Ko Sainehā ʻeni, ʻa ia ko e laʻaá. Pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au: Ko Kokavi, ʻa ia ko e fetuʻu. Pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au: Ko e ʻOlea, ʻa ia ko e māhiná. Pea naʻá ne folofola mai kiate au: Ko Kokauviimi, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e ngaahi fetuʻu, pe ko e ngaahi maama lalahi kotoa pē, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí.

Pea ko e taimi poʻuli ʻa ia naʻe folofola ʻaki mai ai ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e ngaahi folofolá ni kiate au: Te u fakatokolahi koe, pea mo ho hakó ʻi mui ʻiate koé, ke hangē ko e ngaahi meʻá ni; pea kapau ʻoku ʻikai te ke lava ʻo lau ʻa e lahi ʻo e ʻoneʻoné, ʻe pehē ʻa e tokolahi ʻo ho ngaahi hakó.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: ʻE ʻĒpalahame, ʻoku ou fakahā atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate koe ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ke ʻalu ki ʻIsipité, koeʻuhí ke ke lava ʻo fakahā ʻa e ngaahi leá ni kotoa pē.

Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e meʻa ʻe ua, ʻo māʻolunga ange ʻa e tahá ʻi he tahá, ʻe ʻi ai mo e ngaahi meʻa lalahi ange ʻi ai; ko ia ko Kolapa ko e lahi taha ʻi hono kotoa ʻo e Kokauviimi ʻa ia kuó ke mamata ki aí, koeʻuhí he ʻoku ofi taha ia kiate au.

Ko ʻeni, kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e meʻa ʻe ua, ʻoku māʻolunga ange ʻa e tahá ʻi he tahá, pea māʻolunga ange ʻa e māhiná ʻi he māmaní, pea ʻe ʻi ai nai ha maama pe fetuʻu ʻe ʻi ʻolunga ai; pea ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ʻe fakakaukau ʻe he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá ʻi hono lotó ke fai ka te ne fai ia.

Ka neongo iá naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa e fetuʻu lahi angé; ʻo hangē foki, kapau ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e ongo laumālie ʻe ua, pea ʻatamai poto ange ʻa e tahá ʻi he tahá, pea neongo ʻoku ʻatamai poto ange ʻa e tahá ʻi he tahá, ka ʻoku ʻikai hano kamataʻanga ʻo e ongo laumālié ni; naʻá na ʻi ai ʻi muʻa, ʻe ʻikai hana ngataʻanga, te na ʻi ai ʻamui, he ʻokú na nolaumi, pe taʻengata.

Pea naʻe folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí kiate au: ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ongo moʻoní ni, pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e laumālie ʻe ua, pea ʻatamai poto ange ʻa e tahá ʻi he tahá; pea ʻe ʻi ai ha taha ʻe ʻatamai poto ange ʻiate kinaua; ko e ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá au, ʻoku ou ʻatamai poto ange ʻiate kinautolu kotoa pē.
Naʻe fekau atu ʻe he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá ʻa ʻene ʻāngeló ke fakahaofi koe mei he nima ʻo e taulaʻeiki ʻa ʻElikená.

ʻOku ou nofo ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo kinautolu kotoa pē; ko ia ko ʻeni, kuó u ʻalu hifo ʻeni kiate koe ke fakahā kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo ngaohi ʻe hoku nimá, ʻa ia ʻoku mahulu ange ai ʻa hoku potó ʻiate kinautolu kotoa pē, he ʻoku ou pule ʻi he ngaahi langi ʻi ʻolungá, pea ʻi he māmani ʻi laló, ʻi he poto mo e anga-fakapotopoto kakato, ki he fānau fakalaumālie kotoa pē ʻa ia kuo mamata ki ai ho matá talu mei he kamataʻangá; naʻá ku ʻalu hifo ʻi he kamataʻangá ki he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau fakalaumālie kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó ke mamata ki aí.

Ko ʻeni, kuo fakahā mai ʻe he ʻEikí kiate au, ʻa ia ko ʻĒpalahame, ʻa e fānau fakalaumālie ʻa ia naʻe fakatupu ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ʻi ai ʻa e māmaní; pea naʻe ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo kinautolú ni kotoa pē ʻa e tokolahi naʻe ngali ʻeiki mo lahi;

Pea naʻe ʻafio ʻa e ʻOtuá ki he ngaahi laumālié ni kuo nau lelei, pea naʻá ne tuʻu ʻi honau lotolotongá, ʻo ne folofola: Te u fakanofo ʻa kinautolú ni ko ʻeku kau pule; he naʻá ne tuʻu ʻi he haʻohaʻonga ʻo kinautolu ʻa ia ko e ngaahi laumālie, pea naʻá ne ʻafio kuo nau lelei; peá ne folofola mai kiate au: ʻE ʻĒpalahame, ko e toko taha koe ʻo kinautolu; naʻe fili koe ʻi he teʻeki ai ke fanauʻi koé.

Pea naʻe tuʻu ʻa e toko taha ʻi honau haʻohaʻongá ʻa ia naʻe tatau mo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻá ne folofola ange kiate kinautolu naʻe ʻiate iá: Te tau ʻalu hifo, he ʻoku ʻi hena ha vahaʻa ʻataʻatā, pea te tau toʻo mei he ngaahi meʻá ni, pea te tau ngaohi ha māmani ʻa ia ʻe lava ke nofo ai ʻa kinautolú ni;
Pea te tau siviʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he meʻá ni, ke vakai pe te nau fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻe fekau ʻe he ʻEiki ko honau ʻOtuá kiate kinautolú;

Pea ko kinautolu ʻe tauhi ki honau ʻuluaki tuʻungá, ʻe fakalahi kiate kinautolu; pea ʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻe kinautolu ʻe taʻetauhi ki honau ʻuluaki tuʻungá ʻa e nāunau ʻi he puleʻanga tatau mo kinautolu ʻe tauhi ki honau ʻuluaki tuʻungá; pea ko kinautolu ʻe tauhi ki honau tuʻunga hono uá, ʻe tānaki atu ʻa e nāunau ki honau ʻulú ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí: Ko hai te u fekauʻí? Pea tali ʻe ha taha ʻoku hangē ko e Foha ʻo e Tangatá: Ko au ʻeni, fekauʻi au. Pea tali ʻe ha tokotaha kehe, ʻo pehē: Ko au ʻeni, fekauʻi au. Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo pehē: Te u fekauʻi ʻa e ʻuluakí.
Pea naʻe ʻita ʻa hono uá, ʻo ʻikai te ne tauhi ki hono ʻuluaki tuʻungá; pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá, naʻe muimui kiate ia ʻa e tokolahi.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/4.title: ʻĒpalahame 4
chapter_summary: Naʻe palani ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa hono fakatupu ʻo e māmaní mo e meʻa moʻui kotoa pē ʻi aí—ʻOku fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ʻaho ʻe ono ʻo e fakatupú.

verses.text: Pea toki folofola ʻa e ʻEikí: Tau ō hifo. Pea naʻa nau ō hifo ʻi he kamataʻangá, pea ko kinautolu, ʻa ia ko e pehē ko e ngaahi ʻOtuá, naʻa nau fakamāʻopoʻopo mo ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi langí pea mo e māmaní.

Pea ko e māmaní, hili hono ngaohí, naʻe fuofuonoa mo lala, koeʻuhí he naʻe teʻeki ai ke nau ngaohi ha meʻa ka ko e māmaní pē; pea naʻe fakafonu ʻe he fakapoʻulí ʻa e funga ʻo e lolotó, pea naʻe ʻōʻōfaki ʻa e Laumālie ʻo e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻi he fukahi vaí.
Pea ko kinautolu (ko e ngaahi ʻOtuá) naʻa nau folofola: Ke ʻi ai ha maama; pea naʻe maama.
Pea ko kinautolu (ko e ngaahi ʻOtuá) naʻa nau ʻafioʻi ʻa e māmá, he naʻe ngingila ia; pea naʻa nau vaheʻi ʻa e māmá, pe pule ke vaheʻi ia, mei he fakapoʻulí.

Pea naʻe ui ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e māmá ko e ʻAho, pea nau ui ʻa e fakapoʻulí ko e Poʻuli. Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko e efiafí ʻo fai ʻo aʻu ki he pongipongí naʻa nau ui ko e poʻuli; pea ko e pongipongí ʻo fai ʻo aʻu ki he efiafí naʻa nau ui ko e ʻaho; pea ko e ʻuluakí ʻeni, pe ko e kamataʻanga, ʻo e meʻa naʻa nau ui ko e ʻahó mo e poó.
Pea naʻe folofola foki ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Ke ai ha ʻatā ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, pea te ne vaheʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí mei he ngaahi vaí.

Pea naʻe tuʻutuʻuniʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e ʻataá, koeʻuhí ke ne vahevaheʻi ʻa e ngaahi vai ʻa ia naʻe ʻi lalo ʻi he ʻataá mei he ngaahi vai ʻa ia naʻe ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he ʻataá; pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻenau tuʻutuʻuní.

Pea naʻe ui ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e ʻataá, ko e Langí. Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko e vahaʻa mei he efiafí ki he pongipongí naʻa nau ui ko e poó; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e vahaʻa mei he pongipongí ki he efiafí naʻa nau ui ko e ʻahó; pea ko hono tuʻo ua ʻeni ʻo ʻenau ui ʻa e poó mo e ʻahó.

Pea naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá, ʻo pehē: Ke fakatahataha ʻa e ngaahi vai ʻi he lalo langí ki he potu pē ʻe taha, pea ke eʻa hake ʻa e fonuá pea mōmoa; pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻenau tuʻutuʻuní;

Pea naʻe ui ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e fonua mōmoá ko e Fonua; pea nau ui ʻa e fakatahatahaʻanga ʻo e ngaahi vaí ko e Ngaahi Fuʻu Vai Lahi; pea naʻe ʻafioʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá kuo talangofua kiate kinautolu.

Pea folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Tau teuteuʻi ʻa e fonuá ke tupu ai ha mohuku; mo e ʻakau iiki ʻoku tupu ai hono tengá; mo e ʻakau fua ʻoku tupu ai hono fuá, ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatupu ʻe hono tengá ʻiate ia pē ʻa hono tataú ʻi he māmaní; pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻenau tuʻutuʻuní.

Pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e fonuá ke tupu ai ʻa e mohukú mei hono tenga ʻoʻoná pea mo e ʻakau īkí ke tupu ai ʻa e ʻakau iiki mei hono tenga ʻoʻoná pea tupu ai ʻa e tenga ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá; pea mo e fonuá ke tupu ai ʻa e ʻakaú mei hono tenga ʻoʻoná, ʻo fua ʻaki ʻa e fua, ʻa ia ko hono tengá ʻe lava ke fakatupu hono tenga ʻoʻoná pē, ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá; pea naʻe ʻafioʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá kuo talangofua kiate kinautolu.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻa nau lau ʻa e ngaahi ʻahó; mei he efiafí ʻo aʻu ki he pongipongí naʻa nau ui ko e pō; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, mei he pongipongí ki he efiafí naʻa nau ui ko e ʻaho; pea ko hono tuʻo tolú ia.

Pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e ngaahi maama ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí, pea tuku ke ne vaheʻi ʻe ia ʻa e ʻahó mei he poó; ʻo teuteu ia ke hoko ko e ngaahi fakaʻilonga mo e ngaahi faʻahitaʻu, mo e ngaahi ʻaho, mo e ngaahi taʻu;
Pea nau fakatupu ia ke hoko ko e ngaahi maama ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí ke fakamaama ki he māmaní; pea naʻe hoko ia.

Pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e ongo maama lalahi ʻe uá, ko e maama lahi angé ke pule ki he ʻahó, pea ko e maama siʻi hifó ke pule ki he poʻulí; naʻa nau fokotuʻu foki mo e ngaahi fetuʻú fakataha mo e maama siʻi hifó;
Pea naʻe fokotuʻu ia ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e ngaahi langí ke foaki maama ki he māmaní, pea ke pule ki he ʻahó pea ki he poʻulí, pea ke ne vahevaheʻi ʻa e māmá mei he fakapoʻulí.
Pea naʻe ʻafio ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuo nau tuʻutuʻuní kae ʻoua kuo nau talangofua.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai mei he efiafí ʻo aʻu ki he pongipongí pea ko e poʻulí ia; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fai mei he pongipongí ʻo aʻu ki he efiafí pea ko e ʻahó ia; pea ko hono tuʻo faá ia.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Ke tau teuteuʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí ke tupu ai ʻo lahi ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ngāue ʻa ia ʻoku moʻuí; pea mo e fanga manupuná, koeʻuhí ke nau puna ʻi ʻolunga ʻi he fonuá ʻi he ʻataʻatā ʻo e langí.

Pea naʻe teuteuʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e ngaahi vaí koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo tupu mei ai ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu tofuaʻa lalahi, pea mo e meʻa moʻui kotoa pē ʻoku ngaué, ʻa ia ʻe tupu ʻi he ngaahi vaí ʻo lahi ʻaupito ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá; pea mo e fanga manupuna kapakau kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá. Pea naʻe ʻafio ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻe talangofua kiate kinautolu, pea naʻe lelei ʻa ʻenau palaní.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Te tau tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu, mo pule ke nau fanafanau mo fakatokolahi, pea fakafonu ʻa e ngaahi vai ʻi he ngaahi tahí pe ko e ngaahi vai lahí; pea pule ke fakatokolahi ʻa e fanga manupuná ʻi he māmaní.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e efiafí ʻo aʻu ki he pongipongí naʻa nau ui koe poʻulí; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e pongipongí ʻo aʻu ki he efiafí naʻa nau ui ko e ʻahó; pea ko hono tuʻo nimá ia.

Pea naʻe teuteuʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní ke tupu ai ʻa e meʻa moʻuí ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá, ʻa e fanga pulú ʻi hono faʻahinga, mo e ngaahi meʻa totoló, mo e fanga manu ʻo e fonuá ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá; pea naʻe hoko ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻenau folofolá.

Pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní ke tupu ai ʻa e fanga manú ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá, mo e fanga pulú ʻo fakatatau ki honau faʻahingá, pea mo e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku totolo ʻi he māmaní ʻo fakatatau ki hono faʻahingá; pea naʻe ʻafioʻi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá te nau talangofua.

Pea naʻe alealea ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻiate kinautolu pē pea nau folofola: Tau ō hifo ʻo ngaohi ʻa e tangatá ʻi hotau ʻīmisí, mo hotau tataú, pea te tau foaki kiate kinautolu ke pule ki he fanga ika ʻo e tahí, pea ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he fanga pulú mo honau faʻahingá, pea ki he māmaní kotoa pē, pea ki he meʻa totolo kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku totolo ʻi he funga ʻo e fonuá.
Ko ia naʻe hāʻele hifo ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ke fakatupu ʻa e tangatá ʻi honau ʻīmisi ʻonautolú, naʻa nau ngaohi ia ʻi he ʻīmisi ʻo e ngaahi ʻOtuá, naʻa nau ngaohi ʻa kinaua ko e tangata mo e fefine.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Te tau tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinaua. Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Te tau pule ke nau fanafanau mo fakatokolahi, pea fakakakai ʻa e māmaní, ʻo ikunaʻi ia, pea pule ki he fanga ika ʻo e tahí, pea ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he meʻa moʻui kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku ʻalu holo ʻi he funga fonuá.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Vakai, te tau foaki kiate kinaua ʻa e ʻakau iiki kotoa pē ʻoku tupu ai ha tenga ʻa ia ʻe tupu ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní hono kotoa, pea mo e ngaahi ʻakau kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻe ʻi ai ha fuá; ʻio, ko e fua ʻo e fuʻu ʻakau ʻoku tupu ai ha tengá, te tau foaki ia kiate kinaua; ʻe hoko ia ko ʻena meʻakai.

Pea ki he fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní, pea ki he fanga manupuna kotoa pē ʻo e ʻataá, pea ki he meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku totolo ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, vakai, te tau foaki kiate kinaua ʻa e moʻuí, pea te tau foaki foki kiate kinaua ʻa e ʻakau iiki lanu-mata kotoa pē ke hoko ko e meʻakai, pea ʻe pehē hono fakatupu ʻo e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Te tau fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kuo tau leaʻakí, ʻo fakatupu ia; pea vakai, te nau talangofua ʻaupito. Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e efiafí ʻo aʻu ki he pongipongí naʻa nau ui ko e poʻulí; pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e pongipongí ʻo aʻu ki he efiafí naʻa nau ui ko e ʻahó; pea naʻa nau lau ʻa e taimi ko hono onó.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/5.title: ʻĒpalahame 5
chapter_summary: ʻOku fakaʻosi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa ʻenau palani hono fakatupu ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē—ʻOku nau fakahoko ʻa e Fakatupú ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau ngaahi palaní—ʻOku fakahingoa ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e meʻa moʻui kotoa pē.

verses.text: Pea ko ia te tau fakaʻosi ʻa e ngaahi langí mo e māmaní pea mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo fakatupú.

Pea naʻe fefolofolai ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻiate kinautolu: ʻI he taimi hono fitú te tau fakaʻosi ʻa ʻetau ngāue, ʻa ia kuo tau aleaʻí; pea te tau mālōlō ʻi he taimi hono fitú mei heʻetau ngāue kotoa pē ʻa ia kuo tau aleaʻí.

Pea naʻe tuku ʻa e ngāue ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻi hono fitu ʻo e taimí, koeʻuhí he te nau mālōlō ʻi he taimi hono fitú mei heʻenau ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē ʻa ia naʻa nau alēlea ʻiate kinautolu (ko e ngaahi ʻOtuá) ke faʻú; mo nau fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ia. Pea naʻe pehē ʻa e anga ʻo ʻenau ngaahi tuʻutuʻuní ʻi he taimi naʻa nau alēlea ai ʻiate kinautolu ke faʻu ʻa e ngaahi langí pea mo e māmaní.

Pea naʻe hāʻele hifo ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻo ngaohi ʻeni ʻa ia ko e ngaahi hokohoko ʻo e ngaahi langí mo e māmaní, ʻi he taimi naʻe ngaohi ai ia ʻi he ʻaho naʻe ngaohi ai ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní pea mo e ngaahi langí,

ʻO fakatatau ki he meʻa kotoa pē kuo nau folofola ʻaki ʻo kau ki he ʻakau kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tuʻu ia ʻi he kelekelé, mo e ʻakau iiki kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tupu iá; he naʻe teʻeki ai ke pule ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ke ʻuha ki he māmaní ʻi heʻenau alēlea ke fai iá, pea naʻe teʻeki ai ke nau fakatupu ha tangata ke ngoueʻi ʻa e kelekelé.
Ka naʻe ʻalu hake ʻa e vai vao mei he fonuá, ʻo fakaviviku ʻa e funga hono kotoa ʻo e kelekelé.

Pea naʻe ngaohi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e tangatá mei he efu ʻo e kelekelé, ʻo nau toʻo hono laumālié (ʻa ia ko e pehē, ko e laumālie ʻo e tangatá), ʻo fakahū ia kiate ia; ʻo mānava ki hono avaʻi ihú ʻa e mānava ʻo e moʻuí, pea naʻe hoko ʻa e tangatá ko e laumālie moʻui.
Pea naʻe tō ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ha ngoue, ʻi he fakahahake ʻo ʻĪtení, pea naʻa nau tuku ai ʻa e tangatá, ʻa ia kuo fakahū hono laumālié ki he sino kuo nau ngaohí.

Pea naʻe pule ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ke tupu mei he kelekelé ʻa e ʻakau kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku matamatalelei ke mamata ki ai pea lelei ki he kaí; mo e ʻakau foki ʻo e moʻuí, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngoué, pea mo e ʻakau ʻo e ʻilo ʻo e leleí mo e koví.
Naʻe ai ha vaitafe naʻe tafe atu mei ʻĪteni, ke fakaviviku ʻa e ngoué, pea naʻe mavahevahe atu ia mei ai ki he mangaʻi vai ʻe fā.
Pea naʻe ʻave ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ʻa e tangatá ʻo tuku ia ʻi he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, ke ngoueʻi ia mo tauhi ia.
Pea naʻe fekau ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ki he tangatá, ʻo pehē: ʻOku ngofua ke ke kai tauʻatāina mei he ʻakau kotoa pē ʻo e ngoué,

Ka ko e ʻakau ʻo e ʻilo ʻo e leleí mo e koví, ʻe ʻikai te ke kai mei ai; he ko e taimi te ke kai ai mei aí, kuo pau ke ke mate. Ko ʻeni ko au, ʻĒpalahame, naʻá ku vakai, naʻe fakatatau ia ki he lau taimi ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatatau ki he taimi ʻo Kolapá; he naʻe teʻeki ai ke tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá kia ʻĀtama ʻa ʻene lau taimí.
Pea naʻe folofola ʻa e ngaahi ʻOtuá: Tau ngaohi ha tokoni moʻó e tangatá, he ʻoku ʻikai lelei ke toko taha pē ʻa e tangatá, ko ia te tau ngaohi ha tokoni moʻona.
Pea naʻe pule ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá ke hoko ha mohe maʻu kia ʻĀtama; peá ne mohe, pea nau toʻo ha taha ʻo hono ngaahi hui vakavaká, ʻo toe tāpuniʻi ʻa e kakanó ke fetongi ʻa e huí;
Pea mei he hui vakavaka naʻe toʻo ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá mei he tangatá, naʻa nau ngaohi ʻa e fefiné, ʻo nau ʻomi ia ki he tangatá.
Pea naʻe pehē ʻe ʻĀtama: Ko e hui ʻeni ʻo hoku ngaahi huí, pea ko e kakano ʻo hoku kakanó; ko ʻeni ʻe ui ia ko e Fefiné, koeʻuhí he naʻe toʻo ia mei he tangatá;
Ko ia ʻe tuku ai ʻe he tangatá ʻa ʻene tamaí mo ʻene faʻeé, pea pīkitai ia ki hono uaifí, pea te na kakano pē taha.
Pea naʻá na fakatou tēlefua, ʻa e tangatá mo e hono uaifí, pea naʻe ʻikai te na mā ai.

Pea naʻe ngaohi ʻe he ngaahi ʻOtuá mei he kelekelé ʻa e fanga manu kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá, pea mo e manupuna kotoa pē ʻo e ʻataá, pea ʻomi ʻa kinautolu kia ʻĀtama ke vakai pe ko e hā te ne ui ʻaki ʻa kinautolú; pea ʻilonga ʻa e hingoa naʻe ui ʻaki ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e meʻa moʻui kotoa pē, ʻe hoko ia ko hono hingoa ʻoʻoná.
Pea naʻe fakahingoa ʻe ʻĀtama ʻa e fanga pulu kotoa pē ʻi hono faʻahingá, mo e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, mo e manu kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá; pea kia ʻĀtama, naʻe maʻu ha tokoni kiate ia.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-1.title: Facsimile 1
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-1.book_title: Ko ha Tatau Moʻoni ʻo e Tā Fakatātā Mei he Tohi ʻa ʻĒpalahamé
subtitle: Fika 1
text: Ko e Fakamatala
Fakatātā 1. Ko e ʻĀngelo ʻa e ʻEikí.
Fakatātā 2. Ko ʻĒpalahame kuo haʻi ki ha funga ʻesi-feilaulau.
Fakatātā 3. Ko e taulaʻeiki tauhi-tamapua ʻa ʻElikená ʻokú ne feinga ke ʻo hake ʻa ʻĒpalahame ko ha feilaulau.
Fakatātā 4. Ko e ʻesi-feilaulau ke fai feilaulau ai ʻa e kau taulaʻeiki tauhi-tamapuá, ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ngaahi ʻotua ʻo ʻElikená, Līpiná, Mamakelá, Kolasí, mo Feló.
Fakatātā 5. Ko e ʻotua tamapua ʻo ʻElikená.
Fakatātā 6. Ko e ʻotua tamapua ʻo Līpiná.
Fakatātā 7. Ko e ʻotua tamapua ʻo Mamakelá.
Fakatātā 8. Ko e ʻotua tamapua ʻo Kolasí.
Fakatātā 9. Ko e ʻotua tamapua ʻo Feló.
Fakatātā 10. Ko ʻĒpalahame ʻi ʻIsipite.
Fakatātā 11. Ko e meʻa kuo tā ke ne fakafofongaʻi ʻa e ngaahi pou ʻo e langí, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa naʻe mahino ki he kau ʻIsipité.

Fakatātā 12. Ko e Laukiiangi, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e vaha ʻatā lahi, pe ko e ʻatā ki ʻolunga ʻi hotau ʻulú; ka ʻi he tā fakatātā ko ʻení, ʻi heʻene fekauʻaki mo e tefito ko ení, naʻe tā ia ʻe he kau ʻIsipité ke fakatātaaʻi ʻa Saumau, ke māʻolunga, pe ko e ngaahi langí, ʻo ʻuhinga tatau mo e foʻi lea faka-Hepelū ko e Siaumāimi.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-2.title: Facsimile 2
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-2.book_title: Ko ha Tatau Moʻoni ʻo e Tā Fakatātā Mei he Tohi ʻa ʻĒpalahamé
subtitle: Fika 2
text: Ko e Fakamatala

Fakatātā 1. Ko Kolapa, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e ʻuluaki meʻa naʻe fakatupú, pea ofi taha ki he maama fakasilesitialé, pe ko e ʻafioʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá. ʻOku ʻuluaki ʻi he pulé, ka ʻoku fakamuimui taha ʻi he anga ʻo e lau taimí. Ko e lau taimi ʻo fakatatau ki he lau taimi fakasilesitialé, ʻa ia ko e lau taimi fakasilesitiale ko iá, ʻoku tatau ʻa e ʻaho ʻe taha ki he hanga ʻe taha. ʻOku tatau ʻa e ʻaho ʻe taha ʻi Kolapá mo e taʻu ʻe taha afe ʻo fakatatau ki he anga ʻo e lau taimi ʻo e māmaní, ʻa ia ʻoku ui ʻe he kau ʻIsipité ko Siā-ho-ē.

Fakatātā 2. ʻOku tuʻu ʻo hoko ki Kolapa, naʻe ui ia ʻe he kau ʻIsipité ko ʻOlipilisi, ʻa ia ko e maama lahi pule hono hokó ofi ki he maama fakasilesitialé pe ko e potu ʻa ia ʻoku ʻafio ai ʻa e ʻOtuá; ʻoku maʻu foki ʻa e kī ʻo e mālohi ʻo kau ki he ngaahi maama kehé; ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fakahā mei he ʻOtuá kia ʻĒpalahamé, lolotonga ʻene fai ha feilaulau ʻi ha ʻesi feilaulau, ʻa ia kuó ne fokotuʻu ki he ʻEikí.

Fakatātā 3. Kuo tā ke fakafofongaʻi ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻoku ʻafio ʻi hono taloní, kuo kofu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi mo e mafai; mo ha kalauni ʻo e maama taʻengata ʻi hono ʻulú; ʻoku fakafofongaʻi foki ʻa e ngaahi Lea Fakaʻilonga lalahi ʻo e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeiki Toputapú, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fakahā kia ʻĀtama ʻi he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, kae ʻumaʻā foki kia Seti, Noa, Melekisēteki, ʻĒpalahame, pea mo kinautolu kotoa pē ʻa ia naʻe fakahā ki ai ʻa e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí.

Fakatātā 4. ʻOku fai tatau mo e foʻi lea faka-Hepelū ko e Laukiiangi, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e fuʻu ʻatā lahi, pe ko e feituʻu ʻatā ʻo e ngaahi langí; ko ha mataʻi fika foki, ʻi he lea faka-ʻIsipité ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko e taha afe; ʻoku fakatatau ki he lau taimi ʻo Olipilisí, ʻa ia ʻoku faitatau mo Kolapa ʻi heʻene ʻalu takaí pea mo hono lau taimí.

Fakatātā 5. ʻOku ui ia ʻi he lea faka-ʻIsipité ko ʻEnisi-ko-ʻoni-tosi; ko e taha ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi maama pulé foki, pea ʻoku lau ʻe he kau ʻIsipité ko e Laʻaá ia, pea ʻoku maʻu ʻe ia ʻa hono māmá mei Kolapa ʻo fou ʻi he Kae-i-vanalasi, ʻa ia ko e Lea Fakaʻilonga lahí, pe ʻi hono fakalea ʻe tahá, ko e mālohi pule, ʻa ia ʻokú ne puleʻi ʻa e ngaahi maama pe ko e ngaahi fetuʻu kuo fokotuʻu pau ʻe hongofulu mā nima kehe, ʻo hangē foki ko Folōisí pe ko e Māhiná, ko e Māmaní pea mo e Laʻaá ʻi heʻenau ngaahi ʻalu takai fakataʻú. ʻOku maʻu ʻe he maama ko ʻeni ʻa hono mālohí ʻo fou atu ʻi he Kili-folisi-ʻisi-ʻesí, pe ko e Ha-kō-kau-viimí, ʻa ia ko e ngaahi fetuʻu ʻoku fakafofongaʻi ʻe he fika ko e 22 mo e 23, ʻoku maʻu ʻa e maama mei he ngaahi ʻalu takai ʻa Kolapá.
Fakatātā 6. ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e māmani ko ʻení ʻi hono ngaahi potu ʻe faá.

Fakatātā 7. ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻoku ʻafio ʻi hono taloní, ʻo ne fakahā ʻi he ngaahi langí ʻa e ngaahi foʻi Lea Fakaʻilonga lalahi ʻo e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí; ʻo hangē foki, ko e fakaʻilonga ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní kia ʻĒpalahame, ʻi he tatau ʻo ha lupé.
Fakatātā 8. ʻOku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai lava ʻo fakahā ki he māmaní; ka ʻe maʻu ia ʻi he Temipale Toputapu ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Fakatātā 9. ʻOku ʻikai totonu ke fakahā ia ʻi he lolotongá ni.
Fakatātā 10. Mo ia foki.
Fakatātā 11. Mo ia foki. Kapau ʻe lava ʻe he māmaní ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi fika ko ʻení, tuku ke pehē. ʻĒmeni.
Ko e ngaahi fakatātā fika 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, mo e 21, ʻe toki fakahā mai ia ʻi he taimi ʻoku finangalo ki ai ʻa e ʻEikí.
ʻOku fakahā ʻa e liliu ʻoku hā atu ʻi ʻolunga ní ʻo fakatatau ia ki hono lahi ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku mau maʻu ha mafai ke fakahā atu ʻi he lolotonga ní.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-3.title: Facsimile 3
/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/fac-3.book_title: Ko e Tatau Moʻoni ʻo e Tā Fakatātā Mei he Tohi ʻa ʻĒpalahamé
subtitle: Fika 3
text: Ko e Fakamatala

Fakatātā 1. Ko ʻĒpalahame ʻoku nofo ʻi he taloni fakatuʻi ʻo Feló, ʻi he fakaʻapaʻapa kiate ia ʻa e tuʻí, mo ha kalauni ʻi hono ʻulú, ʻa ia ko e fakafofongaʻi ʻo e Lakanga Fakataulaʻeikí, ʻa ia ko e fakaʻilonga fakatātā ʻo e Toko Toluʻi Palesiteni Lahi ʻi he Langí; pea mo e tokotoko fakatuʻi ʻo e fakamaau totonú mo e fakamāú ʻi hono nimá.
Fakatātā 2. Ko e Tuʻi ko Feló, ʻa ia kuo tohi hono huafá ʻi he ngaahi mataʻi tohi ʻi ʻolunga ʻi hono fofongá.
Fakatātā 3. ʻOku ʻuhinga kia ʻĒpalahame ʻi ʻIsipite ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku fakamatala ki ai ʻi he Fakatātā 10 ʻo e Fakatātā Fika 1.
Fakatātā 4. Ko e Pilinisi ʻo Felo, ko e Tuʻi ʻo ʻIsipité, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo tohi ki ʻolunga ʻi he nimá.
Fakatātā 5. Ko Sūlemi, ko e taha ʻo e kau tauhi tēpile tuʻu-ki-muʻa ʻa e tuʻí, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku fakahā ʻe he ngaahi mataʻi tohi ki ʻolunga ʻi hono nimá.
Fakatātā 6. Ko ʻOlimilā, ko ha tangata pōpula ʻa e pilinisí.
ʻOku fakamatala ʻe ʻĒpalahame ʻa e ngaahi tefitoʻi moʻoni ʻo e ako ki he ngaahi fetuʻú ʻi he lotoʻā ʻo e tuʻí.

/study/scriptures/pgp/js-m/1.title: Siosefa Sāmita—Mātiu 1
chapter_summary: ʻOku tomuʻa fakahā ʻe Sīsū ʻa e fakaʻauha ʻoku ʻamanaki ke hoko mai ki Selūsalemá—ʻOkú ne toe folofola foki ʻo kau ki he hāʻele ʻanga ua mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, pea mo hono fakaʻauha ʻo e kau fai angahalá.

verses.text: He ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, ngata mei heni ʻe ʻikai te mou toe mamata kiate au ʻo ʻiloʻi ko au ia ʻa ia naʻe tohi ʻe he kau palōfitá ʻo kau ki aí, kae ʻoua ke mou pehē: ʻOku monūʻia ia ʻoku haʻu ʻi he huafa ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻi he ngaahi ʻao ʻo e langí, pea mo e kau ʻāngelo māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē fakataha mo ia. Pea toki mahino ki heʻene kau ākongá te ne toe hāʻele mai ki he māmaní, ʻi he hili hono fakanāunauʻiaʻi mo hilifaki ʻa e kalauni kiate ia ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻe hāʻele atu ʻa Sīsū, ʻo ʻalu mei he temipalé; pea haʻu ʻene kau ākongá kiate ia, ke fanongo kiate ia, ʻo nau pehē: ʻEiki, fakahā kiate kimautolu ʻo kau ki he ngaahi fale ʻo e temipalé, ʻo hangē ko hoʻo folofolá—ʻE holoki hifo ia, ʻo tuku ia ke lala kiate kimoutolu.

Pea pehē ange ʻe Sīsū kiate kinautolu: ʻIkai ʻoku mou mamata ki he ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai mahino ia kiate kimoutolu? Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai ke toe ʻi heni, ʻi he temipale ko ʻení, ha maka kuo fokotuʻu ki ha maka ʻa ia ʻe taʻelaku ki lalo.

Pea naʻe hāʻele atu ʻa Sīsū meiate kinautolu, ʻo ne hāʻele ʻo ʻafio ʻi he Moʻunga ʻo e ʻŌlivé. Pea ʻi heʻene ʻafio ʻi he Moʻunga ʻo e ʻŌlivé, naʻe haʻu fakafufū ʻa e kau ākongá kiate ia, ʻo nau pehē: Fakahā kiate kimautolu pē ʻe hoko ʻa fē ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻa ia kuó ke folofola ʻaki ʻo kau ki hono fakaʻauha ʻo e fale temipalé, pea mo e kau Siú; pea ko e hā ʻa e fakaʻilonga ʻo hoʻo hāʻele maí, pea mo e ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, pe ko e fakaʻauha ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻa ia ko e ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní?
Pea naʻe tali ʻe Sīsū, ʻo folofola ange kiate kinautolu: Vakai telia naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻe ha tangata;
Koeʻuhí ʻe haʻu ʻa e tokolahi ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻo pehē—Ko au ko e Kalaisí—ʻo nau kākaaʻi ʻa e tokolahi;
Pea te nau tukuange ʻa kimoutolu ke fakamamahiʻi, pea te nau tāmateʻi ʻa kimoutolu, pea ʻe fehiʻanekinaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, koeʻuhi ko hoku hingoá;
Pea ʻe toki tūkia ʻa e tokolahi, ʻo felavakiʻiʻaki ʻiate kinautolu, mo nau fefehiʻaʻaki;
Pea ʻe tokolahi ʻa e kau palōfita loi ʻe tuʻu hake, ʻo nau kākaaʻi ʻa e tokolahi;
Pea ko e meʻa ʻi he hulu fau ʻo e fai angahalá, ʻe momoko ai ʻa e ʻofa ʻa e tokolahi;
Ka ko ia ia ʻe tuʻu maʻu ʻo ʻikai vaivaí, ʻe fakamoʻui ia.

Ko ia, ʻo ka mou ka mamata ki he meʻa fakalielia ʻo e fakaʻauhá, ʻa ia naʻe lea ki ai ʻa e palōfita ko Tanielá, ʻo kau ki he fakaʻauha ʻo Selūsalemá, ke mou tuʻu leva ʻi he potu toputapú; ko ia ia ʻokú ne laú tuku ke mahino kiate ia.
Pea ke toki feholaki ʻa kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi Siuteá ki he ngaahi moʻungá;
Ko ia ia ʻoku ʻi he tuʻa falé ke hola ia, ʻo ʻikai toe foki mai ke toʻo ha meʻa ʻe taha mei hono falé;
Pea ko ia foki ʻoku ʻi he ngoué, ke ʻoua naʻa foki mai ia ke toʻo hono ngaahi kofú;
Pea ʻe malaʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻoku feitamá, mo kinautolu ʻoku toutamá ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iá;
Ko ia, ke mou lotu ki he ʻEikí ke ʻoua naʻa hoko hoʻomou feholakí ʻi he faʻahitaʻu momokó pe ʻi he ʻaho Sāpaté;

Koeʻuhí, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iá, ʻe toki hoko ʻa e fuʻu mamahi lahi ʻi he kau Siú pea ʻi he kakai ʻo Selūsalemá, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo teʻeki ai ke ʻomai ʻe he ʻOtuá ki ʻIsileli, talu mei he kamataʻanga ʻo honau puleʻangá ʻo aʻu mai ki he taimi ko ʻení; ʻikai, pe ʻe fekau mai ki ʻIsileli ʻi ha taimi.
Ko e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo hoko kiate kinautolú ko e kamataʻanga pē ia ʻo e ngaahi mamahi ʻa ia ʻe hoko mai kiate kinautolú.

Pea ka ʻikai ke fakanounouʻi ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ko iá, ʻe ʻikai ha kakano ʻiate kinautolu ʻe fakamoʻui; ka koeʻuhi ko e lelei ʻa e kakai filí, pea fakatatau ki he fuakavá, ʻe fakanounouʻi ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ko iá.

Vakai, ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻeni kuó u leaʻaki kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki he kau Siú; pea ko e tahá, ka hili ʻa e mamahi ʻo e ngaahi ʻaho ko iá ʻa ia ʻe hoko mai ki Selūsalemá, kapau ʻe pehē atu ʻe ha tangata kiate kimoutolu, Vakai, ʻoku ʻi heni ʻa Kalaisi, pe ʻi hena, ʻoua te mou tui ki ai;

Koeʻuhí ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iá ʻe tuʻu hake foki ʻa e kau Kalaisi loi, mo e kau palōfita loi, pea te nau fakahā ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga lalahi mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaofo, pea ko ia, kapau ʻe lava, te nau kākaaʻi ʻa e kakai filí, ʻio, ʻa ia ko e kakai kuo fili ʻo fakatatau ki he fuakavá.

Vakai, ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhí ko e lelei ʻa e kakai filí; pea te mou fanongo foki ki he ngaahi tau, mo e ngaahi ongoongo ʻo e ngaahi tau; vakai ke ʻoua naʻa mou puputuʻu, he ko e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuó u tala kiate kimoutolú kuo pau ke hoko ia; ka ʻoku teʻeki ai hokosia ʻa e ngataʻangá.
Vakai, kuó u tomuʻa fakahā ia kiate kimoutolu;
Ko ia, kapau te nau pehē atu kiate kimoutolu: Vakai, ʻoku ʻi he toafá ia; ʻoua te mou ʻalu ki ai: Vakai, ʻoku ʻi he ngaahi loki liló ia; ʻoua ʻe tui ki ai;
He hangē ko e ulo atu ʻa e maama ʻo e pongipongí mei he hahaké, ʻo ulo atu ʻo aʻu ki he hihifó, ʻo ʻufiʻufi ʻa e fonuá kotoa, ʻe pehē pē foki mo e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.

Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate kimoutolu ha lea fakatātā. Vakai, ko e potu ko ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ʻangaʻangá, ʻe kātoa ki ai ʻa e fanga ʻīkalé foki; ʻe pehē foki ʻa hono tānaki fakataha mai ʻo hoku kakai filí mei he ngaahi vahe ʻe fā ʻo e māmaní.
Pea te nau fanongo ki he ngaahi tau mo e ngaahi ongoongo ʻo e ngaahi tau.

Vakai ʻoku ou lea koeʻuhí ko e lelei ʻa hoku kakai filí; he ʻe tuʻu hake ʻa e fonua ki he fonua, mo e puleʻanga ki he puleʻanga; ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi honge, mo e ngaahi mahaki fakaʻauha, mo e ngaahi mofuike ʻi he ngaahi potu kehekehe.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e meʻa ʻi he fuʻu hulu ʻa e fai angahalá, ʻe fakaʻau ʻo momoko ʻa e ʻofa ʻa e tokolahi; ka ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai ke vaivaí, ʻe fakamoʻui ia.

Pea ko e Ongoongoleleí ni ʻo e Puleʻangá ʻe malanga ʻaki ia ʻi he māmaní kotoa pē, ko ha fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi puleʻangá kotoa pē, pea ʻe toki hoko mai ʻa e ngataʻangá, pe ko e fakaʻauha ʻo e kau fai angahalá;
Pea ko e tahá ko e meʻa fakalielia ʻo e fakaʻauha ko ia naʻe lau ki ai ʻa Taniela ko e palōfitá, ʻe fakahoko ia.

Pea ka hili leva ʻa e mamahi ʻo e ngaahi ʻaho ko iá, ʻe fakapoʻuli ʻa e laʻaá, pea ʻe ʻikai tuku mai ʻe he māhiná ʻa hono māmá, pea ʻe ngangana ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻú mei he langí, pea ʻe ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi mālohi ʻo e langí.

Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ko e toʻu tangata ko ʻeni, ʻa ia ʻe fakahā atu ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení, ʻe ʻikai mole atu ia kae ʻoua ke fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u tala kiate kimoutolú.
Neongo ʻe hoko ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho, ʻa ia ʻe mole atu ai ʻa e langí mo e māmaní; ka ʻe ʻikai mole atu ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá, ka ʻe fakahoko kotoa pē.

Pea, hangē ko ʻeku lea ki muʻá, ka hili ʻa e mamahi ʻo e ngaahi ʻaho ko iá, pea ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi mālohi ʻo e langí, ʻe toki hā mai ʻa e fakaʻilonga ʻo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he langí, pea ʻe tangi leva ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní; pea te nau mamata ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻoku hāʻele mai ʻi he ngaahi ʻao ʻo e langí, mo e mālohi mo e nāunau lahi;

Pea ko ia ia te ne meʻa mahuʻinga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku leá, ʻe ʻikai ke kākaaʻi ia, he ʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, pea te ne fekauʻi mai ʻene kau ʻāngelo ke muʻomuʻa ʻiate ia mo e fuʻu leʻo-lahi ʻo e talupite, pea te nau tānaki fakataha ʻa e toenga ʻo hono kakai filí mei he matangi ʻe faá, mei he ngataʻanga ʻe taha ʻo e langí ki he ngataʻanga ʻe tahá.
Ko ʻeni ke mou ʻiloʻi ha fakatātā ʻo e ʻakau ko e fikí—ʻO ka kei litolito hono ngaahi vaʻá, pea kamata ke tupu ʻa hono laú, te mou ʻilo ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná;
ʻE pehē foki, ʻo ka mamata ʻa hoku kakai filí, ki he ngaahi meʻa kotoa ko ʻení, te nau ʻiloʻi ʻokú ne ofi mai, ʻio, ʻi he ngaahi matapaá;
Ka ko e ʻaho mo e houa ko iá, ʻoku ʻikai ʻilo ki ai ha taha; ʻoku ʻikai, ʻoku ʻikai ʻilo ʻa e kau ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻi he langí, ka ko ʻeku Tamaí pē.
Kae hangē ko ia ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo Noá, ʻe pehē pē foki ʻi he hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá;
He ʻe hoko kiate kinautolu, ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi ʻaho ki muʻa ʻi he lōmakí; he naʻa nau kai mo inu mo mali mo foaki ke mali, ʻo aʻu ki he ʻaho naʻe hū ai ʻa Noa ki he ʻaʻaké;
Pea naʻe ʻikai te nau ʻilo ʻo aʻu ki he hoko mai ʻa e lōmakí, ʻo ʻave ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē; ʻe pehē pē foki ʻa e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
ʻE toki fakahoko ai ʻa ia kuo tohi ʻo pehē, ko e ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí ʻe ʻi he ngoué ʻa e toko ua, ʻe ʻave ʻa e toko taha, kae tuku ʻa e toko taha;
ʻE ai ʻa e toko ua ʻoku ngāue ʻi he meʻa momosí, ʻe ʻave ʻa e toko taha, kae tuku ʻa e toko taha;
Pea ko e meʻa ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ki he toko tahá, ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ia ki he kakai kotoa pē; ko ia, mou leʻo, he ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻilo ʻa e houa ʻe hāʻele mai ai ʻa homou ʻEikí.
Kae ʻilo ʻeni, ka ne ʻilo ʻe he pule ʻo e falé ʻa e lakanga leʻo ko ia ʻe haʻu ai ʻa e kaihaʻá, pehē naʻá ne leʻo, pea ʻikai tuku ke haea ʻa hono falé, ka kuó ne ʻosi teuteu.
Ko ia ke mou tali teu foki mo kimoutolu, koeʻuhí ʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi ha houa ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻamanaki ki ai.
Pea ko hai leva, ha tamaioʻeiki faivelenga mo anga-fakapotopoto, ʻa ia kuo fakanofo ʻe hono ʻeikí ke pule ki hono falé, ke foaki kiate kinautolu ʻa e meʻakai ʻi he faʻahitaʻu totonú?
ʻOku monūʻia ʻa e tamaioʻeiki ʻa ia ʻe haʻu ʻa hono ʻeikí, ʻo ʻilo ia ʻokú ne fai peheé; pea ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, te ne fakanofo ia ke pule ki heʻene ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Ka ʻo kapau ʻe pehē ʻe he tamaioʻeiki angakovi ko iá ʻi hono lotó: ʻoku fakatatali ʻe hoku ʻeikí ʻa ʻene haʻú,
Peá ne kamata ke teʻia hono kaungā-tamaioʻeikí, pea kai mo inu fakataha mo e kau konaá,
ʻE haʻu ʻa e ʻeiki ʻo e tamaioʻeiki ko iá ʻi ha ʻaho ʻoku ʻikai te ne ʻamanaki ai kiate ia, pea ʻi ha houa ʻoku ʻikai te ne ʻilo,
Pea te ne tuʻusi hifo ia, pea tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia hono ʻinasi fakataha mo e kau mālualoí; ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangi mo e fengaiʻitaki ʻo e nifo.

Pea ʻe hoko pehē ʻa e ngataʻanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻo fakatatau ki he kikite ʻa Mōsese ʻo pehē: ʻE motuhi atu ʻa kinautolu mei he lotolotonga ʻo e kakaí; ka ʻe teʻeki ai ke hokosia ʻa e ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, ka ʻe faifai pea hoko ia.

/study/scriptures/pgp/js-h/1.title: Siosefa Sāmita—Hisitōlia 1
chapter_summary: ʻOku fakamatala ʻa Siosefa Sāmita ki hono tupuʻangá, ko hono fāmilí, mo e ngaahi feituʻu naʻa nau muʻaki nofo aí—ʻOku tupu hake ha vālau tuʻu ʻo kau ki he lotú ʻi he fakahihifo ʻo Niu ʻIoké—ʻOku fakapapau hono lotó ke ne kumi ki he ʻilo ko ia naʻe fakahinohinoʻi mai ʻe Sēmisí—ʻOku hā mai ʻa e Tamaí mo e ʻAló, pea ui ʻa Siosefa ki heʻene ngāue fakapalōfitá. (Veesi 1–20.)
subtitle: Ko e Ngaahi Meʻa Kuo Toʻotoʻo Mai Mei he Hisitōlia ʻo Siosefa Sāmita, Ko e Palōfitá

verses.text: Ko e meʻa ʻi he ngaahi ongoongo kehekehe kuo fai holo ʻe he niʻihi ʻoku kākā mo fie fai kovi, ʻo kau ki he tupu hake mo e laka ki muʻa ʻa e Siasi ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi ʻo e Kau Māʻoniʻoni ʻi he Ngaahi ʻAho Kimui Ní, ʻa ia kuo faʻu hono kotoa ʻe kinautolu kuo fai iá koeʻuhí ke maumauʻi ʻa e anga ʻo ʻene tuʻu ko e Siasí pea mo ʻene tupu ʻi he māmaní—Ko ia kuo tupu ai hoku loto ke faʻu ʻa e hisitōliá ni, ke fakatonutonu ʻa e fakakaukau ʻa e kakaí, pea foaki ʻa e moʻoní ki he faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻoku nau fekumi ki he moʻoní, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa naʻe hokó, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau kiate aú pea mo e Siasí fakatouʻosi, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi moʻoni ko ia ʻoku ou maʻú.

Te u fakahā atu ʻi he hisitōliá ni ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kehekehe naʻe hoko ʻo kau ki he Siasí ni, ʻi he moʻoni mo e māʻoniʻoni, ʻo hangē ko e anga ʻo e meʻa naʻe hokó, pe ko hono anga ʻi he taimi ní [1838], ʻa ia ko e taʻu hono valu ʻeni talu mei hono fokotuʻu ʻo e Siasi kuo lau ki aí.

Naʻe fanauʻi au ʻi hono taha afe valungeau mā nima ʻo e taʻú ʻi he hili ʻa e ʻaloʻi mai ʻo hotau ʻEikí, ʻi hono uofulu mā tolu ʻo e ʻaho ʻo Tīsemá, ʻi he kolo ko Seiloní, ʻi he vahefonua ko Uinisoá, ʻi he Siteiti ko Veamonití…Naʻe ʻalu ʻa ʻeku tamaí, ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Lahí, mei he Siteiti ko Veamonití, ʻo ne hiki ki Palemaila, ʻi he vahefonua ko ʻOnateleó (ʻoku hoko he taimí ni ko e vahefonua ko Ueiní), ʻi he Siteiti ko Niu ʻIoké, ʻi he taimi naʻá ku taʻu hongofulu aí, pe ofi ki ai. ʻI he hili ha taʻu ʻe fā nai ʻo e aʻu ʻa ʻeku tamaí ki Palemailá, naʻá ne hiki mo hono fāmilí ki Manisesitā ʻi he vahefonua pē ko ia ko ʻOnateleó—

Naʻe kau ʻi hono fāmilí ʻa e toko hongofulu mā taha, ʻa ia ko ʻeku tamaí, ko Siosefa Sāmita; ko ʻeku faʻē ko Lusi Sāmitá (ʻa ia ko hono hingoa ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ne malí, ko Meki, ko e ʻofefine ʻo Solomone Meki); ko hoku ngaahi tokouá, ko ʻAlavini (ʻa ia naʻe mate ʻi he ʻaho 19 ʻo Nōvemá 1823, ʻi he 26 ʻo hono taʻu motuʻá), ko Hailame, ko au, ko Samuela Halisoni, ko Uiliami, ko Tani Kālosi; pea mo hoku ngaahi tuofāfiné, ko Sōfolonia, ko Katalina, mo Lusi.

Ko e taimi ʻe taha ʻi hono ua ʻo e taʻu hili ʻemau hiki ki Manisesitaá, naʻe fuʻu lahi ʻa e ngaue ʻa e loto ʻo e kakaí ʻi he feituʻu naʻa mau nofo aí ʻi he tefito ko e lotú. Naʻe kamata ia ʻi he kau Metotisí, ka naʻe vave ʻene mafola ʻo kau ki ai ʻa e ngaahi siasi kotoa pē ʻo e feituʻu ko ia ʻo e fonuá. Ko e moʻoni, naʻe hangē ne uesia ai ʻa e feituʻu ko ia kotoa pē ʻo e fonuá, pea naʻe ului ʻa e fuʻu kakai tokolahi ki he ngaahi faʻahi fakalotu kehekehe, ʻa ia naʻe fakatupu ai ha moveuveu mo e fakavahavahaʻa ʻi he kakaí, ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai ke siʻi, pea naʻe kalanga ʻa e niʻihi, “Vakai mai ki heni!” pea kalanga ʻa e niʻihi kehe, “Vakai atu ki hena!” Naʻe tuʻuaki ʻe he niʻihi ʻa e tui faka-Metotisí, pea ko e niʻihi ʻa e tui faka-Pelesipiteliané, pea ko e niʻihi ʻa e tui faka-Papitaisó.

He, neongo ʻa e fuʻu ʻofa lahi naʻe fakahā ʻe he kau uluí ki he ngaahi lotu kehekehe ko iá ʻi he taimi ʻo ʻenau uluí, pea mo e faivelenga lahi ʻa ia naʻe fakahā ʻe he kau faifekau taki taha, ʻa ia naʻa nau ngāue lahi ʻi he fakatupu mo e langaʻi ʻo e fuʻu meʻa fakaofó ni ʻo e loto-māfana fakalotu, koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fakaului ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻa nau loto ke ui iá, ʻo tuku ke nau kau ki he lotu ʻoku nau fie kau aí; ka ʻi he kamata ke ʻalu atu ʻa e kau uluí, ko e niʻihi ki he faʻahi ʻe taha pea ko e niʻihi ki ha faʻahi ʻe taha, naʻe hā leva ai ko e ngaahi vā lelei ko ia ʻi he kau taulaʻeikí mo e kau uluí ko e fakangalingali pē ka ʻoku ʻikai moʻoni; he naʻe hoko leva ha fuʻu moveuveu mo e vākovi—ʻo fefakakikihiʻaki ʻa e taulaʻeiki mo e taulaʻeiki, mo e tokotaha ului mo e tokotaha ului; pea ko ia, naʻe fakaʻau ʻo mole ʻaupito ʻa ʻenau feʻofoʻofaní kotoa, ʻo kapau naʻe ai ha taimi naʻe ai haʻanau feʻofoʻofani, ʻi he fakafetauʻilea pea mo e feʻauhi ʻo e ngaahi fakakaukaú.

Ko e taimi ko iá naʻá ku ʻi hoku taʻu hongofulu mā nimá. Naʻe ului ʻa e fāmili ʻo ʻeku tamaí ki he tui faka-Pelesipiteliané, pea naʻe ului honau toko fā ki he siasi ko iá, ʻa ia, ko ʻeku faʻē ko Lusí; mo hoku ongo tokoua ko Hailamé mo Samuela Halisoní; pea mo hoku tuofefine ko Sōfoloniá.

ʻI he taimi ko ʻeni ʻo e fuʻu ngaue ʻa e lotó, naʻe ueʻi hake ʻeku fakakaukaú ke fifili fakamātoato pea hohaʻa lahi; ka neongo ʻa e fuʻu ongo kiate au pea faʻa fakamamahi ʻa e ngaahi ongo ʻa hoku lotó, ka naʻá ku kei fakaʻehiʻehi pē mei he ngaahi faʻahí ni kotoa pē, ka naʻá ku faʻa maʻu ʻenau ngaahi feinga lotu kehekehe ʻi he faingamālie kotoa pē ne u lavá. Naʻe faifai pea kamata ke tokanga ʻa hoku lotó ki he lotu Metotisí, peá u ongoʻi ha holi ke kau fakataha mo kinautolu; ka naʻe hulu pehē fau ʻa e moveuveú mo e fekeʻikeʻi ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi kautaha lotu kehekehé, naʻe faingataʻa ai ki ha tokotaha naʻe kei siʻi ʻo hangē ko aú, pea ʻikai maheni mo e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá mo e ngaahi meʻa, ke ʻiloʻi pau pe ko hai ʻoku totonú pea ko hai ʻoku halá.

Naʻe fuʻu puputuʻu ʻa hoku ʻatamaí ʻi he taimi ʻe niʻihi, ko e meʻa ʻi he fuʻu hulu mo e taʻetuku ʻo e fekailaʻakí mo e moveuveú. Naʻe mātuʻaki fakafepaki ʻa e kau Pelesipiteliané ki he kau Papitaisó mo e kau Metotisí, ʻo nau ngāue ʻaki ʻa e mālohi kotoa ʻo e fealeaʻaki mo e kākā ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻaki ʻenau ngaahi halá, pe, ke ngaohi ʻa e kakaí ke nau pehē ʻoku nau hala. ʻI he tafaʻaki ʻe tahá, ko e kau Papitaisó mo e kau Metotisí naʻa nau faivelenga tatau mo kinautolu foki ʻi he feinga ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻenau ngaahi tokāteline ʻanautolú pea fakahalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi tui kehé kotoa pē.

ʻI he lolotonga ʻo e fakafetauʻilea mo e moveuveu ko ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi fakakaukaú, naʻá ku faʻa pehē ʻi hoku lotó: Ko e hā ha meʻa ʻe fai? Ko hai ʻi he ngaahi faʻahi ko ʻení kotoa pē ʻoku totonú; pe, naʻa kuo nau hala kotoa pē? Kapau ʻoku moʻoni ha faʻahi ʻe taha ʻiate kinautolu, ko e fē ia, pea te u ʻiloʻi fēfē ia?

Lolotonga ʻeku feinga lahi ʻi he ngaahi fuʻu faingataʻa lahi ʻa ia naʻe tupu ʻi he fefakakikihiʻaki ʻa e ngaahi faʻahí ni ʻo e kau lotú, naʻá ku lau ai ʻi ha ʻaho ʻe taha ʻi he Tohi ʻa Sēmisí, ko e ʻuluaki vahé mo e veesi hono nimá, ʻa ia ʻoku pehē: Ka ai hamou taha ʻoku masiva ʻi he potó, ke kole ʻe ia ki he ʻOtuá, ʻa ia ʻokú ne foaki lahi ki he kakai kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai valokiʻi; pea ʻe foaki ia kiate ia.

Naʻe teʻeki ai ke hū mamafa ha potufolofola ki he loto ʻo ha tangata ʻo lahi ange ʻi he mālohi naʻe hū ʻaki ʻa e meʻá ni ki hoku lotó ʻi he taimi ko ʻení. Naʻe hangē naʻe hū ia ʻaki ʻa e fuʻu mālohi lahi ki he ongo kotoa pē ʻo hoku lotó. Naʻá ku toutou fifili ki ai, ʻo u ʻiloʻi kapau naʻe ai ha taha naʻe ʻaonga ke ne maʻu ha poto mei he ʻOtuá, ko au ia; he naʻe ʻikai te u ʻiloʻi pe ko e hā ʻa e meʻa te u faí, pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te u lava ʻo maʻu ha poto lahi ange ʻi he poto naʻá ku maʻu he taimi ko iá, ʻe ʻikai pē te u ʻilo ia ʻi ha taimi, koeʻuhí he naʻe pehē fau hono faikehekehe ʻo e fakaʻuhingaʻi ʻo e ngaahi potufolofola tatau ʻe he kau faiako fakalotu ʻi he ngaahi siasi kehekehé ʻo fakaʻauha ai ʻa e falala kotoa pē ke fakapapauʻi ʻa e fehuʻí ʻi ha fekumi ʻi he Tohi Tapú.

Naʻe faifai peá u fakakaukau kuo pau ke u nofo maʻu ʻi he fakapoʻuli mo e puputuʻu, pe ko haʻaku fai ʻo hangē ko e enginaki ʻa Sēmisí, ʻa ia, ko e kole ki he ʻOtuá. Naʻe faifai peá u fakapapau hoku lotó ke “fehuʻi ki he ʻOtuá,” ko ʻeku fakakaukaú kapau ʻokú ne foaki ʻa e potó kiate kinautolu ʻoku masiva ʻi he potó, mo ne foaki ʻo lahi ʻo ʻikai valokiʻí, ʻe lelei ke u ʻahiʻahi.

Ko ia, naʻá ku fai ʻo fakatatau ki ai, pea ko ʻeku fakapapaú ke fehuʻi ki he ʻOtuá, ko ia naʻá ku ʻalu ki he vao ʻakaú ke ʻahiʻahi. Ko e pongipongi ia ʻo ha ʻaho fakaʻofoʻofa, mo langi maʻa, ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e tō-taʻu ʻo hono taha afe valungeau mā uofulu ʻo e taʻú. Ko ʻeku fuofua ʻahiʻahi ia ke fai ha meʻa pehē talu ʻeku tupu, he neongo ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻá ku lolotonga hohaʻa ki aí, naʻe teʻeki ai pē ke u ʻahiʻahi ke fai ha lotu ʻaki ʻa e leʻó.

Hili ʻeku ʻalu ki he potu naʻá ku fili ki muʻa ke u ʻalu ki aí, pea hili ʻeku vakavakai holo, ʻo u ʻiloʻi ʻoku ou toko taha peé, naʻá ku tūʻulutui hifo ʻo kamata ke fakahā hake ʻa e ngaahi holi ʻo hoku lotó ki he ʻOtuá. ʻI he hili pē ʻeku fai peheé, naʻe puke au ʻe ha mālohi ʻa ia naʻá ne ikuʻi ʻaupito au, pea naʻe pehē fau ʻeku ofo ʻi hono mālohí naʻe taʻofi ai hoku ʻeleló ke ʻoua naʻá ku lava ʻo lea. Naʻe kāpui au ʻe ha fuʻu fakapoʻuli matolu, pea naʻe kiʻi fuofuoloa ʻene hangē kiate au, ngalingali kuo tuku au ki he fakaʻauha fakafokifā.

Ka naʻá ku feinga ʻaki hoku mālohi kotoa pē ke ui ki he ʻOtuá ke ne fakahaofi au mei he mālohi ʻo e filí ni ʻa ia kuó ne puke aú, pea ʻi he mōmēniti ko ia ʻa ia naʻá ku meimei ngalo hifo ai ʻi he loto foʻi ʻo tukuange au ki he fakaʻauhá—kae ʻikai ki ha fakaʻauha fakamahaloʻi, ka ki he mālohi ʻo ha tokotaha moʻoni mei he maama ʻoku taʻe-hā-maí, ʻa ia naʻá ne maʻu ʻa e mālohi fuʻu fakaofo fau ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe teʻeki ai te u ongoʻi ʻi ha tokotahá—kae feʻunga mo e mōmēniti ko ʻeni ʻo e fuʻu hohaʻa lahí, naʻá ku mamata ki ha pou maama feʻunga tonu mo hoku ʻulú, naʻe lahi ange hono ngingilá ʻi he laʻaá, ʻa ia naʻe maliu māmālie hifo kae ʻoua kuo tō ia kiate au.

ʻI heʻene hā maí pē naʻá ku ʻiloʻi kuo fakahaofi au mei he fili naʻá ne haʻi aú. ʻI he nofo mai ʻa e māmá ʻiate aú, naʻá ku sio ki he Tangata ʻe toko ua, ʻa ia ko hona ngingilá mo e nāunaú ʻoku ʻikai faʻa lava ke mafakamatalaʻi, ʻokú na tuʻu mai ʻi ʻolunga ʻiate au ʻi he ʻataá. Naʻe folofola mai ʻa e toko taha kiate au, ʻo ne ui au ʻaki hoku hingoá, ʻo ne tuhu ki he tokotahá ʻo pehē: Ko hoku ʻAlo ʻOfaʻangá ʻeni. Fanongo kiate Ia!

Ko ʻeku taumuʻa ʻi heʻeku ʻalú ke fehuʻi ki he ʻEikí ke u ʻiloʻi pe ko e fē ʻa e siasi ʻi he ngaahi siasí kotoa pē ʻoku moʻoní, koeʻuhí ke u ʻiloʻi ʻa e siasi ke u kau ki aí. Ko ia, ʻi he hili leva ʻeku toe maʻu ʻeku fakakaukau lelei, ʻo u lava ke lea, ko ia naʻá ku ʻeke ki he ongo Tangata ʻa ia naʻá na tuʻu ʻi ʻolunga ʻiate au ʻi he māmá, pe ko e fē ʻa e siasi ʻi he ngaahi siasi kotoa pē ʻoku moʻoní (he naʻe aʻu mai ki he taimi ko ʻení ʻoku teʻeki hū mai ki hoku lotó ʻoku nau hala kotoa pē)—pea ko e fē ʻoku totonu ke u kau ki aí.

Naʻe tali mai kiate au ʻo pehē kuo pau ke ʻoua naʻá ku kau ki ha taha ʻo kinautolu, he kuo nau hala kotoa pē; pea naʻe pehē mai ʻe he Tokotaha naʻe folofola mai kiate aú, ko ʻenau ngaahi akonakí kotoa pē ʻoku fakalielia ia ʻi hono ʻao; pea ʻoku kovi ʻa e faʻahinga kotoa pē ko ia ʻoku fakahā ʻa e tui ki aí; pea: “ʻoku nau ʻunuʻunu mai kiate au ʻaki honau loungutú, ka ʻoku mamaʻo honau lotó meiate au; ʻoku nau akoʻi ko e ngaahi tokāteline ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa e tangata, ʻoku nau maʻu hono ngeʻesi ʻo e lotú, ka ʻoku nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa hono mālohí.”

Naʻá ne toe fekauʻi au ke ʻoua naʻá ku kau ki ha taha ʻo kinautolu; pea naʻá ne folofola ʻaki mo ha ngaahi meʻa lahi kehe kiate au, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te u lava ʻo tohiʻi ʻi he taimi ko ʻení. ʻI heʻeku toe ake haké, naʻá ku ʻiloʻi ʻoku ou tokoto foʻohake, ʻo sio hake ki he langí. ʻI he mahuʻi atu ʻa e māmá, naʻe ʻikai toe haku ivi; ka naʻe ʻikai fuoloa kuo kamata ke u toe mālohi, peá u foki leva ki ʻapi. Pea ʻi heʻeku falala ki he tafuʻanga afí, naʻe fehuʻi mai ʻe heʻeku faʻeé pe ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku hokó. Naʻá ku pehē ange: “ʻOua te ke tokanga ki ai, ʻoku sai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē—ʻoku ou sai pē au ia.” Naʻá ku toki pehē ange ki heʻeku faʻeé. “Kuó u ʻiloʻi maʻaku ʻoku ʻikai ke moʻoni ʻa e lotu Pelesipiteliané.” ʻOku hangē naʻe ʻiloʻi pē ʻe he filí, ʻi he kamataʻanga pē ʻo ʻeku moʻuí, te u hoko ko ha fakamoveuveu mo ha fakatupu-ʻita ki hono puleʻangá; ka ʻikai pea ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga ke kau fakataha ai ʻa e ngaahi mālohi ʻo e fakapoʻulí ke tauʻi au? Ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga naʻe fai mai ai ʻa e fakafepaki mo e fakatanga kiate au, ʻo meimei kamata pē mei heʻeku kei valevalé?

ʻI he ʻosi ha ngaahi ʻaho ʻe niʻihi mei heʻeku mamata ki he meʻa-hā-mai ko ʻení, naʻá ku feʻiloaki ai mo ha taha ʻo e kau tangata malanga ʻo e siasi Metotisí, ʻa ia naʻe kau lahi ʻi he ngaahi meʻa naʻe fai ʻi he fuʻu ngāʻehu fakalotu naʻe lau ki ai ʻi muʻá; pea, ʻi heʻema talanoa ʻo kau ki he lotú, naʻá ku fai ange ai ha fakamatala kiate ia ʻo kau ki he meʻa-hā-mai naʻá ku mamata ki aí. Naʻá ku ʻohovale lahi ʻi he meʻa naʻá ne faí; naʻe ʻikai ngata ʻi heʻene lau ko e meʻa maʻamaʻa ʻa e meʻa naʻá ku fakahā angé, ka naʻá ne manukiʻi lahi ia, ʻo ne pehē ko e tupu kotoa ia mei he tēvoló, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha meʻa ko ha ngaahi meʻa-hā-mai pe ha ngaahi fakahā ʻi he ngaahi ʻahó ni; pea naʻe ngata ʻa e ngaahi meʻa peheé kotoa pē fakataha mo e kau ʻaposetoló, pea ʻe ʻikai pē ke toe ʻi ai ha ngaahi meʻa pehē ia.

Ka neongo iá, naʻe vave ʻeku ʻiloʻi, kuo hanga ʻe heʻeku fai ʻa e talanoá ʻo fakatupu ʻa e fuʻu fehiʻa lahi kiate au ʻi he kakai kuo nau fakahā ʻa e tui ki he lotú, pea naʻe tupu ai ʻa e fakatanga lahi, ʻa ia naʻe fakaʻau pē ke lahi ange; pea neongo ko ha tamasiʻi naʻe ʻikai ʻiloa au, naʻe ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e taʻu hongofulu mā faá mo e taʻu hongofulu mā nimá, pea ko hoku tuʻunga ʻi he moʻuí naʻe feʻunga ke ngaohi ai ha kiʻi tamasiʻi ke taʻe-mahuʻinga ʻi he māmaní, ka naʻe feʻunga hono fakatokangaʻi ia ʻe he kau tangata māʻolunga ke ngaohi ʻa e ʻatamai ʻo e kakaí ke nau fehiʻa kiate au, mo fakatupu ha fuʻu fakatanga fakamamahi; pea naʻe hoko ʻeni ʻi he ngaahi siasí kotoa pē—naʻa nau kau fakataha kotoa ke fakatangaʻi au.

Naʻá ne ngaohi au ke u fifili fakamātoato ʻi he taimi ko iá, pea talu mei he taimi ko iá mo ʻeku toutou fifili, ki hono fuʻu ngali kehe ke lau ha tamasiʻi taʻe-ongoongoa, kuo toki ʻosi hono hongofulu mā fā taʻú, ʻa ia ko ha tokotaha foki, kuo ngaohi ia ke ne moʻui masiva pea ke kumi haʻane moʻui ʻi heʻene ngāue ʻi he ʻaho kotoa pē ko ha tokotaha ʻoku feʻunga hono mahuʻingá ke tokanga ki ai ʻa e kau tuʻu-ki-muʻa ʻo e ngaahi siasi naʻe manakoa lahi taha ʻi he ʻaho ko iá, pea ʻi ha founga ke langaki ai ʻiate kinautolu ʻa e laumālie ʻo e fakatanga mo fie lauʻikoviʻi lahi. Pea neongo pe ʻoku ngali kehe pe ʻikai, ka naʻe hoko ia, pea naʻe faʻa fakatupu ai ʻa e fuʻu loto-mamahi lahi ʻiate au.

Ka neongo iá, ka ko e moʻoni ʻaupito ʻa ʻeku mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-maí. Naʻá ku fakakaukau ki mui maí, naʻe tatau nai ʻa e meʻa naʻá ku ongoʻí mo e meʻa naʻe ongoʻi ʻe Paula, ʻi heʻene tali ki hono talatalaakiʻí ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Tuʻi ko ʻAkilipá, ʻo ne fai ʻa e fakamatala ki he meʻa-hā-mai naʻá ne mamata ki ai ʻi heʻene mamata ki ha maama, mo fanongo ki ha leʻo; ka neongo iá naʻe tokosiʻi pē ʻa e kakai naʻe tui kiate iá; naʻe pehē ʻe he niʻihi ʻokú ne kākā, naʻe pehē ʻe he niʻihi ʻokú ne faha; pea naʻe manukiʻi mo lauʻikoviʻi ia. Ka naʻe ʻikai ke hanga ʻe he ngaahi meʻá ni hono kotoa ʻo fakaʻauha ʻa hono moʻoni ʻo e meʻa-hā-mai naʻá ne mamata ki aí. Kuó ne mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-mai, naʻá ne ʻiloʻi kuó ne mamata ki ai, pea naʻe ʻikai lava ʻe he fakatanga kotoa pē ʻi he lalo langí ʻo liliu ia; pea neongo te nau fakatangaʻi ia ʻo aʻu ki he maté, ka naʻá ne ʻiloʻi, pea te ne ʻiloʻi pē ʻo aʻu ki heʻene mānava fakaʻosí, kuó ne fakatou mamata ki ha maama mo fanongo ki ha leʻo ʻoku folofola mai kiate ia, pea ʻe ʻikai lava ʻe he māmaní kotoa pē ʻo ngaohi ia ke ne fakakaukau pe tui ʻo kehe mei ai.

Naʻá ku pehē pē mo au. Kuó u mamata moʻoni ki ha maama, pea naʻá ku mamata ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e maama ko iá ki ha Tangata ʻe toko ua, pea naʻá na folofola moʻoni mai kiate au; pea neongo naʻe fehiʻanekinaʻi mo fakatangaʻi au koeʻuhi ko ʻeku taukaveʻi kuó u mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-maí, ka naʻe moʻoni ia; pea lolotonga ʻenau fakatangaʻi au, mo lauʻikoviʻi au, mo tukuakiʻi kovi au ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kovi kehekehe kotoa pē ko e meʻa ʻi heʻeku lea ʻaki iá, naʻe langaʻi ai ʻa ʻeku pehē ʻi hoku lotó: Ko e hā hono ʻuhinga ka fakatangaʻi ai au koeʻuhi ko ʻeku tala ʻa e moʻoní? Kuó u mamata moʻoni ki ha meʻa-hā-mai; pea ko hai au ke u fakafepaki ki he ʻOtuá, pe ko e hā ʻoku fakakaukau ai ʻa e māmaní ke fakamālohiʻi au ke u fakafisingaʻi ʻa e meʻa kuó u mamata moʻoni ki aí? He kuó u mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-mai; naʻá ku ʻiloʻi ia, peá u ʻiloʻi ʻoku ʻafioʻi ia ʻe he ʻOtuá, pea ʻe ʻikai te u lava ʻo fakaʻikaiʻi ia, pea ʻe ʻikai foki teu toʻa ke fai pehē; kae kehe naʻá ku ʻiloʻi kapau te u fai pehē te u fakatupu-houhau ai ki he ʻOtuá, pea moʻua ki he tautea.

Kuó u fakafiemālieʻi ʻeni ʻa ʻeku fakakaukaú ʻo kau ki haʻa lotu—ʻoku ʻikai ko hoku fatongia ke u kau ki ha taha ʻo kinautolu, ka ke u fai pehē atu ai pē kae ʻoua ke toki fekauʻi au.
